reviews.comments: Hazal sıcak bir şekilde bizi karşıladı. Ev küçük ama iç daraltmıyor. Dekorasyon çok hoş. Ancak bodrum kat olmasından dolayı sabah uyanmakta zorlandık çünkü ışık çok az alıyor. En önemlisi sabah uyandığımızda sıcak su yoktu ve soğuk suda yıkanmak zorunda kaldık.

İlk olarak evin -1 de olmadı karanlık ve soğuk bir ambiyans veriyor. Genel olarak temiz bir daireydi ama yerlerin taş olup eksi birde olması rutubet kokusu gibi bir şey yapıyor. Ev sahibimize anahtar teslim edeceğimiz saatte bir saatten uzun süre ulaşamadık, telefonu kapalıydı. Anahtarı bakkala falan bıraksaydınız dedi. Bir gece petek bozuktu ve çok soğuktu. İyi bir konaklama olmadı bizim için tavsiye etmiyorum.
Ev -1 de olmasına rağmen rutubetli değildi.Beklediğimizden daha temizdi,yarım pencere olduğundan sabahları fazla ışık alamıyor. Tek kişi veya çiftler için ideal bir ev.
Super konum, Sirin bir ev, Konuksever ev sahibi.
Hafif bir rutubet dışında hiçbir problem yaşamadık. Evin konumu, şirin dekorasyonu ile sıcacık bir ziyaret deneyimi yaşadım. Kesinlikle tavsiye ediyorum.

Daha girişte zaten başlayan şaşkınlık ve sonrasında ki o muhteşem his. Minimalistliği gerçekten yaşayıp hissedebilmek :) Eşsiz güzellikte bir daire ve böylesine güzel ev sahipliği yapan Hazal hanıma teşekkür ederim çok :) Mutlaka tekrar görüşmek üzere

space: Квартира в европейской части Стамбула. Станция метро Османбей 7 мин. ходьбы. Рядом с домом два маркета,кафе. В пешей доступности текстильные магазины,а также магазины тканей . А также рядом находится одна из самых популярных улиц Стамбула, Нишанташи,где вы окунётесь в атмосферу ресторанов и шоппинга. Район безопасен для туристов в любое время суток.

name: ❤️Economic✔Free Wifi✔Bedroom✔3 min İstiklal Street
summary: Our flat is for tourists, students, families and travellers.  Very close to heart of İstiklal Street in Pera. You will find all necessary home appliences in there such as  ✔unlimited wi-fi ✔TV with ✔full satellite over 800 channels , ✔refrigerator, ✔washing machine, ✔electric boiler, ✔toast machine ✔hair dryer✔iron, etc . There are also small markets around the area for your requirements.
space: Pera is one of the most antique town of İstanbul which is mostly related to 19th century architectural. You can see post modern buildings around the area with a walking distance to the flat. Subway ststem and public trasportations are nearby as well.

reviews.comments: I had a great stay at this apartment! The location was perfect and the house itself was comfortable but what I liked the most was the hospitality and friendliness of the host. Also important to me was that he was easy to reach and quickly responded to any of my questions. Being the first guest ever to stay at his place, I did give him some (small) tips on how to improve the place and he was very thankful for that - another indication that he is a wonderful host.
House is very close to İstiklal Street, easy to arrive there. It has large living room and bedroom. Bora were always happy to help. Highly recommend the place.

Bora’s apartment is an excellent value because it is so large and so close to the nightlife around Taksim. The apartment has all the essentials and has two really long comfortable couches perfect for lounging after a day walking around the city. It is a short walk from this area but feels very untouristy. The local bakery, restaurants and grocery market are excellent. 

Bora was a really gracious host who met us at the apartment, gave us shopping recommendations, and checked in via text during our stay to make sure all was well. I would definitely stay here again!

Ideal, wonderful, location. 3,4 minute walk from Istiklal, about 7 minutes from Taksim. Grocery store just a walk of 30 seconds away. 

The wifi wasn't working for the first two days of my stay but Bora was on his feet about getting it fixed immediately and I couldn't have appreciated it more. It was out of his control as well. 

Not recommended for those who can't walk much or uphill. The entire downtown, in fact much of Istanbul is hilly with steep roads.

He waited for almost two hours after my decided check in to receive me, and he was also accommodating to keep my extra luggage safe with him while I tour the rest of Turkey. These little things matter the most to me. 

I wish I'd gotten to spend time with the host and gotten to know him but I know it's not the last I will see of him and his place. 

Can't thank Bora enough. He's  a wonderful, wonderful host with unparalleled hospitality and I absolutely love his place! :)
Good location, punctual host, quick reply. We were satisfied
De mon arrivée à mon depart Bora c'est montré disponible et bienveillant. L'appartement est spatieux et conforme à la description, commerce en bas du bâtiment, je recommande.
Bora is good host! And appartment is good! I'm realy enjoy my time.

great location great area of Istanbul for taking fotos and reaching to the most famous streets in Istanbul. Bora is an amazing person and contactable is just fantastic. 
we were very happy to stay at this apartment . looking forward

Very good location, quiet and calm, but really close to Istiklal street and Taksim where life doesn't stop for a minute. You can use shuttle to arrive from the both airports. Apartment offers good value, it is small but roomy (we lived five together), clean and comfortable enough, wi-fi works. Keep in mind that there can be a bit cold in winter. Bora is very friendly host, he was always on the line and helped us with all issues we had.
Il fallait demander si l ascenseur fonctionne car l appartement il est au 4 eme etage en plus il est loin de la place taxim une bonne côte a monter.

Great location and was greeted by Bora to check in. Issue with kitchen light was dealt with. Apartment had everything needed for my 2 week stay. Only downside for me was the lift not working (I’m so unfit) would recommend and stay there again :)

name: Great House in a calm neighborhood
summary: Come to Rio and stay in a village house located in Vila Isabel, just a few minutes walking to Maracana and subway. Near supermarket, pubs, mall and bakery, the house is in a lovely wooded and quiet street. It’s a nice airy and large house.
space: Near supermarket, pubs, mall, bakery and commerce, the house is in a lovely wooded and quiet street. It’s a nice airy and large house with great neighborhood where you can enjoy with your family and friends. In the first floor there is a garage with a shower and bikes. In the second floor there is a living room with a 42'' and cable TV, home theater, air conditioner, a dining room with a table for six, one couple bedroom with a private bathroom, two single bedrooms with 2 beds and air conditioner in each one, another bathroom and a fully equipped kitchen. In the third floor there is a small laundry and another bathroom.

notes: Excellent Location =============== Vila Isabel is located in a central part of the city considered to be in the North Zone. It's near downtown and has many pubs and options of public transportation (subway, taxis and buses to all areas of the city). Distances ======= • Pubs - 12 min walk / 1 km • Mall (Tijuca Shopping Center) – 13 min walk / 1 km • Subway (Sãens Pena Station) - 18 min walk / 1,4 km • Maracanã Stadium - 18 min walk / 1,5 km  • Bakery / Snack bar (Padaria Arte & Pão and others) - 4 min walk / 300 m • Extra Boulevard Supermarket - 5 min walk / 400 m • Merkofruit Mini Market - 4 min walk / 300 m • Downtown - 13 min car / 20 min subway / 8,6km • Copacabana - 17 min car / 30 min subway / 13,9km • Ipanema - 19 min car / 35 min subway / 14,8km

house_rules: ILLEGAL ACTIVITIES: Use of illegal drugs, prostitution and parties will NOT be allowed in the property. TENANT CONDUCT: Quiet hours will be from 10 pm to 8 am. During quiet hours radios and stereos may be played at a level not to be heard outside of the house. PROPERTY DAMAGE: Damage caused by the behavior of a Tenant, or a Tenant’s guest, will be repaired with the Tenant’s expenses. KEYS AND ACCESS TO THE HOUSE: We will meet the guest at the apartment on check-in and hand over the keys. It is the Tenant’s responsibility to return them at check-out. If there are not guess arriving I`m very flexible with the check in and check out. It is allowed to smoke, bring pets except cats.

name: In the center of Barcelona!!!

neighborhood_overview: The condo is located in the heart of Kaanapali beach resort area framed by Kaanapali Golf Course, flowering plumeria trees and palm trees. Next door starts the ocean boardwalk – enjoy sunset walks or morning strolls along the boardwalk.  Enjoy a short walk (12 mins) to Whaler’s Village shops, restaurants and major hotels from the Hyatt to Sheraton.  The Kaanapali Trolley stops by our hotel and  services the major hotels in the Kaanapali Beach Resort area. Walk to Kaanapali Beach or our exclusive beachfront clubhouse with full kitchen, 2 outdoor showers, beach towels, chairs, recliners and ice machine.  Or if you don’t want to walk to Kaanapali beach, enjoy a courtesy golf cart ride to from Front Desk to beachfront clubhouse, getting to beach never got easier or quicker – how easy is that! Grocery store is a few miles either direction from the resort.  Downtown Lahaina is a 5 minute drive heading east and Kapalua is 10 minute drive heading west.
transit: If you have a rental car, onsite parking structure is available.. Parking permit issued upon check in and included in daily resort fee.  Kaanapali Trolley services the Kaanpali beach resort area and stops in front of our resort.   City bus also available nearby.
access: This privately-owned lovely condo with own entrance comes equipped with  a private kitchen (pots, pans, utensils, coffee pot (not pods), basic spices), private oversize bathroom and private patio.  Resort shared amenities include 3 pools, jacuzzi,  , gas bbqs, shuffle board, bocce ball, beachfront clubhouse amenities  include full kitchen, 2 outdoor showers,  beach towels, beach chairs,ice machine. Once you have checked in at the Front Desk and pay the check in fee and daily resort fee, the Front Desk will issue a parking permit and electronic card key as well as wifi login instructions.   Check in 4 pm or later and checkout 11 am.  Front desk hours 6 am to 10pm.  Late night arrivals after 10 pm is okay and instructions will be provided. Just let us know of late arrival.
interaction: If there are questions about the unit specifically, we are available to address any questions by sending us a message.  Any questions about the resort, feel free to ask the Front Desk.  Onsite maintenance is available as well to address any service issues, however takes 1- 2 days to schedule for service. Onsite concierge daily at 8:30 am by the Front Desk offers an island overview, some snacks, and assistance with activities bookings.
house_rules: 1. Nightly rate does NOT include Hawaii tax of 14.416%. Once the balance is paid in full, please email me and a request for taxes will be sent via the Airbnb resolution center. 2. Payable to the FRONT DESK UPON CHECK-IN: $60 check in fee, $17 daily resort fee. Daily resort fee includes onsite parking (whether you have a car or not), wifi (login details given on welcome sheet by Front Desk), 3 pools, gas bbq by the pools, golf cart ride to/from Front Desk to Beachfront Clubhouse - full kitchen, beach towels/chairs, 2 outdoors showers and onsite bathroom. 3.  SECURITY DEPOSIT: $300 security deposit are charged via Airbnb should a claim be made after guest checkout.  The unit is inspected after departure. A claim can include extra cleaning required, damages, stains or if the departure checklist is not completed (remove all trash including fridge items, start dishwasher/unload, sand left on the floor, start 1 load of towels in the washder/dryer if time permits) 4. NO PETS ALLOWED. 5. NO SM

name: Kanai A Nalu # 215
summary: On the southern edge of the isthmus that forms Maui’s Central Valley, lies a thriving yet tranquil community: Ma’alaea, population 352, plus or minus. This intriguing corner of Maui includes a bustling boat harbor offering excursions that range from whale and dolphin watches to snorkel and snuba adventures to romantic dinner and sunset sails to chartered fishing expeditions.
space: Adjacent to the Marina are the Ma’alaea Harbor Shops, including The Maui Ocean Center Aquarium (voted Maui’s nbr.1 attraction), The Maui Golf and Sport Park for mini golf, water bumper boats, extreme trampoline and rock climbing, and various shops, restaurants, and a gas station. And then, tucked away off the main roads, on a secluded dead-end road named Hauoli Street (Hawaiian for Happy Street), you’ll find a small community of laid-back direct oceanfront resorts. This is the territory of Ma’alaea Bay Realty & Rentals, where we have the ideal Maui Vacation Rental for you. Our resorts face Ma’alaea Bay straight-on and have widespread, nothing peek-a-boo about them coastline views that extend down to the Makena cinder cone, up the heights of Haleakala, and that sweep out across the bay to the sunken volcanic cinder cone of Molokini Crater and our neighbor island, Kaho'olawe. Superb. Our condo rental units are in the affordable Makani A Kai, Hono Kai, Kanai A Nalu, Ma’alaea Banyans, Isla
description: On the southern edge of the isthmus that forms Maui’s Central Valley, lies a thriving yet tranquil community: Ma’alaea, population 352, plus or minus. This intriguing corner of Maui includes a bustling boat harbor offering excursions that range from whale and dolphin watches to snorkel and snuba adventures to romantic dinner and sunset sails to chartered fishing expeditions. Adjacent to the Marina are the Ma’alaea Harbor Shops, including The Maui Ocean Center Aquarium (voted Maui’s nbr.1 attraction), The Maui Golf and Sport Park for mini golf, water bumper boats, extreme trampoline and rock climbing, and various shops, restaurants, and a gas station. And then, tucked away off the main roads, on a secluded dead-end road named Hauoli Street (Hawaiian for Happy Street), you’ll find a small community of laid-back direct oceanfront resorts. This is the territory of Ma’alaea Bay Realty & Rentals, where we have the ideal Maui Vacation Rental for you. Our resorts face Ma’alaea Bay straight-on

description: Hotel Pierre Loti, in Sultanahmet, welcomes its guests through its open doors with a flourish of reknowned Turkish hospitality in the heart of a city where east and west collide. Our grandiose hotel in the "Special Class" service category was first r The Pierre Loti Hotel is located on Divan Yolu street within walking distance of such historical and major city sights as St. Sophia (Aya Sophia/Hagia Sophia), The Blue (Sultanahmet) Mosque, The Cistern Basilica (Yerebatan Cistern), Topkapi Palace, The Grand Bazaar (Kapalicarsi) and (Spice bazaar) Misir Carsisi. Once described as the Way of Kings, Divan Yolu is an ancient road used by empirical leaders as a route into the Old City and its palaces, divides the historical peninsula down the middle and leads guests directly from the hotel into the heart of Sultanahmet.

name: Breezy mountain home near the heart of Honolulu
summary: Spacious plantation-style home in beautiful Palolo Valley. Two queen-sized beds, a full kitchen, and 1.5 bathrooms. Lush yards surround this home to give it a private, local feel. Wifi, laundry, and parking are all included!
space: **Please read the entire ad before booking** This breezy two-bedroom house is perfect for those who want to be close to all Honolulu has to offer without being bothered by all the hustle and bustle. Located in beautiful, lush Palolo Valley and surrounded by private yards with a view of Diamond Head, this spot is prime for relaxation.  We have WiFi and a internet TV and HboGo for your viewing pleasure. Both bedrooms have super comfy queen sized mattresses. Plenty of space for you and your family or friends in the large living room and kitchen **Note: We do NOT have a working built-in oven, but we do have a range, microwave, and countertop convection oven. There is a jack-and-jill bathroom with a large shower/bath and an attached half bath. The best part about this space is that it is surrounded your own large private yard. You have plenty of outside space to enjoy as well as not being crowded up against the neighbors — a rare thing in Honolulu!  This space isn't the luxurious (and crowd
description: Spacious plantation-style home in beautiful Palolo Valley. Two queen-sized beds, a full kitchen, and 1.5 bathrooms. Lush yards surround this home to give it a private, local feel. Wifi, laundry, and parking are all included! **Please read the entire ad before booking** This breezy two-bedroom house is perfect for those who want to be close to all Honolulu has to offer without being bothered by all the hustle and bustle. Located in beautiful, lush Palolo Valley and surrounded by private yards with a view of Diamond Head, this spot is prime for relaxation.  We have WiFi and a internet TV and HboGo for your viewing pleasure. Both bedrooms have super comfy queen sized mattresses. There is a jack-and-jill bathroom with a large shower/bath and an attached half bath. The best part about this s
neighborhood_overview: The drive down the valley to the main drag is no problem and the Main Street has a world class liquor store with poke, cheese. (Tamura’s). Long’s and Times grocery store are right there. Fun restaurants...Korean, Thai, New American, Zippy, McDonalds, plus public library and community park, fabric store, Kahala Mall, and much more nearby. Farmers market at nearby Kapiolani Community College. Close to Kahala beach, secluded and only good at low tide. Close by car to Honolulu zoo and Waikiki. Halfway to Hanauma Bay.
notes: No smoking or pets allowed. No pets on property but neighbors have a few dogs in their yard as well as wild chickens nearby. This is a quiet neighborhood, so this is not a suitable place for a lot of noise. No big groups, no parties. This is a classic Hawaii home, meaning there may be some geckos, bugs, and wild chickens around. There are a few chickens that sometimes pass through the yard. It's a very clean home and we generally have no issues, but it can be a surprise for our mainland guests! Please check out on time, as we need to prepare the space for our next guests.  Overstay fees will be charged at a rate of $25/hour.
access: This two-bedroom space is attached to our downstairs living area but has two private entrances. The laundry is also located outside in the downstairs parking area. We have parking on-site as well as plenty of street parking.
interaction: As much or as little as you prefer. We live downstairs and will generally be around. You’ll have your own space and we respect that you’ll probably want your privacy to enjoy your time here. You’ll be able to access our home with keyless locks, so you can self check-in. However, we LOVE living in Hawaii and would be happy to point you in the right direction for some local sights, food, and tips for getting the most out of your stay, if that’s what you like. Most likely, you’ll have minimal interaction with us unless you want to. Just let us know and we’ll be happy to accommodate you in anyway we can!  We will enter the property at check out time to prepare for our next guests, so please check out on time or we may charge and overstay fee.
house_rules: This is a cozy family home and we have many wonderful neighbors. Please treat them and the house with respect. •	No pets. •	No outside visitors or overnight guests without prior approval. •	No parties. •	Quiet hours are between 10pm and 8am. •	If you break or damage something, please let me know and arrange for replacement or repair. •	Do not leave out any food that will invite pests. Our home is pest-free and we’d like to keep it that way with your help :)

reviews.comments: Very nice clean and breezy. Well located. Easy access to Waikiki and major highways. We had a great stay.

We were very healed at a wonderful location and a clean space.

Host was also very nice people and enjoyed comfortable Hawaii.

When I went to Hawaii I wanted to stay here again.

This was the most amazing Airbnb I have ever stayed at and I am a regular. It is in a wonderful residential area that gives a great feel of how middle class families live on Oahu. Light, sunny, airy — views of neighboring valley and hillsides on both sides. It is a comfortable two bedroom home with bright open spaces, decorated simply. Great kitchen, real dining table for 4 and comfortable living room. 1 full bathroom (not thru bedroom) plus 1 extra toilet off one of the bedrooms. The drive down the valley to the main drag is no problem and the Main Street has a world class liquor store with poke, cheese. (Tamura’s). Long’s and Times grocery store are right there. Fun restaurants...Korean, Thai, New American, Zippy, McDonalds, plus public library and community park, fabric store, Kahala Mall, and much more nearby. Farmers market at nearby Kapiolani Community College. Close to Kahala beach, secluded and only good at low tide. Close by car to Honolulu zoo and Waikiki. Halfway to Hanauma Bay.  No need for A/C or heaters.  Use Palolo ave from Waialae straight up to house for best view/drive. My 88 year old mom who is very picky approved highly! The roosters are just part of Hawaii and ear plugs were provided but I didn’t use them!  Okay, only possible downside but this is Hawaii—one bedroom facing the street hears traffic during evening because windows are wide open for wonderful breeze. I would stay here for a few months or days easily!!!
The House was perfect! The perfect amount of space you feel like your at home here!

Overall this was a nice place to stay.  Also a good price.  It is up a valley, right next to a main road.  Jessica and Sarah were great hosts.  They communicated well.  The house was spotless; very clean.  We were left by ourselves, which was nice.  We met Sarah when we first arrived, and she was very nice.  They did lots of little things to make us feel like we were in a real hotel.  The house is pretty spacious - it has 2 bedrooms, 2 private toilets and a nice big shower.  The living room is also nice. There was one issue, my wife could not sleep on the back bed, because it dipped low.  We moved to the front room and slept there.
Great place, clean, and close to beaches. I would recommend to a friend.

Jessica had are stay all prepped and ready for us, was quick to communicate and truly created a clean and friendly place to stay while visited the island. The location was a great as it was close but just out of town.

We  really enjoyed our stay here. The house was spotless and pest free. The beds were very comfortable. We appreciated the snorkel gear and beach umbrella, and used it several times! They have a washer/dryer available, which was super helpful. Sarah was very communicative and quick to respond to any questions we had. I highly recommend staying here!

This home is fabulous. Clean, uncluttered and breezy, located in Palolo Valley in a cool residential area. You really get the feel of living on the Island rather than being a tourist.  The house comes with all things needed to enjoy the beautiful Hawaiian beaches, towels, chairs and umbrella. We wish we could bring this bungalow back to  CA with us. Thanks Sarah and Jessica!

Jessica was a terfific host, easy to communicate with and very responsive to our request to provide beach chairs. Her unit was exactly as described, clean and comfortable. Good location within a few minutes drive to Waikiki beach as well as major freeway to travel to other parts of Oahu.

The place is spacious with living room and kitchen key utensils,  two separate spacious bedrooms and conveniently organized bathroom with movable door screen that separate it into two private parts  so two available WC can be used privately and simultaneously. It indeed is breezy full with Hawaiian aloha air.  It is great for those guests  that need a base in  quiet safe neighborhood area from where your can go into adventures by car and HW 1  is very near. Quiet means quiet so not for those that plan to party or be loud late in the night as quiet time is after 10 pm and sound spreads easily in those plantation type houses on the hill.  It is 20 min drive from the Waikiki and that is what we did not realize when looking at the map so our personal preference next time would be to be closer to the beach so that you can walk to it rather then drive and struggle finding parking.  Jess was available for questions any time and responded very quickly.  Checking in and out went very smoothly.

notes: -Checking in time is after 3PM and Check out time is before 11AM We can try to accommodate an earlier check in or a later check out ONLY if there are no bookings before and/or after your booking. When there is booking before and/or after, we only have a 4 hour window to clean and prepare the unit for the next guest.  The cleaning staff does not live in the building. -Please DO NOT use our white bath towels as cleaning rags. We have lost about 10 of them due to guests using our towels as rags in the past 3 months. We do not like charging our guests with anything that is damaged. So, please help us to keep the place economical for everyone. Please use the paper towels provided to clean. If need be, please use the beach towels provided.
transit: Walking around is wonderful since you are along the ocean and near shops. You can also rent a car to drive around Maui. It is centrally located to literally everywhere! 15 to 20 min to Kahului where the big chain stores and the airport are located and 40 min to historical downtown Lahaina.
access: You will be automatically checked in on your scheduled arrival date.  We will send your digital code for accessing the unit before your arrival date.  Upon arrival, you are requested to register at the front office, so that you can receive a parking pass and other welcome information (don’t worry – there are no timeshare presentations here!).
interaction: I am available to answer any questions via text during your stay. I do not generally travel to Kihei unless need be. However, I will do my best to help if there is ever any personal emergency.

reviews.comments: This condo is outstanding in every way: beautiful location, every amenity you could want with onsite security, an elevator, BBQ area, tennis court, swimming pools, a very comfortable bed, washer & dryer, lovely floors PLUS a block from the ocean with a view from the lanai and close to stores... what else could you want? NOTHING!!! Take advantage of this exceptional unit!!!

It was awesome experience to stay in Mei & Iris’s place. The host, location and facilities were all A+.
I wished to stay longer but unfortunately it was booked before i re book.
Great place! Highly recommend!
Fantastic place. Sparkling clean with plenty of amenities for going to the beach.
Awesome place to stay, super close to everything. Has AC in living room and bedroom , wich is a must. Everything was as advertised!

The condo was the perfect home to return to after activities. We were out the entire day, every day while we were in Maui. We also made use of the extensive tips, for food and activities,  provided by Mei and they were spot on! Centrally located and also walking distance to the beach.
Mei and Iris were very quick to respond and their place was as advertised.
Nicely updated with air conditioning and nice roku tvs. Good location with a beach just across the street

Great location and great place. Kitchen was well equipped and we were able to cook most of our meals at home. Located with close proximity to beach, fun restaurants and supermarkets. Communication with Mei & Iris was easy. They also provided beach towels, bag, chairs etc, which made it very comfortable to check-in to the place and head to the beach. Also, it was sparkling clean! And towels were very soft (perhaps new).
Thanks for being a great host! We had a wonderful stay :)

Very cute and perfect location.  Very clean and  well organized. Offers a  binder of things to do, places to see, and things to eat this came in so handy. Lovely beach across the street. Definitely would recommend to anyone staying on Maui.
Place was very clean and nice.  Would recommend

Had an amazing stay at this Airbnb! Check in was a breeze and everything was exactly as how it was stated in the posting. Apartment is spotless and has a lot of great amenities. We really appreciated having beach chairs, beach towels, boogie boards, and a portable cooler at our disposal. Having A/C in both the living room and bedroom was really great. There was also a small in unit washer and dryer. Would highly recommend staying here !

We stayed at Mei and Iris's place for 3 nights. The place was very comfortable, clean and the locations was great as well. 2 min walk to a beautiful beach and lots of restaurants and shops in walking distance. Mei & Iris always got back to me right away and gave us lots of good tips for Maui. We would stay at their place again.
Great location!  Lots to do and great beaches within walking distance.  Would definitely stay here again.  Excellent beach amenities (boards, towels, chairs) as well for those that need them.

name: Vista - 2 Bedroom Beach Front Apartment in Dee Why
summary: Blackbird Escapes offers you their latest beachside property, Dee Why Vista, a sun-drenched two-bedroom apartment located in the popular beachside suburb of Dee Why.
space: Dee Why Visa is situated on a quiet, tree-lined street surrounded by nature reserves and parks and is only moments from the beach making it a perfect spot to enjoy your beach holiday.   As you open the doors to this peaceful, modern apartment you will be captivated by the expansive views all the way to Long Reef Headland.  The open plan living space has floor to ceiling windows which lead out on to the balcony overlooking the leafy aspect of the surrounding neighbourhood and the spectacular coastal views. neighborhood_overview: Dee Why is a coastal suburb and one of the main centres of the northern beaches region.  The perfect spot to enjoy all the attractions for a carefree, beachside getaway with picnic areas, ocean pools and the Bicentennial Coastal Walkway with its extensive walking track right on your doorstep.   If you are looking for some retail therapy there are plenty of shopping centres, village shops, cafes, restaurants and bars overlooking Dee Why beach all within easy access whether on foot, car or public transport.

reviews.comments: This was my first time booking a property on (Hidden by Airbnb) and after staying at Dee Why Vista, it definitely will not be my last!  I absolutely adored the apartment, it is in such a perfect location and so family friendly.  We booked a last minute trip to Sydney to visit some friends who live in the Northern Beaches and are so glad we booked this apartment.  My kids loved all the toys and being able to run downstairs and play at the park that is right next to the apartment.  It was wonderful to have such a short walk to the beach and most of our time was spent here.  The kitchen is extremely well stocked and we really enjoyed being able to use the BBQ and spend time out on the balcony.  The local’s guide was really useful in planning our trip and our communication with the host was fast, easy and reliable.  I highly recommend this apartment and can’t wait to stay again.

Don t hesitate. It s a wonderful place to stay.
Very good situation in front of the beach, close to supermarkets, restaurants and bus stops.
The appartement is spacious, fully equipped, very clean  and quiet.
You arrive there, you unpack your bags and you are home.
If you have questions, you just give a phone call and Jodie gives you the answer.
No private parking but personally I had no problem to find a place for my car in the appartement street .
My family and I were there for 4 days. If one day I come back to Sydney, without hesitation I will stay at Lyn’s place.
Natacha

A bright & airy apartment with everything you need to have a relaxing beach holiday. With amazing views of Dee Why beach & shore front restaurants a 2 min walk away. The apartment is beautifully decorated & well appointed. Coles & Woolworths at the end of the street. Will definitely be back!

name: A super clean sweet unit in a perfect location
summary: A beautiful classic style apartment with a spectacular view in the middle of a lovely and popular neighbourhood (Monkland avenue). You have your private room and bathroom, and you can use the living room, kitchen and other common spaces of the home. We invite you to a tea in our balcony. there is a bus stop right in front of the building which takes you to the metro in 5 minuets, by walk it takes 15 minutes to the metro. Tones of popular bars and restaurants attract montrealers to our street:)
space: Our space is a warm and cozy unit, which everyone fall in love with after coming over  there are massive windows all over the home which make it bright. You see a lot of green in our place
description: A beautiful classic style apartment with a spectacular view in the middle of a lovely and popular neighbourhood (Monkland avenue). You have your private room and bathroom, and you can use the living room, kitchen and other common spaces of the home. We invite you to a tea in our balcony. there is a bus stop right in front of the building which takes you to the metro in 5 minuets, by walk it takes 15 minutes to the metro. Tones of popular bars and restaurants attract montrealers to our street:) Our space is a warm and cozy unit, which everyone fall in love with after coming over  there are massive windows all over the home which make it bright. You see a lot of green in our place  You have your own private room with a desk/table, two chairs, a bed, a couch and hangers. There is a bathroom just for you which we don’t use it. You have access to the living room, TV, Netflix, wifi, kitchen and fridge. You can cook your own meal and use the dishes. You can also use our iron and hair dryer. T
neighborhood_overview: Av de Monkland is really lively calm and safe, and it’s so popular in Montréal  for its night life. There are a lot of bars and restaurants where you can eat at,  you can enjoy an evening or morning walk in this energetic atmosphere. There are banks, drugstores, and grocery shops close to our place ( max 10 minuets walk)
notes: there are 8 standard stairs at the entrance of the building.
transit: First Public transportation  Second Public transportation  Third by car !!!
access: You have your own private room with a desk/table, two chairs, a bed, a couch and hangers. There is a bathroom just for you which we don’t use it. You have access to the living room, TV, Netflix, wifi, kitchen and fridge. You can cook your own meal and use the dishes. You can also use our iron and hair dryer. The laundry (washing machine and dryer) are inside the unit. ———————————————-  **** We give you a safety box in your room to keep your belongings****
interaction: All of us ( my husband, our 22 year old son, and I) love interacting with guests, listen to their stories and socializing with them, off course if they are interested. However, If you are reserved, and you don’t like talking so much we respect you. We only care about your comfort during your stay. I am at home most often, but if I’m not and you need something you can always contact my son and I by phone.
house_rules: NO SHOES in the home! Take off you shoes right after you enter the home. ——————————————————— You MUST do the dieshs if you use them. ——————————————————— this is a clean and nice place, and we like to keep it clean, so please try to keep the place nicely. ———————————————————— *** We provide you with clean slippers in the washroom, so make sure to put them on inside the washroom.

reviews.comments: It is a beautiful place to live in a beautiful city,host are very helpful and supportive,reply was quick,quided me with city tour and breakfast was amazing.would love to stay again there.

房间地理位置很好,离旺角地铁站E2口最近｡周边到处是万宁屈臣氏卓悦和莎莎,适合购物｡还有椰汁大王^_^(很好喝!)房间性价比也很高哦,节假日这个价格一开始让我有点害怕(环境杂乱 不安全之类orz)到了之后完全出乎预期!可能因为新装修,房间很整洁,干净,虽然小小的,但该有的设施都有(空调 吹风机 独立卫浴 电视机 …)还贴心地准备了两个转换插头哦!点赞!楼下有管理处,很安全｡
总之!除了对旺角各大街道错综复杂地图都不准的路况感到烦恼外,对这次的hk之旅非常满意~感谢房东嘻嘻
叔叔阿姨人都超好 位置特别好找!!
老闆人很nice哦,服務又好,棒棒噠
very nice
比想象中好,位置超级便利,楼下就可以把全部东西买完

1､交通很方便,地铁站和巴士站都很近｡(系统定位是错的,直接导航走到了另外一个地方,建议在旺角地铁站E2出口出来再导航“荣华大楼”)
2､阿叔阿姐都很热情,服务很好｡
3､房间虽小,东西都齐全了,排插上每个插口都插好了转换器,很贴心｡
4､卫生间小,但是不影响使用,花洒水流还是很大的,洗得比较舒服｡
5､房间是新装修的,收拾得也比较干净｡
6､购物特别特别特别方便,一出门就可以一站式购齐,各种莎莎卓越万宁全在一条街｡
7､刷卡进门,安全性比旁边的小旅馆高一些,虽然在闹市,但是隔音效果很好,晚上睡觉也不会吵｡
总之,下次来还会选择这里的^_^
没
很好

第一次住香港的民宿 
但是不得不稱讚一下這一家
首先民宿所處的地理位置極佳 一下樓就是旺角最繁華的街區之一 交通便利
其次就是老闆的熱情的態度讓我在這次旅程中留下了深刻的印象 入住時也非常耐心地和我們說明入住須知
下次還會再來!!!!預祝生意興隆!

希望改進的地方:
1.熱水系統有待提高 冷熱交替的讓人猝不及防
2.床單仍然有些許不乾淨
It’s clean and quiet. Better than other budget hotel.

name: 尖沙咀·舒適4人房【友格調 House】&近美麗華廣場·紅磡體育館·The one
summary: 室內主要參考歐美裝修風格,使用暗沉灰色為主題,可以使旅客住得更加舒適 香港,寸金呎土的地方,有幾個地方的房價是特別貴的,就包括本公寓的尖沙咀,一般普通的酒店和賓館,都是剩出的空間都是非常小,甚至旅行者進去行李箱都打不開,但是我們的房間,空間利用率不僅高,而且騰出更多的空間給各位旅行者打開行李箱｡ 交通:本公寓屬於尖沙咀地段, 地鐵方面:公寓紅磡站,尖沙咀站,佐敦站的三站中間點,步行過去三個站都是10分鐘左右｡ 機場過來:可以乘搭機場快線然後轉免費巴士下車步行只需50米,或者可以直接坐機場巴士到站步行也只需50米 周邊:尖沙咀繁華地段,樓下有各種各樣的韓國餐廳,想到紅磡體育館步行過去只需要10分鐘,還有海港城,國際廣場,維多利亞港港,全部步行过去都不远
space: 房源内有一个洗衣室,但是那里因为是清洁住的,所以一般是不开放,住宿三天或者三天以上的可以要求一次免费洗衣(不包括干衣,免费次数按住宿灵活调动),干衣可以到楼下洗衣店干
description: 室內主要參考歐美裝修風格,使用暗沉灰色為主題,可以使旅客住得更加舒適 香港,寸金呎土的地方,有幾個地方的房價是特別貴的,就包括本公寓的尖沙咀,一般普通的酒店和賓館,都是剩出的空間都是非常小,甚至旅行者進去行李箱都打不開,但是我們的房間,空間利用率不僅高,而且騰出更多的空間給各位旅行者打開行李箱｡ 交通:本公寓屬於尖沙咀地段, 地鐵方面:公寓紅磡站,尖沙咀站,佐敦站的三站中間點,步行過去三個站都是10分鐘左右｡ 機場過來:可以乘搭機場快線然後轉免費巴士下車步行只需50米,或者可以直接坐機場巴士到站步行也只需50米 周邊:尖沙咀繁華地段,樓下有各種各樣的韓國餐廳,想到紅磡體育館步行過去只需要10分鐘,還有海港城,國際廣場,維多利亞港港,全部步行过去都不远 房源内有一个洗衣室,但是那里因为是清洁住的,所以一般是不开放,住宿三天或者三天以上的可以要求一次免费洗衣(不包括干衣,免费次数按住宿灵活调动),干衣可以到楼下洗衣店干 房屋内所有区域都可以使用 希望可以和旅客分享旅游经验和真人真事,帮助旅客到此地旅游更省心 离红磡体育馆,香港理工大学,香港历史博物馆,科技馆最近,其次就是到海港城,国际商场,SOGO崇光百货等 在尖沙咀附近活动的建议步行,香港搭的士24元起步,放一点行李也要加钱,去天星码头也是推荐步行,可以到海港城逛完在彩妆区出然后到码头附近 房屋内绝对不允许吸烟,包括在房间内
neighborhood_overview: 离红磡体育馆,香港理工大学,香港历史博物馆,科技馆最近,其次就是到海港城,国际商场,SOGO崇光百货等
notes: 房屋内绝对不允许吸烟,包括在房间内

access: 房屋内所有区域都可以使用
interaction: 希望可以和旅客分享旅游经验和真人真事,帮助旅客到此地旅游更省心
house_rules: 保持房間整潔,小孩子必須穿好紙尿褲,弄髒被芯床墊需另外收取清潔費,室內嚴謹吸煙,違者重罰

address.street: 尖沙咀, 九龍, Hong Kong

reviews.comments: 房间很干净,位置不错哦~房东回复得很快,中间出了点小小的问题,房东也积极帮忙很快解决了. 推荐.
good
位置好,出行方便,房东很好沟通｡
位置超级便利,离尖沙咀､红磡､佐敦地铁站都很近｡房间也非常干净,性价比很高,推荐入住
房东是个帅气的小哥哥,房间也是很棒,就是卫生间是真的小,不过在香港寸土寸金这样已经很棒了!性价比挺高的,地理位置算还好,到地铁站要走七八分钟,地铁站附近要啥有啥,下次有要在去,也会优先考虑这家!!
位置很不错,去很多地方都蛮方便的,而且在香港这样寸土寸金的地方,性价比非常高了~
每个房间包括大门都是密码锁,还是比较安全的｡一开始的房间出了一些问题,和房东交流之后马上可以更换,这一点真的很棒!一张床睡两个女生绰绰有余了,性价比还是很高的｡周围吃的地方很多,离商圈和地铁站也很近,可以步行去维港｡
其实红磡过去差不多要十五二十分钟,忘了过马路兜了一大圈天桥很绝望不过位置其实就在尖沙咀,离九龙大药房很近~可从尖沙咀B2出来按导航走到皇悦酒店就可以了｡
房间设施都可以的,只是床板太硬訓得唔舒服｡交通地点方便快捷,近the one｡
还可以吧
位置跟描述的一致,距离红磡､佐敦站挺近的,尖沙咀稍微得走多几步｡民宿楼下就有7-11便利店,很方便｡附近也有吃的店面｡联系Todd时,很快就回复,给我的路线图很好找,大门和房间门都是密码锁,房间该有的东西都有,隔音一般,性价比高,满意(⁎⁍̴̛ᴗ⁍̴̛⁎)

name: Waialua Ocean View Oasis Condo! With AC!
summary: Your Hawaiian oasis awaits! Less than a 5 minute walk from the beach, and ocean views from your private lanai, set you up to enjoy the North Shore in this modern Hawaiian condo. Minutes from all the fabled North Shore has to offer. Historic Haleiwa town has unique dining and shopping options. Banzai Pipeline and Sunset Beach offer spectacular surfing for both surfers and spectators alike. Sharks Cove has pristine snorkeling and diving.
space: Large living space with full kitchen. Large window that leads out to your private lanai.  - 1 bedroom with king size bed. - Living room queen size punee (Hawaiian day bed). - 1 bathroom - Lanai  - Laundry  - Free parking space - split AC unit - close to bike path and bus stop
description: Your Hawaiian oasis awaits! Less than a 5 minute walk from the beach, and ocean views from your private lanai, set you up to enjoy the North Shore in this modern Hawaiian condo. Minutes from all the fabled North Shore has to offer. Historic Haleiwa town has unique dining and shopping options. Banzai Pipeline and Sunset Beach offer spectacular surfing for both surfers and spectators alike. Sharks Cove has pristine snorkeling and diving. Large living space with full kitchen. Large window that leads out to your private lanai.  - 1 bedroom with king size bed. - Living room queen size punee (Hawaiian day bed). - 1 bathroom - Lanai  - Laundry  - Free parking space - split AC unit - close to bike path and bus stop - All areas of the appartment. You won't see us unless you need help with something at the appartment Please call, text or email anytime! -There are plenty of options on the island if you would like to rent a car. And you will have a parking space reserved for you at your appartment
notes: We live in a quiet neighborhood, please be mindful of the neighbors and keep noise levels appropriate. No more than 4 people are allowed at the appartment.
transit: -There are plenty of options on the island if you would like to rent a car. And you will have a parking space reserved for you at your appartment.  - Waialua is very flat so it's a great place to ride a bike! There is a place to park and lock your bike in the parking lot, and we are close to the bike path.  - There is a bus stop conveniently located right next to the appartment building.
access: - All areas of the appartment.
interaction: You won't see us unless you need help with something at the appartment Please call, text or email anytime!
house_rules: - Leave shoes inside by the front door in the condo. - Always supervise  children on lanai. - Never throw anything over lanai. - Keep noise levels appropriate.

host.host_about: We are a young couple living and working on the North Shore of Oahu! Originally from the mainland, we fell in in love with Hawaii and love to share our little slice of paradise with other people! Let us know if we can answer any questions. We look forward to meeting you!

reviews.comments: Beautiful view, nice location and a block to the beach.  Nice park down the street!

Mycah & Joanna’s place is great. The living area and kitchen are brand new as are all the utensils, the bed is clean and comfortable and there are lots of clean new towels. The view is great from the front and the back and the flat itself is very peaceful and comfortable. The internet is also really fast. Exactly what my partner and I were looking for. I’d definitely stay here again and recommend it to anyone.
A great place to stay, you have a good view to the ocean. When there was an issue, they came and fix it in a reasonable time. We will come back again.

Awesome location in a quiet town, gives you a true local feel. Bed and pillows felt amazing! Couch was super comfy. Condo has a nice modern style, with thoughtful touches such as complimentary coffee, laundry detergent, bottled water as well as a Brita filtered water pitcher. In walking distance to the beach, the view from the balcony is awesome! I recommend waking up to watch the sunrise, it’s well worth it. Mycah and Joanna were very friendly and gave quick responses to questions on making recommendations on where to eat, and shop for groceries.

This condo more than met our expectations!  The view from the lanai over looking the ocean and beautiful sunsets is more than enough to make us recommend this place to anyone looking to stay on the North Shore.  The condo is situated in a very quiet neighborhood with a short walk to the beach.  We loved this location as a jumping off point for exploring the whole Island.

Cleanliness is always our number one concern when selecting where to stay on vacation and Mycah and Joanna's place exceeded our hopes.  From the bed linens to the bathroom to the kitchen set up, everything was really clean and new. The pictures are very accurate.

Having the AC in the living room really helped to cool the place down and made sleeping comfortable.

They have supplied everything you will need to have a great vacation stay including beach chairs, fully stocked kitchen, and there's even access to  grills! All the small touches were great including a bag of Hawaiian coffee, bottled water, and the little flowers spread through out the condo. 

We searched a really long time for a place to stay for our trip and cannot recommend this condo enough! We hope to get to stay here again on a future trip!
Great place, great location & wonderful hosts. Very comfortable, with all necessities.
Everything was A+++++. Quiet, basically on the beach and very comfortable. Felt like we had our own personal beach house. Perfect.

The place was great! The views off the lanai are the same as in the photos- no weird stretching or awkward angles to get those pictures- beautiful views. The apartment itself is clean and fresh smelling. Furniture and design are modern and updated with pretty Hawaiian touches. Beds are SO comfortable. 
Insider tip: There’s a small rinse station for dirty feet on the left side of the building as you come through the parking lot.

Our stay in Mycah & Joanna’s place was perfect! The condo had everything we needed, it was beautiful and tidy and has an incredible view of the beach. We hired a car to watch the billabong pro pipeline surfing on sunset beach, which is about a 15-20 min drive away! Mycah and Joanna were easy to contact and made everything very easy for us. We would definitely recommend it to anyone considering staying there 10/10
Nicely organized clean condo hospitalized by a kind young couple, and just 3 minutes from sandy beach and kids'park.  Perfect holiday spot for family with little kids like us!
Great place to stay in, nice and quiet. Everything was clean and we really enjoyed the beach chairs. Good value!

This place is a MUST!! Very responsive hosts and the condo is surrounded by very informative locals who are also so kind!! Condo was very clean and spacious with two beautiful views. 10 out of 10 would recommend.
The place was great! Exactly as described. It was a low key neighborhood in the north shore: close to the beach and a quick drive to both Waialua and Haleiwa.
The location is great. The room is cozy. Both check-in and check-out process were very smooth. And they have everything you need in the apartment! They even have two beach chairs and an umbrella.

We had a great stay at  Mycah & Joanna’s condo!Quite, clean and relaxing! Close to the beach.
Communication with Mycah & Joanna was polite and quickly.
Mahalo!

Mycah and Joanna’s place is great! Quiet and relaxing, yet close enough to all the action on the North Shore. Beds and pillows were super comfy and they provided a real hairdryer! Super important for someone like me! They were also very quick to respond when we had an issue with the tub. Would definitely recommend!

reviews.comments: Kadir is a great, responsive host.  The condo is clean and situated on the third level of a building located conveniently between Ataturk airport and Sultanahmet.   The condo has two kitchens and the rooms are spread on three levels.  The building has spiral stairs without elevators.  An excellent exercise for those who don't mind it.

Qadir is a kind  and  very responsible host. We had a great experience with him. 
The house is clean, with all amenities. The house has an excellent view to sea with a nice balcony and near to market. It has 3 floors with 2 kitchens and 2 saloons and 3 bedrooms.
Thank you Qadir.

Die 3-Stöckige Wohnung liegt in sehr Zentraler Lage und direkt vorm Haus findet man eine Bushaltestelle. Die Wohnung war sehr sauber und es hat uns an Nichts gefehlt. Wlan mit Netflix, Waschmaschine, Föhn Bügelbrett und vieles mehr. 
Kadir hat gefühlt jeden Tag nach uns gefragt und ist sehr hilfsbereit wenn man was braucht. Insgesamt war alles perfekt

Le quartier est agréable avec des petits commerces de proximité ainsi que le métro à 7m à pied. Vous apprécierez la disponibilité et l’accueil de Noémie et Nicolas.

name: Comfy & Leafy Miranda approx 5km to Cronulla Beach
summary: Stay in our basic but comfortable & clean granny flat (converted garage, detached from the house). We have a lovely private backyard, just a few kilometres from the beach, with transport nearby, & various tourist-worthy things that southern Sydney has to offer.  Other guests have enjoyed the homeliness, the leafy backyard, that they can enter the granny flat at night, without the need to go through the house & having their own, private space.
space: Granny flat styled accommodation, cheaper than the backpacker hostels charge and way cheaper than a hotel! It has been described as a good base! Features: - Private entry to the quiet granny flat at the rear of the house, there's solar lights if it's dark when you come home. - Lovely, large leafy backyard (with BBQ) for you to relax in after a day of exploring our amazing city - Shared kitchen in the main house which is fully equipped to prepare your meals   - Share the large, full bathroom with one other - you are welcome to watch TV and relax in the lounge room, or use the DVD and CD player in the granny flat. DVD's provided! The granny flat has a comfy single bed with fresh sheets. There is also a double fold out sofa bed if needed (standard rate is for one person. Extra person $12 per night, (paid upon arrival). - Laundry: washing machine and clothes line - Off-street parking  You will have plenty of privacy but we love having a chat. And if needed, we can make suggestions for plac
description: Stay in our basic but comfortable & clean granny flat (converted garage, detached from the house). We have a lovely private backyard, just a few kilometres from the beach, with transport nearby, & various tourist-worthy things that southern Sydney has to offer.  Other guests have enjoyed the homeliness, the leafy backyard, that they can enter the granny flat at night, without the need to go through the house & having their own, private space. Granny flat styled accommodation, cheaper than the backpacker hostels charge and way cheaper than a hotel! It has been described as a good base! Features: - Private entry to the quiet granny flat at the rear of the house, there's solar lights if it's dark when you come home. - Lovely, large leafy backyard (with BBQ) for you to relax in after a day of exploring our amazing city - Shared kitchen in the main house which is fully equipped to prepare your meals   - Share the large, full bathroom with one other - you are welcome to watch TV and relax in
neighborhood_overview: The area has lovely tree lined streets and there is lots of native bird life. Miranda is a suburb in southern Sydney, located 24 kilometres south of the Sydney central business district. You can look up local information on the internet for  'CRONULLA' + 'Royal National Park' to see some of the excellent Tourist Attractions nearby. The 'Sutherland Shire' is one of the cleanest, safest places to live in Sydney. The area is full of trees and therefore native birds. As this is a residential area, it is less cluttered than the city area. Parks and bushland are in close proximity to Miranda, so when you are back from exploring Sydney, you will be able to relax in peace. Miranda also has a huge shopping centre on The Kingsway. There's a smaller shopping centre with a Superbarn supermarket and various grocery shops located in Gymea right near the train station. Cronulla Beach – famous and only 5km drive away or a 7 mins train away Bundeena Ferry Ride – from Cronulla railway you can catch a fe
notes: I encourage you to read the profile carefully so you have a clear idea of what to expect, especially if you are new to Air BNB.  It is our preference to host guests who are fully verified with a form of Government Identification (ID) such as a license or passport and photo. No additional cleaning fee charged. No heavy drinkers please.
transit: A bus across the road takes you to Miranda railway station in 5 minutes or you can take a leisurely stroll to either Miranda or Gymea Railway station in about 15-20mins. Both are equal distance from the house. If we are free, we might even offer you a lift!  Trains to the city take about 43 mins (at peak times) or about 50 mins (at other times). The trains usually come approx. every 15 mins.  If you have a car, there are many lovely places to visit within an hours drive. For example, the Royal National Park is lovely for bush walking, a picnic, row-boat and bike hire (15 mins drive away) Check out 'Guest Resources' for directions from the airport to here.
access: Private access to the accommodation is via the driveway. When you arrive, I'll give you the key to access the main part of the house (for the bathroom, kitchen etc.).
interaction: We always try to meet and greet you. Otherwise, we'll leave a key for you. We are contactable by phone if and when necessary.  We are always happy to have a chat and provide you with information. If you'd like to keep to yourself, that's fine too!
house_rules: Smoking is is fine outside, on the back verandah. Normal expectations of respecting and looking after property.  In the interest of all, please clean up after yourself, no food or coffee in the room.  Wet towels should be hung up to dry, please remove shoes before walking on the carpet -  :) No heavy drinkers and no drugs.

host.host_about: You'll find that I'm a friendly, sociable and easy going person. I love travelling, discovering new places, live theatre, music of all sorts.

reviews.comments: Great location, close to services, spacious room and made to feel very welcome.

Hey Rhonda,
thank you so much for the perfect time we spent together at your place. Even your advices for everything where helpful. your knowledge about Sydney is awesome! Especially for New Years eve. 
We really appreciated your easy going way and will definitely not hesitate to book your homestay again when we are coming back to Sydney.

Thanks 
Sven and Florian

Rhonda welcomed me into her home with open arms from the very start. She went above and beyond to make my stay with her truly an unforgettable one. I felt like I found a home away from home when staying in her granny flat. She is a very kind woman who will make you feel comfortable and at peace when staying at her home, giving you a chance to really experience what Australian hospitality is truly like. She was helpful in guiding me towards the shopping center as well as highlighting the bus schedule for me, which definitely came in hand. I can't say enough about her and the willingness of help she gives. Whether it's locating sights to see, helping with jobs, or just making you feel safe and at home while staying with her you cannot go wrong choosing Rhonda when looking for accommodation. The area is pleasant, quite, and beautiful. It's very close to the shops and train station, there is also a bus stop outside the house across the street. Not only is Rhonda a gem but her son is very kind and helpful as well. Honestly if you're going to stay in the Shire of Sydney, Australia and you want to save cash doing so while getting a remarkable aweinspiring experience Rhonda's lovely granny flat is the way to go. Trust me you will not be disappointed.

Rhonda was very welcoming happy to have a chat or let you do your own thing. The house,  gardens and neighbourhood was very nice like a real b&b not just a place to stay. Nice and close to shops and not too far from cronulla beach. I would recommend.

Staying with Rhonda was brilliant, I honestly couldn't have asked for more. She was always really welcoming and I felt really comfortable staying there. The room I stayed in was great, I had my own little area which I really appreciated. Everything felt really homely which I really liked. I would definitely recommend to anyone wanting to stay in the south Sydney area.

My experience at Rhonda's place was amazing.  Rhonda is super nice, friendly, kind and easy going.  She will do anything for you and can provide heaps of insider knowledge on Sydney and surrounds.  The granny flat style accommodation is perfect, chocolates on arrival, little sops and shampoo to use, super comfy bed, nice sheets, everything you could ask for.  Miranda is a lovely suburb that is very safe and family friendly, nice big trees with lots of birds, close to transport and shops and not far from the beach either if you have a car.  I could not recommend highly enough for anyone visiting Sydney to stay at Rhonda's house, you won't regret it!
Very welcoming, friendly and attentive. Nice neighbourhood quite and very leafy and green. Relaxed environment.
Had a great experience here. Lovely location, excellent service. Cannot complain.

We had dinner at a local cafe on Friday night, and the food and company were great!
The street and yard are very pretty with lots of trees and birds.
I would definitely recommend this little piece of heaven, and would definitely come back!

name: English Cottage in Hawaii
summary: Aloha and welcome to our cozy little English Cottage in Hawaii! A charming remodeled classic Kona Coffee Shack. Nestled on a quiet and private acre. Walking distance from the historic village of Holualoa . You can walk to a cafe, restaurant, art galleries, yoga and massage studio, post office and a local store. Just 10 minutes drive from Kona town and a beach. With the 1500 feet elevation you can get away from the heat and enjoy stunning views, starry nights and the sounds of nature.
space: You will love this little piece of real Hawaii. A traditional building known as a “Hoshidana” or “Star Shelf”, with a sliding roof originally used for coffee drying . Just minutes walk from the village. You will enjoy the lovely nature on this property. Surrounded by ti plants, ferns , banana trees, passion fruit, avocados, lemons and ulu . This relaxed open air and humble home is a true gem. This place has a feel of an English cottage in Hawaii, rustic yet with a modern touch. Your host is an interior decorator originally from England and you will enjoy the simple yet stylish decor. Your stay here will be cozy and comfortable. Your hosts Lulie and John are friendly and helpful with tips on visiting the island. From their 20 years of living here .

Just 10 minutes drive from Kona town and a beach. With the 1500 feet elevation you can get away from the heat and enjoy stunning views, starry nights and the sounds of nature. You will love this little piece of real Hawaii. A traditional building known as a “Hoshidana” or “Star Shelf”, with a sliding roof originally used for coffee drying . Just minutes walk from the village. You will enjoy the lovely nature on this property. Surrounded by ti plants, ferns , banana trees, passion fruit, avocados, lemons and ulu . This relaxed open air and humble home is a true gem. This place has a feel of an English cottage in Hawaii, rustic yet with a modern touch. Your host is an interior dec
neighborhood_overview: This property is 5 minutes walk from the quaint artist village of Holualoa. The cafe serves the best organic Kona coffee. The Holuakoa Gardens  is a wonderful, farm to table restaurant in a lovely outdoor setting.  You will enjoy strolling the different art galleries and shops and if your stay happens to be on the first Friday of the month, don’t miss Holualoa’s  First Friday event when the village comes alive with food booths and music from 5 to 8pm. The drive to Kona town is about 15 minutes. The Airport is a 20 minute drive away. The  closet beach is Magic Sands, about 10 minutes away.
notes: This home is very open with mostly screens for windows and no locks on the doors . The bedroom with the full bed is the only room in the house with actual glass windows and a lock . We love this open feeling and enjoy being so close to the outdoors .  We do not lock our house . The area is very safe.  Our home is decorated with several beautiful Buddha and Ganesh statues. There is no air conditioning at this property. The temperature is very comfortable but fans are available if needed in the summer and extra blankets for chilly nights . If you are just 2 guests but require separate beds we will charge an extra $20 for the 2nd bedroom.  Massage is available on site per request. If arranged ahead of time we offer pick up and drop off to and from the airport for a fee of $30 each way.
transit: It’s always good to have a car whilst on the Big Island for exploring. There is plenty of free parking on the property. We do have Uber now on the Island and you could manage with just that if you plan on staying close to Kona town . An Uber fair to town and back would cost around $25. Strolling through Holualoa just 5 minutes away  is a lovely and relaxing thing to do on your vacation.  You can get a taxi to and from the airport, or there is an option for us to pick you up or drop you off for a fee of $25 if planned in advance.
access: You will have access to the 2 adjoined bedrooms, the kitchen, living room, bathroom, and your own private entrance and porch. The kitchen, bathroom  and living room area will be shared minimally with your hosts during your stay .
interaction: Your hosts sleep on the property in a detached yurt . They will share the kitchen and bathroom with you during your stay. Lulie and John are very approachable and will be happy to answer any questions and do what they can to make your stay enjoyable. They enjoy interacting with guests but are happy to give their guests space if that is what they prefer. Their friendly dogs Bambino and Zorro and two cats hang out at the outside property. The house is pet free inside .
house_rules: No shoes to be worn in the house. Wash dirty dishes or place in dishwasher. Please keep shared spaces clean and tidy, as you find them . Please keep all personnel items in the bedrooms since the living area is shared with your hosts . The pets are to stay outside. Please do not check in early without communicating to us. Please try and let us know what time you will be checking in, so that we can be there to welcome you.

host.host_about:
I am originally from England and have lived on the Big Island for 20 years. I have 3 grown up children, a stepson, a lovely husband, 2 dogs and 2 cats. I love the beautiful nature and ocean of Hawaii. I swim in the ocean  several times a week. I love traveling all over the globe but happy to call Hawaii and my humble coffee shack home.
I enjoy meeting new friends and appreciate clear communication, cleanliness and positive energy.

reviews.comments: My family and I had a wonderful time staying with Lulie. We followed her directions and had no issues finding the place, although the road in might not be ideal for low profile vehicles. Her home was very quaint and lovely. Lulie and her husband were very welcoming, and their dogs are very cute and friendly. I would highly recommend this place if you are looking for a true Hawaiian experience.

My daughter and I stayed at Lulie's wonderful place on the Big Island of Hawaii.  I have been a Superhost in San Francisco for more than 6 years with more than 500 guests coming to stay with me.  I try to get to know many of my guests as that is one of the main reasons I host.  Our experience with Lulie and John was absolutely amazing as we really got to know them and become friends in such a short period of time.  They are truly wonderful, warm, friendly and open people.  

The place is a very warm home with two separate bedrooms each with a real bed (no cots or pull outs).  That is a rarity and really nice for stays like ours.  There are no windows only screens but it is higher in the hills above Kona so the temperature in the evenings was nice and cool and great for sleeping.  

The shared bathroom was huge and it had a great shower.  

I also wanted to point out that I have a pretty severe allergy to cats and the listing mentioned they have two cats but they are outside.  I can attest to seeing the cute cats outside and also can state that I had zero symptoms of allergies during my stay which means they do indeed stay and remain outside and not in the unit.

Their dogs, Bam Bam and Zorro, are very friendly and welcoming, often running up to your car to greet you as you arrive.  Bam Bam loves to be picked up and my daughter fell in love!

Lulie told us about all sorts of great places to visit around the island and perhaps if we all are lucky, she may decide to lead an Airbnb Adventure to some of those places.

All in all, this is an incredible Airbnb and I can highly recommend it to any independent traveler to the Big Island.

This place is super cute! It is rustic with a fun history and comfortable with modern appliances. It's of the beaten path  while being near town, is open air and the view is wonderful. The coqui frogs serenade through the night and the beds are comfortable. We all slept well and enjoyed meeting Luli, John  and the animal welcome crew who, though friendly also know they are expected to stay outside. This was an enjoyable stay that we left well rested and ready for island time.
Great place to stay! Nicely decorated and clean. We felt at home. Lulie is a wonderful host. Her hospitality was great!

Lulie was an amazing host. She communicated everything very well and made our stay as comfortable as possible. 
The host really cares about her guests.
Nice place, has a great view

well hidden treasure below banana trees. no streets, no noise, only nature. so glad to have found this place. had a nice chat with Lulie and John while drinking a cup of tea. the house is very stylish and has everything you need. we were also nicely entertained by the cute dogs, cats and birds. communication with the hosts is great. we will come again.
lovely and comfortable house! Warm welcome from the hosts!
Nice, rustic place - great for star watching!

Lulie's place has so many sweet touches and very stylish decor. It is a renovated coffee shack on a beautiful property. It's rustic in the very best way possible. We enjoyed beautiful sunsets from both inside the cozy living room and outside the house on the patio - also great stargazing! Close to Kona and all the beaches and coffee farms but in a fun, artsy town just up the "hill" with its own amazing restaurant. Hawaiian breezes fill the open air home. Friendly dogs and cats on the property but not inside the house. Truly made our trip fun and unique! And our hosts, Lulie and John were very friendly and fun to talk to!

From the moment we arrived at Lulie’s home we felt comfortable and at ease. The property is really magical as you feel you’re in an enchanted forest overlooking the ocean. Amazing sunset views, including from the bathroom! The bedrooms were very comfortable and a pleasure to sleep in because of the chirping birds. Sharing the common spaces with Lulie’s family was a breeze and we always felt welcome and at home. It’s plenty spacious for all. The dogs are an added bonus. Highly recommend!

Lulie and John were absolutely lovely hosts- they made us feel welcome and at home in their cottage! 
Honestly this place has been by far our best air BnB experience. When arriving in the eve we were greeted by their pets who are super friendly and love being cuddled. If you follow Lulies instructions on how to get there it is easy to find, while being a little way off the centre of town. It is a hidden gem and you will be surrounded by scenic views and banana, avocado and citrus trees. The house is beautiful and the interior is cosy, and decorated with love and a lot of taste. You can tell they have put so much love into it. If you love pets, staying there is a must! We loved hanging out with Zorro, Bam Bam and their two cats.
They gave us great tips on the best places to eat, hike and go snorkelling.  And sharing the bathroom was never an issue at all. Absolutely recommend and wish we had stayed longer. Mahalo Lulie and John for being such lovely hosts! If we come back to Hawaii, we will definitely come again.

I had great conversations with Lulie and John.  They are both very nice people and were both very helpful in recommending local beaches and restaurants.  The place itself is up in the mountains and provides a great view of Kona and the ocean below.  I felt comfortable and had a great night's sleep.

Lulie was a very kind host! We’ve had a warm welcome when we arrived. And very nice chats during our short stay. So sad we only had one night in this lovely place and had to leave so early in the morning. Defenetly recommend this place to others! Thank you very much!!
Lulie & John we’re lovely and friendly.  My friend and I felt as if we were visiting old friends.  The home was charming as were the dogs and cats.  I definitely recommend and hope to come back
Great communication. "Amazing hosts"!

Stayed at Lulie’s place for a few nights and it was such a great experience. Kylie and her husband were friendly and welcoming and listing was just as described. We loved the fresh breezy air flowing through the house and all the nature sounds! My sister said it was one of the best nights rest she’s ever had! Her pets were also friendly and cute, a definite bonus!

We loved our stay at this quaint cottage nestled amongst a lush backdrop of vibrant trees and a peaceful view of the ocean. 

Lulie and John have put a lot of heart into this family-and-friend remodeled home and you feel it as soon as you arrive. The warm wooden planks, the way the soft light hits, the contrasting textures, color (Website hidden by Airbnb) all very cohesive with an authentic energy - oftentimes it's the vibe city shops and restaurants will aim for, but fall short on. The accommodations are very comfortable and cozy - it just feels like home. The peaceful yet highly amusing pets add an air of satisfaction as you enjoy your morning coffee on the porch outside. 

The hosts themselves are very personable, calm, and friendly -- sharing the space felt intuitive. They afford you plenty of privacy while also sharing pockets of companionship. 

I'd definitely stay here again, and leave with plenty of inspiration to model my future off of. Thank you, Lulie and John!

name: Amazing duplex apartment at the city heart!
summary: Duplex apartment for 4 persons in the city center
space: Recently renovated apartment with modern architecture in an old building, in the heart of Oporto, with the Douro River and the wine cellars of Porto on its feet. Upon arrival you will feel the comfort of a real home prepared specially for your needs. The apartment is located in an iconic building 2 min walk from the famous Ribeira with its restaurants, bars and boat trips, 2 min from the cathedral and 7 min from São Bento station. neighborhood_overview: Porto is a beautiful and welcoming city, its gastronomy is phenomenal you can stroll along both the waterfront and the seaside, have many monuments and historical sites you will love to know this apartment is right in the heart of  porto, shops, restaurants, monuments, fantastic Lello bookstore all within 10 minutes walking distance.
notes: the building where this apartment is located has a lift
transit: The best way to get around in  porto is on foot, because the city has beautiful places that you will only meet and get there if you are going for a stroll. Because there is a lot to know in  porto
interaction: For any clarification you can contact me by phone or email

address.government_area: Cedofeita, Ildefonso, Sé, Miragaia, Nicolau, Vitória

reviews.comments: Sehr gut und sauber. Die Lage der Wohnung war perfekt, quasi am Fluß und im touristischen stadtzentrum. Kommunikation war toll und die checkin wie auch die checkout zeiten flexibel.

We really enjoyed staying at Luciano's place.  Very central and close to Portos major attractions. Really enjoyed dining in the 2 nearby restaurants downstairs thanks to hosts suggestions. Recommend this place for travelers and I'd love to stay here next time if I visit Porto.

Luciana's apartment is very well situated in the old town of Porto with many restaurants and bars nearby. The flat is very comfortable and spacious and Luciana attended to our needs quickly and in a friendly manner. I highly recommend it.
Déco très soignée

I was welcomed by Luciana and was so nice! Made me feel welcomed right away. She gave me a  quick tour of the apartment and gave me recommendations about restaurants which was greatly appreciated. The apartment was beautiful , clean, and indeed super cozy! The location was incredible. right in the heart of old Porto with great restaurant and shops to explore.
I would greatly recommend staying here. The hosts were incredible in terms of communication. I would definitely consider coming back.
Un 10. Para repetir.
Apartamento muito bem localizado, na zona central do Porto, com óptimos acessos.
Super nice and clean! I loved it !!

Overall great apt in a good location and responsive host. The building overall seems to mostly be rentals and the place feels like a rental vs a home (on the transactional/ hotel like side of the spectrum) but great convenient location, clean place.
I love it!

Luciana's place was clean and super well located. Easy access to the main sites of Porto from walking distance. The apartment also contained enough amenities, the support and communication were fast (Luciana arranged a taxi to the airport for us right after NYE), and the apartment was warm as well.
Lovely apt in amazing location.
큰 침대가 두개에 쇼파베드까지 있어서 가족끼리 방문하기 좋을 것 같아요 오르막길에 있고 상벤투역에서 짐을 가지고 이동하긴 조금 힘들었습니다ㅠ 화장실 창문으로 보이는 도루강 뷰가 예쁩니다 창문이 조금더 컸으면 좋았을 것 같은 아쉬움이 듭니다 깔끔하고 체계적인 시스템을 갖춘 집이고 프린트할게 있었는데 호스트님께서 해주셔서 수월한 여행을 할 수 있었습니다!
숙소가 정말 이쁘고 좋습니다. 복층구조에 인테리어를 잘해두었네요. 생각보다 훨씬 넓어서 묵는동안 매우 편했어요. 호스트가 워낙 깔끔하게 정리해둔 덕에 포르토에서 즐겁게 시간을 보냈어요. 위치는 상벤투역에서 가깝고 어디든 가기 편한 곳이에요. 호스트가 매우 친절해서 묵는동안 즐겁게 지낼 수 있었습니다.
bel appartement conforme aux photos et bien situé dans porto. Luciana était disponible et réactive,  parfait!
房子装修很有格调,比预想中宽敞｡民宿距离火车站很近,旅游,寄存行李都很方便,步行就可到达,冰箱里有有酒有饮料｡
It was good
Fantastic flat in a good location. Perfect for a weekend away for two.

Luciana's place is nice, well organised, clean and good located in the center of Porto.
We recommand to stay here.
We really enjoyed our stay in this beautiful appartment! It‘s near the center and very clean. Absolutely recommend this appartment.

name: Boutique Style Apartment with Roof Top
summary: Boutique style apartment with roof top in trendy neighborhood Sheung wan. Great outdoor area to enjoy the sunshine. This is a Chinese walk up building so no elevator. Plenty of cute coffee shops and hip restaurants to choose from. 3 mins walk to Sheung wan MTR station (exit A2)
space: Boutique style decoration with roof top. Great outdoor area to enjoy the sunshine. This is a Chinese walk up building so no elevator. Very cosy and quiet. Modern bathroom and kitchen with washing machine and cooking facilities.

Plenty of cute coffee shops and hip restaurants to choose from. 3 mins walk to Sheung wan MTR station (exit A2) Boutique style decoration with roof top. Great outdoor area to enjoy the sunshine. This is a Chinese walk up building so no elevator. Very cosy and quiet. Modern bathroom and kitchen with washing machine and cooking facilities. Access to the roof area (located one floor above and door on the right) No access to the second bedroom as it is used for storage. I am available by txt message only as i will be away but i will have a co-host you can call while im not in HK
access: Access to the roof area (located one floor above and door on the right) No access to the second bedroom as it is used for storage.
