house_rules: Guests should kindly clean up after themselves, remove shoes while inside and please keep the windows closed. Please do not leave the air conditioning on while outside the flat, please turn it off before leaving.

host.host_about: Designer from the UK living in HK for 8 years

address.street: Hong Kong, Hong Kong Island, Hong Kong

reviews.comments: Awesome place and a wonderful host! I survive a super typhoon in it, so you cannot go wrong by booking it. Tiffany is extremely responsive and thoughtful even though she is overseas during my stay. The place is spectacular. Right in the heart of HK. It is close to shops, cafes, bars, local eateries, everything you can think of. The bonus is the rooftop which is a great place to chill, sunbathe and eat. If I ever stay again, I will make sure to have a big backpack, as you have to walk up a long flight of stairs. Otherwise, you cannot go wrong with Tiffany’s place.

name: The Modern Mango House / Spa
summary: Spa-Like Experience ~ Where the Living is Easy!   Modern and Tropical.  Feel the Aloha in your beautiful, Kealakekua Bay home on a 2-acre, organic mango farm.  Enjoy a wonderful indoor / outdoor flow and experience. Relaxed, Island Vibe Aesthetic.  Neutral Tones.  Feel cradled on the  slopes of Mauna Loa and inspired by a jungle, spa-like environment.   Enjoy a  7-foot cedar hot tub,  6 person state-of-the-art sauna, and a unique, jungle, lava-rock shower.  Book a massage.  Relax and Restore.
space: The perfect home for a special and  unique vacation on an Organic Mango Farm in the heart of Kealakekua Bay.  Ideal for vacationers looking for something different from a busy and commercial resort-experience.  This is a perfect choice for nature lovers and people who want a unique vacation in a farm-type setting with spa amenities.  Upon arrival at "The Mango Farm,"  you'll notice the peaceful feeling and lush tropical foliage that surrounds the house, including colorful hibiscus, beautiful Ti, ginger, plumerias, traditional Hawaiian plants and tall, delicate palm trees.  You are also surrounded by herb and vegetable gardens and variety of fruit trees, including 8 varieties of mango (~65 trees), 3 varieties of banana, 2 variety of avocado, coconut, moringa, papaya, tangelo, lemon, lime, tangerine, suriname cherry, ulu (breadfruit), figs, lilikoi (passionfruit), hawaiian chili pepper, lemongrass, kafir lime, ginger, tumeric. We offer our guests ripe, fresh fruit from the farm.  We apol
description: Spa-Like Experience ~ Where the Living is Easy!   Modern and Tropical.  Feel the Aloha in your beautiful, Kealakekua Bay home on a 2-acre, organic mango farm.  Enjoy a wonderful indoor / outdoor flow and experience. Relaxed, Island Vibe Aesthetic.  Neutral Tones.  Feel cradled on the  slopes of Mauna Loa and inspired by a jungle, spa-like environment.   Enjoy a  7-foot cedar hot tub,  6 person state-of-the-art sauna, and a unique, jungle, lava-rock shower.  Book a massage.  Relax and Restore. The perfect home for a special and  unique vacation on an Organic Mango Farm in the heart of Kealakekua Bay.  Ideal for vacationers looking for something different from a busy and commercial resort-experience.  This is a perfect choice for nature lovers and people who want a unique vacation in a farm-type setting with spa amenities.  Upon arrival at "The Mango Farm,"  you'll notice the peaceful feeling and lush tropical foliage that surrounds the house, including colorful hibiscus, beautiful Ti, g
neighborhood_overview: The home is one mile from spectacular Kealakekua Bay where you'll find incredible silky smooth water with amazing visibility, beautiful reefs covered in coral and exotic tropical marine life including spinner dolphins. Kealakekua Bay (meaning "Pathway of the Gods") provides great ocean activities such as kayaking, world-class snorkeling, swimming, paddle boarding, surfing, and views of incredible Kona Coast sunsets.  There are a few beaches nearby, all of which have a different vibe and focus:  Manini, Ke'ei, 2 Step and Hookena. Located in historic Napoopoo and centrally located 20 miles from the town center of Kailua-Kona, nestled among nearly 70 mango trees and is adjacent to Kona's oldest coffee mill which offers local fruits and confections. It is centrally located, 90 miles from Volcano National Park and 60 miles from the Kohala Coast. We have many recommendations for day trips to Northern hikes and white sandy beaches or other Big Island Adventures.  (see guidebook upon check-in)
notes: - Hawaii Mandatory short-term occupancy tax collected at check-in (14.25%), but can vary slightly when the State raises taxes ~ The entire farm respects quiet hours 9pm- 8am, with no music and only quiet conversations during these hours because no one closes their windows in Hawaii :-) - The Mango Farm is  a place for relaxation, restoration and re-charging ~ We are a working, organic mango farm with 65 mango trees and about 15 other types of fruit trees (permaculture, organic, korean natural farming practices), and we have extensive vegetable and herb gardens. We also make essential oils of lemongrass, tulsi, curry leaf, cinnamon, nutmeg, citrus, basil, catnip and many other botanicals.  We make plant-based medicine and value-added products like moringa powder, mango chutney and tinctures from time-to-time, so let us know if you're interested in products we are making.   ~ This rental  is located on an Organic Mango farm and can have mosquitos, bugs, spiders and geckos/critters.  We a
transit: Public transportation is not an option in this area.  You'll definitely need to rent a car.  Even though we are only 1 mile from Kealakekua Bay, it is down a windy road (400ft climb) without a shoulder, so not the ideal beach walk :-)
access: There is a 7-foot cedar hot tub and a 6 person, state-of-the-art near-mid-far infrared sauna.   Bathing suits are not allowed in the hot tub because it causes black mold, and we ask that you shower before entering (there's a beautiful, 2-person lava rock/jungle shower adjacent to the tub).  Massages (multiple modalities) are available onsite for $100/hour.  We offer Esalen, Deep Tissue, Chi Nei Tsang and Lomi Lomi.  We offer CBD oil massages and sell CBD oil.  We also offer comprehensive detox packages.   On the property, there are variety of fruit trees, including 8 varieties of mango (~65 trees), 3 varieties of banana, 2 variety of avocado, coconut, moringa, papaya, tangelo, lemon, lime, tangerine, suriname cherry, ulu (breadfruit), figs, lilikoi (passionfruit), Hawaiian chili pepper, lemongrass, kafir lime, ginger, tumeric. As long as there's ripe fruit on the farm, we all bring you an assortment of fresh, ripe fruit and will replenish upon request.   We apologize in advance if thin
interaction: Unless we make specific arrangements with you, we won't necessarily meet you. We also have on-site care takers who live on the farm full-time in case you need anything to make your stay more comfortable or memorable - but they also might not meet you unless you reach out :-) We also are available via phone and thru the Airbnb app, which sends us a real-time text message.  We encourage you to reach out if you'd like recommendations or have any questions.
house_rules: We collect Hawaii Short term occupancy tax at check-in 14.42% because Airbnb does not have a way of collecting taxes. Lost keys will incur a $100 fee. Our guests respect the relaxing vibe of the farm. The farm respects quiet hours between 9pm - 8am Shoes are not allowed to be worn in the house No (sweet) farm cats are allowed in the house Hot Tub: No children under the age of 12 permitted in hot tubs at any time without adult supervision.  When using the hot tub, remember there is a certain health risk associated with this facility. Use at your own risk.

host.host_about: We are a family of three living in a wonderful community in South Kona Hawaii and thriving off farming, sunshine, and ocean water.

reviews.comments: The Mango Farm was a great place to stay on the big island. The mangos were delicious and the suggestions on local places to go and see were awesome! We would definitely go back!
This was such a fanstastic, lovely, peaceful place to stay while on the Big Island. The zen ambiance provided much needed rest! Can’t wait to return one day very soon!
Beautiful spacious home close to Manini Beach and Two Step

We had a magical stay at the Mango farm. Heather is an incredible host and has created a little piece of heaven with this house. You can really feel that it has been put together with a lot of love. A wonderful spot to explore the Kona area from.

We did a lot of exploring the island but it was so nice to come back and relax at the Mango Farm. The place is a green oasis surrounded by luscious trees and colourful small birds. The place is what you would expect from the photos although more spacious and with all the amenities we needed and we were able to get great local suggestions, also it’s very close to Kealakekua Bay and lots of small coffee farms which we really enjoyed.

DREAM HOUSE! We had unforgettable experience and flawless stay at Mango Farm’s place!  Everything was so ideal, harmonious and with a lot of beautiful details! Totally Zen! Best home, host, trip ever!!! Want to come back again and again! ❤️

I will start by saying that our stay at this location was not planned in advance in any way whatsoever. Our flight from Kona got cancelled, and my husband and I needed to find a place to spend an extra night. After our marvelous stay at the Mango Farm Oceanview property, staying at a hotel was not even an option. So we reached out to the host, and voila- within one hour we were on our way to the Mango House, where a heated hot-tub was already waiting for us :) The communication with the host was as easy as it gets: they were extremely accommodating, to the point of driving to the property to confirm its cleanliness prior to our arrival (and that is at 9pm on a Friday night!). The house greeted us with calming sounds of the nature, bedroom hammock to relax, and breathtaking views of the stars. Staying at this location made our vacation even more memorable, and we don't dare complaining about the delayed return home for obvious reasons :)
The location and soundscapes were out of this world...especially when an afternoon shower rolled in! I loved waking up to the birds and enjoyed the time off the beaten path.

Heather is a nice and warm host and gave us many local food and travel suggestions. The mangoes from her farm were amazing!
We had a nice and relaxing holiday.

One of my favorite Airbnbs ever. The indoor/outdoor feel of the place, the light and airy interior, the fresh fruit, the sounds of nature that surround you all make this a gem of a spot. The host was incredibly helpful and responsive. The location was super private and serene — but still so close to some incredible snorkeling/hiking/eating spots. The house itself has such a wonderful sense of self and peacefulness to it, you can't help but feel like you're at home. This was one of the best choices I made when booking my trip to the Big Island.
Great place on an unique lot. Peaceful, quiet area with sounds local wildlife at night and great stargazing. Short drive to the Bay and close enough to Kona for dinner/shopping.

From the moment we pulled up to the house to the day we left I was in total awe of this place. The overall vibes make it feel just like home. Everything you could possibly need is available, no need to bring a thing. Fully stocked kitchen with pots, pans, nice big stove. The beds were all very comfortable, with amazing pillows. The massage chair was a huge bonus that we enjoyed every night. The property has beautiful trees, hanging in fruits. There are little chickens and a sweet duck that roam around too. If I could pack up and move here, I would. I highly recommend staying at the Mango Farm when when visiting. The location was also perfectly close to just about everything, including an amazing snorkle spot where we saw tons of turtles, eels and beautiful fish of all kinds. The hosts are the nicest people! I can't wait to come back!!!

We had an awesome stay at Mango Farm, the caretaker was very friendly and offered us with fresh fruits and tour of the farm. We enjoyed the spacious patio and nature of the place. But be prepared with mosquitos and geckos!
Heather was a great host and the Mango House is a gem! It’s got lots of character and is tucked away in a quiet little town. Perfect for families.

It’s really lucky for us to find a place like the Mango Farm to spend  happy family hours at the end of the year . You really can find anything you need in your home. House is so delicately furnished that makes you don’t want to leave. The host is very nice and thoughtful. Thanks for her informations and the mangoes
The photos don't lie!  Really beautiful and comfortable place.  Great place to waste away morning and come home to after a day of adventures.  Great hosts too.

Great quiet place close to some of the best snorkeling on the island. Loved adventuring all day and coming home to the beautiful porch and hot tub.  Heather is quick to respond to all messages and left a good guide to things in the area. The caretakers were kind and helpful. Lots of coqui frogs at night and roosters crowing in the morning. I liked it but if you are a light sleeper you may want to bring earplugs. Lovely place all around.

We have just thoroughly enjoyed 12 days in the Mango House. It’s a beautiful and comfortable home with a huge lanai, hot tub, sauna, outdoor shower and peek a boo ocean view through the lush foliage. The farm environment was perfect for us although the odd rooster confused a bright moon with dawn on occasion LOL.  We found the location great with short drives to a grocery store, fruit stands, snorkel spots/beaches and excellent restaurants.  Initially it felt like our neighbours were very close (we live on a ranch with a 1 mile access road to give you some perspective)  however we found we had excellent privacy and minimal noise. Listening to the crickets, frogs and the waves on the shores below in the evening and at night was wonderful.  Our hosts were great, very accommodating and anxious to ensure we had everything we needed. We had  fresh fruit on arrival as well as more offerings half way through our trip. There is a great little stash of beach equipment we were free to use including snorkel equipment, chairs, cooler etc available on a first come basis.  The beds were comfortable and linens were great. WiFi was excellent. Kitchen equipment, stove, fridge, dishwasher all great. We made fantastic smoothies everyday.  For us, this was a perfect place to stay. Oh yes, the 2 friendly kitties were an added bonus along with a small supply of free eggs from free range wild chickens laid on the lanai.  Avoid Gypsea Gelato - it’s addictive. You’ll end up scheduling your day trips around making sure you get to the Gelato place before 8.30pm LOL.

What can we say about The Mango Farm?  This is an amazing property, and the caretakers were so generous and gracious with their time to show us around the farm and get to know this wonderful place.  The location is so convenient for spending time at Manini Beach or the pier.  The house itself is beautiful and appointed with everything you need, or could even want.  We spent many happy hours on the lanai and soaking in the cedar hot tub, enjoying the relaxed vibe of the farm.  We were sad to leave, but excited to come back as soon as we can.

A true gem!!! Beautiful, spacious spot in South Kona with stunning cedar hot tub enveloped by beautiful jungle-like plants.  Very stylishly decorated with a zen decor and everything was super clean / spotless when we arrived.  For those who like to cook, the kitchen is super equipped with everything you need.  And for those traveling w/ babies like us, not only did they have a pack 'n play, but they also had a pretty baby-proofed spot (e.g. latches in kitchen cabinets)  The owners also leave extensive local tips of things to do both nearby and for day trips -- don't miss Manini beach at sunset and we thought Kua Bay was also worth a day trip for a stunning beach.   The only considerations would be that you have to drive almost everywhere from here since the main road nearby doesn't have sidewalks (true for a lot of the Big Island I think), and as others have noted the birds and roosters are pretty loud so bring ear plugs if you're a light sleeper.   Right now not too many plants are producing, but all the more reason to return soon :)  Overall, a beautiful stay and we hope to be back.

This house was a really special place to stay on the big island. It is a beautiful home and really nicely decorated. The windows and lanai are aligned with the tree tops, so you feel like you are in a secluded jungle getaway. The hot tub was a wonderful way to spend the evening, relaxing and listening to the frogs and looking at the stars. We stayed between seasons on many fruits but we did enjoy some yummy papaya and a mango. It’s a farm, so we also had a friendly chicken come by and lay an egg on our outdoor couch! The care takers were very friendly, helpful and responsive.

Beautiful house on beautiful property. The caretakers Dawn and Paul were wonderful and made it feel very welcoming. The energy flow throughout the house was very relaxing. Easy access to rest of island yet can see stars at night while sitting in hot tub listening to the night wildlife. We will for sure come back in the future.

My husband, toddler and I just finished our stay at the Mango Farm, and we couldn’t have asked for a better time. It’s a unique property - so if you’re looking for a big home that is away from it all, this fits the bill. Our daughter (and us) loved the property cats, the chickens (one of whom laid eggs on our porch), and geckos (yes - they are harmless if you’ve never encountered them.) The hot tub was perfect for the evenings, and we never closed the porch doors because of the breeze. Dawn, Paul and Heather promptly answered all of questions - whether by message or when we saw them in person - and were gracious enough to leave us citrus and bananas. The kitchen is well stocked with dishes, utensils and anything you need to cook. We ate many meals at home, grocery shopping or getting take out in Captain Cook. We would absolutely come back and recommend the property.

A sweet spot in Captain Cook!  It's a modest but cozy home complete with cool amenities like the beautiful hot tub and sauna ~ the porch area is like the picture ❤️.  Paul and Heather were great communicators and very welcoming!  We loved our tour of the mango farm and the fruit we got to taste!  Beach and snorkel sights are nearby and they have gear available to borrow on a first come first serve basis.  Pretty clean and very cozy atmosphere.  We loved our stay!!!

The house is easy to find and close to Captain Cook Trail, which was high on our to-do list. The hosts were very friendly and welcoming. We had a tour of the farm, and were given fresh fruit. The house is very clean, up to date and feels like home. I found the house to be super cozy with a great outdoor living area. I was sad to leave, and hope to come back soon! Bonus: Tea Cup the cat is a snuggle bug!

name: Habitación en Gràcia-Barcelona muy bien comunicada
summary: Habitación con cama individual, closet y baño compartido, wifi disponible. Ubicada en el centro del barrio de Gràcia, cercano a las estaciones de Metro. Ideal para conocer la cuidad y caminar en la noches por la zona. Comunidad tranquila. No se aceptan personas con exceso de alcohol. Vivimos en el piso
space: Durante el alojamiento puedes usar tu habitación, baño y si deseas guardar algo en la nevera. Tratamos de ayudar a nuestros huéspedes los mayor posible.

name: Apartment with Balcony , Sultan Ahmet
summary: Our Suites is situated in the Old City . Blue Mosque is 50 meters from the property. Free WiFi is featured throughout the property. All units feature a seating and dining area. All units have a kitchen equipped with a dishwasher and microwave. A fridge and stove-top are also provided, as well as a kettle. There is a private bathroom with a bath or shower in each unit. Hagia Sophia is 200 meters away. The nearest airport is Istanbul Ataturk Airport, 21 km from Our Suites.

All units have a kitchen equipped with a dishwasher and microwave. A fridge and stove-top are also provided, as well as a kettle. There is a private bathroom with a bath or shower in each unit. Hagia Sophia is 200 meters away. The nearest airport is Istanbul Ataturk Airport, 21 km from Our Suites.

host.host_about: So easy person. ...

reviews.comments: Great place close to centre, enough room for us 6 + baby.
I do not recommend this apartment. dirty and no internet at all i called thim many times to fix it but they did not care. the only advantage is the location.

A perfect home away from home. No frills, Amazing location. Excellent size for a family holiday. Mohamed was very helpful and quick to answer messages. We're looking forward to staying here again when we go back to Istanbul

Very much recommended. Good place only two minutes walk from main sites and 7 minutes walk to the tram.
Mohamad and his team were very responsive and helpful.
Les chambres à coucher sont propre. L'adresse donné ne correspond pas au lieu du logement.
It was a nice experience
The location is really nice.

name: Main Retreat
summary: 15 miles from the Kahului Airport, 3/4 mile off the Hana Highway on the ocean side, close to cafes, grocery shopping, beaches and waterfalls. 15 mins to Hookipa Beach. Stunning ocean views on two sides overlooking a spacious lawn. Private ocean view covered patio with bbq. Commune with nature. Converse with our goats and chickens. Make smoothies with our home grown organic fruits and coconuts.
space: Full kitchen and full bath. The bedroom offers a king bed. Can be rented as a two bedroom as well. The second bedroom can be configured with either a king or two twin beds. We offer you fresh fruits in season from our organic gardens, which may include bananas, papayas, oranges, limes and avocados. Enjoy the use of the 40 foot salt water swimming pool and meditation hut. Babysitting and massage available upon request. Tradewinds keep the temperature between 75 to 85 degrees by day and 65 to 75 degrees by night year round, eliminating the need for AC.
description: 15 miles from the Kahului Airport, 3/4 mile off the Hana Highway on the ocean side, close to cafes, grocery shopping, beaches and waterfalls. 15 mins to Hookipa Beach. Stunning ocean views on two sides overlooking a spacious lawn. Private ocean view covered patio with bbq. Commune with nature. Converse with our goats and chickens. Make smoothies with our home grown organic fruits and coconuts. Full kitchen and full bath. The bedroom offers a king bed. Can be rented as a two bedroom as well. The second bedroom can be configured with either a king or two twin beds. Tradewinds keep the temperature between 75 to 85 degrees by day and 65 to 75 degrees by night year round, eliminating the need for AC. We have a live in Host for any questions or he
neighborhood_overview: We are 3 miles from Jaws,  or Haiku, about 7 miles from Paia,  and 3 miles from the start of Hana Hwy.
transit: Our area is quite with lots of easy walking and site seeing.
interaction: We have a live in Host for any questions or help you may need.

host.host_about:
Wish to learn the secrets of life

Maui Ocean Breezes -TA (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) | GE (Phone number hidden by Airbnb)

reviews.comments: Troy's place is absolutely AMAZING! I so wish we had had more downtime here, because the spot is SO COOL. The Main Retreat was very clean, had a nice bathroom, kitchen, and amenities. It was also very nicely decorated. But none of this compares to the view: It.Is. STUNNING. You get a great view of the ocean as well as a lot of the beautiful jungle vegetation-the pictures don't do it justice! There are a couple of other rental properties onsite, but because this is a top-floor unit, it still seems very private. This is in the jungle, so it is inevitable that a couple of critters will make their way in (small geckos and bugs), but we just kept the windows closed after we got there and did not have any issues. The condo is about 15 minutes from the town of Paia and less than 10 from Mamas Fish House and Ho'okipa beach. What was also great is that this place is right at the beginning of the Road to Hana. The guy onsite (I didn't catch his name) was extremely friendly and helpful, and helped us borrow some snorkel gear and beach chairs. All in all, I would definitely recommend this place for any adventure loving couple or small family who wants a gorgeous view!
Such a beautiful spot and super friendly, helpful hosts. Even helped us arrange a fantastic babysitter. Hope to be back soon!

name: Modernist flat close to the Sagrada Familia
summary: Ideal for enjoying Barcelona with friends, family or even for business! This apartment is in compliance with the law being professionally managed by our family business ES-FLATS (Aurélie & Eberhard), we check the flat before and after each stay and manage cleaning and maintenance with a professional team. We have all the official licenses and insurances required to exercise the touristic rental, which is mandatory in Catalunya.
space: This nice bright apartment is located in the modernist district "Eixample "  near the most famous building of Antonio Gaudi: the Sagrada Familia and 5 minutes walking from Paseo Sant Joan and 15 min. from Paseo de Gracia, well known for his luxury stores. Located in a residential building, the apartment consists of two large bedrooms with double beds, one extra bed room with a sofa bed, a bathroom with shower and WC, a separate WC, a kitchen and a bright living room faced to the typical courtyard of Eixample, with a balcony along the flat. It is in the 2d floor with lift. We keep trying to be as much as possible “eco friendly”, so please help us to take care of the environment.
description: Ideal for enjoying Barcelona with friends, family or even for business! This apartment is in compliance with the law being professionally managed by our family business ES-FLATS (Aurélie & Eberhard), we check the flat before and after each stay and manage cleaning and maintenance with a professional team. We have all the official licenses and insurances required to exercise the touristic rental, which is mandatory in Catalunya. This nice bright apartment is located in the modernist district "Eixample "  near the most famous building of Antonio Gaudi: the Sagrada Familia and 5 minutes walking from Paseo Sant Joan and 15 min. from Paseo de Gracia, well known for his luxury stores. Located in a residential building, the apartment consists of two large bedrooms with double beds, one extra bed room with a sofa bed, a bathroom with shower and WC, a separate WC, a kitchen and a bright living room faced to the typical courtyard of Eixample, with a balcony along the flat. It is in the 2d floor
neighborhood_overview: Located close to several typical and cozy restaurants with terraces , cafes , cupcakes , brunch & lunch and cocktail bars. The apartment faces a courtyard typical " Eixample " very quiet and sunny with a balcony the whole width.
notes: Since the 1st of April 2017 the city tax rate is: 2,50EUR / person / night, we kindly ask you to prepare the corresponding amount in cash, to give at the check in. PS: This tax is applicable to the persons older than 17 years and only for the 7th first nights. Corporate social responsibility:  One part of our profit is donated to Doctors Without Borders and Help Children (Aldees Infantils SOS)
transit: Easy access with 3 subway lines 5min . walking to the station: L5 - blue line : Sagrada Familia station  L2 - violet line : Monumental station L4 – yellow line : Verdaguer station
access: Easy access with 3 subway lines 2min . walking to the station: L5 - blue line : Sagrada Familia station  L2 - purple line : Monumental station L4 – yellow line : Verdaguer station
interaction: We offer to our guests an individual and personalised service, starting from the upstream communication, the arrival onsite and during the stay, until the departure.  We reply to all your questions in few hours and always do our best to fulfil your needs. After booking, you will receive a list of extra services such as Airport pick up, fridge stocking, activities, entrance to monuments… and you will have the possibility to book it in advance in order to enjoy the maximum of your stay. For the ones who come by car, we have agreements with most of the parkings around offering you the best prices to let your car in a safe place. We speak fluently 4 languages, English, French, German and Spanish, which is a big advantage to communicate and exchange information. We welcome our guests personally upon arrival; we give them information about the surrounding, some advices and a map of the city and the public transportation. We adapt the check-in to your arrival time when it is possible; note th
house_rules: Smoking allowed on balcony only.  When you leave the flat please always check that the air condition and lights are switched off and that the doors and windows are closed. Open window means no air condition switched on ;-) Because we respect our neighbors, no parties are allowed and we expect a responsible behavior especially on arrival and departure, lift use, staircase and public areas. Just the reserved number of people is allowed to sleep in flat.

host.host_about:
Dear travelers, 
Many years ago we moved from Austria & France to Barcelona for professional reasons. I am an architect and my partner/wife Aurélie works in tourism. 
We feel that Spain is a fantastic place, so we would like to offer you memorable stay. 
You can write to us in English, German, Spanish or French. 
Please do not hesitate to contact us, should you need any further information, we will be more than happy to assist you.
All the properties we manage comply with the law and are registered as rental properties, our flats and laundry are professionally cleaned for upmost quality, hygiene and comfort. 
We thrive to provide you with the best quality service and we will go above and beyond to make sure you enjoy your stay in this wonderful city!

reviews.comments:
Appartement conforme aux photos, situé dans un quartier calme et proche de tous les sites touristiques (Sagrada familia, Ramblas, etc...). Station de metro à 5 min à pied.
Magui a été ponctuelle et très aimable.
Appartement à recommander !!!! ;)

Une arrivée un peu tardive, mais nous étions attendus. Karen a été parfaite et d'une grande patience avec ses explications. Le logement correspond bien aux photographies, avec une petite odeur de peinture en plus... il vient d'être refait et c'est parfait. 
Avant d'aller dîner dans le quartier gothique, un verre de vin rouge car les courses commandées étaient livrées... et une bonne douche bien chaude... encore parfait.
Dans les chambres, des lits confortables, une literie neuve. Rien à dire que ce n'est que la couette de ma chambre a du disparaître avant notre arrivée. Mais il faisait chaud.
Quand à l'aménagement de la cuisine, il manque un peu de petite vaisselle (des bols pour manger les céréales du matin...) et quelques bricoles toutes simples (quelques pastilles pour la lave vaisselle, un peu de sel et de poivre, du vinaigre  - 
Tout cela n'a pas grande importance.
Tout y était.
Nous étions 4 - et c'était parfait.
L'emplacement est central.
L'appartement au second étage - avec ascenseur - donne sur l'arrière avec un petit balcon. Pas de bruit la nuit, nous avons peu laisser les portes fenêtres ouvertes.
La couleur blanche des murs se marrie bien avec les gris des faïences murales.
Les plafonds sont magnifiques.
L'aménagement du salon, dans sa simplicité est confortable et convivial. Il donne sur un petit balcon ou il fait bon prendre l'air.
Merci pour avoir contribué à rendre notre séjour à Barcelone agréable avec un havre de  repos bien mérité après des journées bien remplies.
Si vous aimez la netteté, la simplicité de très bon goût, je vous recommande cet appartement.

Beside the host coming 1 hour later for the checkin everything was great at the apartment.

It was a really nice apartment, which had everything, and okay location, we nearby Metro stations.

We really enjoyed this aparts. Great location- close to metro stations, 25 min to Gothic district, 10 min. to Sagrada. Aparts are new, with stylish design and full equipment. Eberhard and Aurelie are helpful and friendly hosts.

We had a nice week in Barcelona here. The apartment is spacious and well kept, clean on arrival, with a complete kitchen, washing machine, 2 bedrooms +  room with sofa bed, WC, bathroom (with additional WC) and living room with TV. One bedroom and the living room have more light from large windows which open out to a small balcony. We slept in that bedroom and the bed is comfortable. 
The location is adequate: if fit, one can walk to/from the main areas (Passeig de Gracía or Placa Catalunya are 15-20 minutes), if not, metro stations are all about 10 minutes away or bus 5 minutes (on Gran Via). 
Unfortunately in our week Eberhard & Aurelie were not in town so we did not meet them. A colleague handled check in/out professionally but we missed a bit the expected "personal stay" feeling of using AirBnB.

Eberhard & Aurelie are very nice hosts.  The apartment is very spatial and clean with nice design (especially the traditional ceiling). The location is also very convenient to traveller which you can reach Sagrada Família within 10mins walk and very easy to get any place in Barcelona with Metro. Internet, TV, Coffee Machine...everything worked very well and I had a great time during my stay. I would like to recommend this flat to everyone who is planning to stay in Barcelona for holiday.

Margui greeted me upon arrival and was really friendly, welcoming and flexible. She provided some information on the beaches and where to rent a bike.  The flat is clean, elegant, well designed, comforting and a calm oasis in the middle of the city.  Everything in the pictures is accurately depicted.   The whole place is fully renovated with interesting lighting details.  The bathrooms are immaculate. The architectural ceilings and exposed brick wall really bring an Architectural Digest feel to the place.   The French door spill wonderful light into the apartment filling it with natural sunlight all day.  The air conditioning does a great job of keeping up with the heat.   All the appliances worked well.   It's a great place to stay and when I return to BCN, I most definitely will check here first.
Great, spacious, central location and clean apartment.
My second stay with Eberhard and Aurelie in less than 3 months and it is still as good as ever.   Bright, fresh and welcoming it is in a great location with easy access to sites and the beach.
really great! exactly like on the pictures. host was on time. everything was clean. A+!

Whilst I have only used accommodation from Airbnb etc. a few times, this was easily the best. The apartment was better than described, probably newly refurbished, well decorated, with a good kitchen and bathrooms. Communication with our host was timely and supportive.
(As a example of kindness the housekeeper stayed with us until our taxi arrived to take us to the airport. My Spanish is minimal and she would have phoned the taxi company on our behalf if the ordered taxi had not arrived as required.)
Firstly Barcelona is a great city for tourists. This particular area has a number of good restaurants and any number of cafes and shops including excellent bakeries. Think friendly Parisian restaurants and boulangeries and that about sums it up. 
Secondly the apartment is close to a few must see architectural goodies and two useful underground lines. 
Thirdly residents in the apartment block are friendly and courteous, though so was everyone in Barcelona.

La estadia fue muy buena. El barrio es muy bonito y el apartamento muy comodo.
Definitivamente una muy buena opcion!
Saludos!

Wir haben die Wohnung für 7 Tage zu viert gemietet. In der Wohung ist alles vorhanden und sauber sowie schön möbliert. In den Zimmern ist ausreichend Ablagefläche vorhanden. Das eine Zimmer ist sehr lichtdurchflutet und hat einen Zugang zu einem langen Balkon. Das zweite Schlafzimmer ist weniger lichtdurchflutet und keinen Balkon. 
In der Küche ist alles nötige in greifbarer Nähe. Die Lage ist ca. 30 min vom Strand entfernt. Wir empfehlen deshalb Fahrräder zu mieten, womit sich der Weg runter zum Strand auf ca. 15 Min verkürzt. Mit dem Taxi runter bzw, hoch zufahren kostet um die 8Euro, was wirklich akzeptabel ist. Die Wege sind sehr Fahrradfreundlich. Man kommt schnell von A nach B und es macht wirklich Spass die Stadt mit dem Fahrrad zu erkunden. Deshalb unbedingt Fahrräder mieten. Wir würden die Wohnung wieder mieten. Die Vermieterin war sehr nett.

Barcelona ist eine wunderschöne Stadt !

Nous avons reçu des informations très précises sur l’appartement et nous avons été très gentiment accueillis par Aurélie.
Je recommande vivement l’appartement qui est très bien situé à quelques minutes de la « Segrada Familia ». Un petit supermarché situé juste à côté nous a fait gagner un temps fou.
L’appartement est calme, très lumineux, élégant et aménagé avec gout.
Il est très propre et récemment rénové. Une mention spéciale pour la literie et les oreillers très confortables.
Une expérience à renouveler !
Another great stay as always.  Margui greeted me upon arrival and everything was set up nicely as always.
The flat was really nice and any all the necessities for me and my guests. Was a pleasure to visit the city and stay at this with really elegant taste.
Great apartment! Very modern and clean, it was even better then the pictures. Very close to Sagrada Familia.

We were greeted by Magui, who was really friendly and helpful, and allowed us to check in 30mins early straight from the airport. We chose this area as we were already familiar with it, lots of great cafes nearby and easy to walk into the centre, as well as being close to a few metro stations. The flat was clean and spacious and was just as great in real life as it was in the listing, if not better! Everything worked perfectly - good aircon, great shower etc. Would definitely stay here again!

I was travelling with my mother at the time. We did not meet Eberhard or Aurelie in Barcelona. Instead, they had someone to welcome us at the apartment, her name was Magui. 

The size of the apartment is larger than that shown on the pictures. I must have misread the description of the apartment as I came to know that there was only one SMALL bathroom with a shower, and the other was just a lavatory. The kitchen was not equipped with basic beverages such as tea and coffee, but it was indeed clean. 

The closest mode of transport was bus, and the Tetuan metro station. Sagrada Familia is at walking distance! There are some eateries around the area, and a primary school behind the apartment.

Overall, worth the price is you are travelling in a group :)

Having arrived at the flat, Magui had already waited for us, we were introduced friendly and welcoming. She showed us the apartment and told us anything to be aware of. The beds were already made and the flat was clean. Actually, everything was set up as it had been described previously. During our stay,the apartment was left to us as it was our own. Nevertheless, Eberhard suggested some interesting places to visit and worth going to. The check out went really quick and without any complications. We have really enjoyed the stay and recommend it to anyone! Barcelona is a beautiful city!

The host made us feel very welcome. Contact prior to our visit was excellent and very helpful. We were able to arrange a family member to pick up keys early and we checked out late too.

The flat is immaculate, very clean and exactly as pictured. There were a few helpful extras like cold bottled water in the fridge and plenty of dishwasher tablets which really helped. 
Communal stairwell was clean and lift made the walk to the 2nd floor acceptable. 
Next to a well stocked supermarket and about 10 minute to two different metro stops.
Would really recommend staying there if you are looking for a quiet and convenient flat for a break to an amazing city.
Great location, very comfortable apartment
All was great.

Très décevant ! Quand la location d'appartement devient uniquement un business sans aucune proximité avec les hôtes. Notre séjour a été gâché par des problèmes électriques (les plombs sautaient toutes les 5 minutes). Difficile donc de vivre dans l'appartement : cuisiner, mettre la climatisation ou tout simplement avoir de la lumière le soir. Une personne assurait la "relation client" mais ne pouvait rien faire pour ce problème. Après échanges avec les propriétaires, ces derniers nous ont dit qu'ils viendraient lors du check out... On les attend toujours... Les clients passent, le business tourne!

The Elegant Flat was perfect for two adults and two teenage sons (17 & 18). The day we arrived, our flight was delayed and the BCN arrival terminal's wifi wasn't working. We finally managed to get in touch with Magui who patiently guided us through the flat and the city maps. The flat was as pictured and Eberhard and Aurelie were great to work with and always quick to respond to any questions. The electricity went out only on our last day but we quickly resolved the problem as Magui had explained to us. We figure that the flat did not want to let us go!
We were pleasantly surprised at how quiet the neighborhood was and were glad to come home to a clean and roomy flat. We loved the comfort of the foam beds and pillows after a long day of sightseeing! The shower had good pressure and hot water for all of us. The washing machine came in handy, but remember to use the short cycle! It was nice to have dishwashing and washing machine soap already provided.  
Barcelona had so much to offer: museums, great food and coffee, churches, Gothic architecture, markets, clean beaches, easy metro, and reasonable taxi fare. We took a day tour to Girona and Costa Brava and made our own way to Montserrat. We look forward to coming back to this beautiful city! Thanks for being great hosts!
Très bon séjour, appartement agréable et bien situé. Facile d'accès et propriétaires arrangeants ( facile pour prendre et remettre des clés par exemple). Appartement très agréable et calme.

Great place and perfect location, walking distance to the shopping malls, metros and trainstations. Definitely not the last time we will contact Eberhard and Aurélie on our next trip to Barcelona. The hosts were quickly to respond and solve any problems. Very friendly and flexible

Eberhard and Aurélie were great hosts. Communication was very easy and we received helpful and clear directions on how to check-in and how to get around the city. The property was exactly as described: clean, nicely furnished and spacious. The building is located in a more residential area but is centrally located, just a few blocks away from the Sagrada Familia and in walking distance from a lot of other sights.

A colleague from Eberhard introduced us friendly and welcoming.
She showed us the apartment . The beds were comfortable and the flat was clean. 

 The check out was really quick and without any complications. A late Checkout was no problem. We enjoyed our stay at this lovely Apartment  and recommend it.  Barcelona is a beautiful city! Thank you very much for this perfekt stay Eberhard & Aurélie
Hi Guys, your flat was thoroughly enjoyed throughout the stay, a very clean, neat apartment with comfy bedding. Everything we needed was close by, many thanks

the property was as described, very clean and in an amazing area! About a 15/30 minute walk from the Park/Zoo/Beach (as we found out on our last day) I would recommend for anyone to stay! We were met on time and had no issues whilst we were staying.

Extremely clean and good value flat. Lots of space. Very professional - run like a hotel (in a good way). Close to many metro stops, but a bit of a walk from the Old City and Waterfront. Also quieter though which was appreciated. Loved that the terrace was a useable depth. Has everything you needed and then some. Thank you!

A very pleasant flat, spotlessly-clean, well equipped and nicely decorated (probably recently). The apartment has  good location, not far from central attractions or the public transport system with lots of local shops and cafe/bars though a short hop on the underground may be required to get to higher class restaurants. The flat was very quite and in a nice neighborhood, the entrance was nice with a reliable lift and lighting system. We did not take up the offer of a "welcome pack" but found the host and particularly the host's representative who greeted us very pleasant and helpful.
No problems at all, a very pleasant stay. Thank you.
Eberhard is a really nice and helpful host. His apt is cozy, clean and you can find anything you need there.

The place is really nice and close to all the scenic spots in Barcelona most especially to the Sagrada. What is posted in the pictures is what you can see in person. Our host is very accomodating and he communicates with us properly. Too bad we only have a few days in Barcelona, but given a chance, i will live in this place again :)

Th apartment was lovely, well spaced, lit, and clean with all amenities my family and I needed including tea! However, our stay was quite stressful. I filled out the arrival form prior to arriving provided by the hosts through email and requested a car that never came. As we were there for the holiday season and the first of the New Year, there was miscommunication with the cleaning services. The cleaning/concierge woman was the one that met us, gave us the keys, cleaned the apartment and such. She was late, there were no maps included, the apartment was dirty when we arrived in the afternoon so we had to leave for a few hours to give her time to clean. For the first night we did not have clean towels or bed sheets. There were not enough pillows. The hosts (we never met) and the concierge woman were very nice and tried to make the best out of the situation. I do believe the miscommunications could have been technological or a language barrier (Although I speak Spanish) however the apartment should not have been open for these dates if the holiday prevented an adequate stay.
Magui always makes us feel welcome!  She brought fruit and juice.  This is my fourth or fifth visit and it is still as wonderful as the first visit.

Liebe Aurelia, lieber Eberhard,
herzlichen Dank für die nette Zeit in Eurem Appartment. Alles war so wie beschrieben, die Wohnung hat einen sehr schönen Charm und ist dezent und geschmackvoll möbliert. Da die Wohnung zum Innenhof liegt, ist sie ruhig und sonnig und man kann seinen Morgencafé auf der Terasse geniesen. Auch die Nachbarschaft ist sehr ruhig. Wir wurden, trotz Flugverspätung mitten in der Nacht willkommen geheißen.

We enjoyed our stay at Eberhard & Aurelie's place! 

It looks exactly like the pictures - very clean, bright and spacious. We loved sitting on the terrace when the sun was shining. Arriving and departing was trouble free and we found the location really convenient for sightseeing and exploring.

There were a couple of minor things that bothered us while we were there... The fitted sheets aren't the right size for the beds so they would pop off during the night and we would end up sleeping directly on the scratchy mattress. The kitchen doesn't have bowls so we ended up eating our cereal out of mugs. We booked and paid for 5 people to stay but on arrival the bed wasn't made up for the 5th person and we couldn't find enough bedding to fully make up his bed - he ended up using a couch cushion for a pillow. 

Other than those few points, it suited us well!
Très bon séjour, l appartement est agréable et maguy est fort sympathique. Je recommande vivement, le quartier est vraiment sympathique.

Highly recommend!!!
- simple and quick check in, comfortable with check out.
- very clean 
- well equipped for cooking
- tasteful design
- great location
Great value for money !
A really great apartment, everything was perfect. The apartment is very clean and located very well. I would really recommend it to anyone visiting Barcelona :)

Very nice, clean and comfortable apartment -  friendly hosts and easy communication! We had a great weekend and can only recommend Eberhard and Aurelie's place. It offered everything we needed. Thank you!

Tout était comme décrit et prévu. Accueil très bien organisé. Appart vaste et super sympa. Communs de l'immeuble impeccables. Situation idéale dans un quartier facile d'accès, très bien desservit en transport public, plein de bons restos pour se reposer après une journée a découvrir la ville.  Très bonne literie.

The flat is amazing (i actually walked in and directly said "I could always live here"), nice rooms, excellent location! The hosts are very clear in all communications and give you plenty of tips on how to get around and such. Excellent experience!

Beautiful apartment in a relaxing area of Barcelona, close to metro stops and everything you could need. I really enjoyed my stay and felt completely at home, I would definitely come back and stay here again.

Super appartement tres bien situé dans le centre de Barcelone. 
Nous avons été très bien accueillis et l'agent en charge de l'appartement a été à notre ecoute lorsque nous avons besoin d'elle. 
L'appartement est parfaitement propre et la literie confortable. 
Je recommande !

After four days at Eberhard & Aurélies apartment, I have only positive things to say, the location is perfect, It's close to Valguer and Sagrada familia metro, and It's close to cafe's and supermarket's. The apartment is clean, and It has a great balcony. I'm definitely booking this apartment again.

The flat was exactly as pictured on the announce. It is situated at the third floor of a five floor condominium - it is big, bright and modern. There are two bedrooms with a double bed each and another room with a sofa which becomes a third bed - us five had enough room but the flat could be perfect also for six people. There are also two bathrooms, a big living room with a table, chairs and a sofa and a fully equipped kitchen. There is air condition, tv, wifi perfectly working and the host provided maps and useful informations about the area, which is very safe and well served by public transport and stores. The Sagrada Familia, Casa Battló and many other attractions are just few minutes away on foot. We were grated by a colleague of Eberhard and Aurélie who was very kind and helpful.
We really recommend this flat and if we'll go back to Barcellona we definitely are going to stay at this place again!

My wife and her parents stayed for four days and had a great experience. The apartment is walking distance to sagrada familia and tetuan metro is only minutes away to zip to any part of the city. The apartment is in a nice neighborhood, we never felt unsafe walking home late at night and its very close to a few restaurants that we walked to in the mornings for coffee. The building was pretty quiet for the most part, we didn't have any problems sleeping at night because of noise.  Great place, would definitely stay again if we visit Barcelona again.
Great communication, welcome, timing and flat. thoroughly recommended, a lovely little flat and fabulous base to explore the city!

I arrived a day late so I didn't have contact with the agent who meet the others to let them into the apartment.  I would not describe the flat as Elegant but more like Modern.   Sparse clean lines, updated kitchen and baths. The A/C worked great and the rooms  were charming with balconies that opened for great light in the large bedroom and living area.  The kitchen was equipped great and all of our needs were met.  We loved the location. Great for walking.  Great French bakery across the street with pastries and espresso two or more grocery and fruit stores within a block.  Local restaurants nearby.
Great place.  We had a lovely stay.  Magui was very helpful and accommodating at check in and check out.

We had a lovely stay. It was easy to find their place with very good directions provided. The lady that met us explained everything, gave us a map and marked good places to eat etc. We can really recommend this listing and it's easy to travel by metro all around Barcelona.

Eberhard & Aurélie hebben er alles aan gedaan om onze reis naar het appartement zo goed mogelijk te laten verlopen. Ze hebben veel communicatie uitgestuurd met tips, een routebeschrijving, diverse luxe opties (gevulde koelkast, bagage ophalen en naar het vliegveld brengen op de laatste dag,...) en het appartement is precies zoals op de foto's.

Alles is keurig verzorgd en het ontbreekt werkelijk aan niets. Bij aankomst waren we in de gelegenheid om vragen te stellen en kregen we een korte uitleg over de voorzieningen in de buurt. 

Wij raden dit appartement zeker aan en mochten wij Barcelona weer bezoeken, dan hopen we dat we hier weer terecht kunnen.

Es hat uns sehr gut in der Wohnung gefallen. Sie ist geschmackvoll eingerichtet und optimal von der Lage. Wir würden jederzeit wieder bei Eberhard und Aurelie die Wohnung in Barcelona buchen. Absolut top
Perfect!

Me and me aunt had the best time here! Beautiful appartement, well situated, no noise and I totally fell for the design/architecture of that place. Really spacious and clean. Perfect. On top I must add that I have some very irregular scheduele and they could welcome us at late hours. Thank you!

El apartamento de Eberhard & Aurélie es una excelente Opción para visitar Barcelona. Esta ubicado en un muy buen sitio, calmado, cerca a los sitios importantes y con gran variedad de tiendas y restaurantes a su alrededor. El apartamento es además amplio y muy limpio.

The flat was lovely and in a great location to move about the city. The hosts were extremely accommodating in allowing early checkin due to our flight arrival. I highly recommend this apartment for your trip to Barcelona.

Appartement idéalement situé que ce soit pour les balades à pied ou pour les accès au métro. Calme. Lumineux. Il manquait quelques équipements mais je suis sûre que les propriétaires donneront une suite favorable à nos remarques. Ils ont montré de la disponibilité pour répondre aux questions d'avant voyage. Nous sommes très satisfaits de notre séjour.

Out stay at Eberhard and Aurelie's flat was great. We were a 10 minute walk to the Sagrada Familia and the neighborhood was very safe and vibrant. The wifi in the flat was excellent and the beds were very comfortable. The hosts were very nice and the personal who met us when we checked in (Lizzi) was very nice and extremely informative. We will stay there again.
Un piso amplio, auténtico y funcional con todo lo necesario para una estancia en Barcelona. Aconsejable para los amantes de la volta catalana!

Apartamento correcto, con una decoración cuidada, bien situado para moverte por Barcelona. Muy buena atención por parte de los anfitriones y de las personas encargadas del Check-in. Bien para una familia, si son personas independientes, poca independencia de los espacios.

This was the perfect place to stay during our trip to Barcelona! The location was great, walking distance to the metro and close to a lot of great cafes! Maggie was wonderful and met us for check in and check out. She was very helpful and provided suggestions for various things to do during our stay. I would highly recommend staying here!

Once again, a great stay in Barcelona. The appartment is amazing, great location, very clean and has everything you need. The hosts offer many services and are very clear in communication. This place and the hosts are top notch :)

Logement fonctionnel et confortable. Proche de la Sagrada Familia où nous avons pu aller à pieds en quelques minutes. Les échanges avec Eberhard&Aurélie se sont fait très facilement. Merci de nous avoir accueillis!
최고의 위치, 넓고 쾌적함, 친절한 호스트.

Excelente departamento... lo amamos... esta impecable, limpio y tiene todo lo necesario para pasar un tiempo inmejorable en Barcelona... luego de caminar todo el dias y noche...volver a este departamento es lo mejor.
Tiene temperatura central, el agua caliente es perfecta, tele, luces, comodidad de camas... es tal cual las fotos. Eramos 3 chicas y si bien una de las habitaciones es interna ... todas todas son fabulosas. 
Solo falta Micro ondas.... por lo demas 100% recomendable!!!! sin duda alguna volveria a ese departamento... me quedaria a vivir ahi!!!!

Appartement agréable conforme au descriptif. L'immeuble est au calme, et il y a tout plein de petits commerces juste à côté (boulangerie, boucherie, fruits et légumes, superette...).
L'appart est à 10 minutes à pied de la sagrada familia, entouré de stations de métro qui sont à environ 10 minutes à pied maximum.

This place was perfect for our four days in Barcelona! It is in a great location with access to a lot of sights and fantastic restaurants and bars. The home is very clean and we felt very comfortable during the length of our stay.
It was spacious and clean. Will stay here again. Great value for money!
Great location. Cool well equipped flat. Really great stay
Great location, extremely helpful at check in and out, additional services great, especially after long flight. Vey happy.

This is a great apartment in a wonderful location very close to the Sagrada Familia. Lots of great restaurants and bars nearby. We loved the balcony and bright spaces in the newly renovated flat. A great find and would highly recommend!
Great flat! Modern, spacious, clean! Great balcony too. In a great part of the city close to shops and great food. Thanks so much for having us!
Good apartment close to Sagrada Familia

Eberhard and Aurelie were great hosts. Communication prior to coming was easy. They answered every question we had prior and during our stay. They were able to accommodate us when getting in early. They also have their own concierge service that helps you with groceries, babysitting, portable wifi, transportation, etc.  The flat is pretty centrally located with public transportation to help you get around or walk by foot.  The kitchen is well equipped.
The few things I had an issue with were the noise level daily with construction going on to the building, lack of a safe for passports and lack of extra towels. Of course there is a washer where you can wash your own, however, after a long day of touring, you usually don't have the time to do so and wait for another set of towels. We would definitely recommend this place to our friends and family

Great place and within 10 minutes of walking distance to Sagrada Familia. Metro station is 10 minutes walk in either direction. 
The only down side was the air conditioning was not working properly and it can be unbearable in summer.
The apartment was clean and nice.

Apartamento muy agradable! 
Jaime la persona que se encarga de las instalaciones, es muy bonito y muy ponctual. Los fotos son representationes de la vivienda. 
Recomendo este apartamento.
Top Lage, sehr großzügig, gute Kontakte der Gastgeber  - und Barcelona ist halr einfach richtig schön!

This place is pretty close to the prototypical perfect AirBnB.  Spacious, clean, safe, bright, well-located, aesthetically pleasing, comfortable, new appliances, thoughtful lighting, and quiet.  I was visiting with my wife and our 4 year old daughter (and my 70 year old mother for the first night.  This was our third AirBnB in Spain this trip and it was exactly what we desired.  Eberhard&Aurélie are architects and they certainly brought their professional understanding of space and light to the design of the unit. Everything is thoughtful and the lighting allowed us to create a calm, blissful home base. Great daylight during the day, too. The AC worked very well.  We did not meet Eberhard&Aurélie as they were out of town but we did meet Jamie, their awesome property manager/host who let us in and showed us how the place works. Jamie was fantastic and a huge help; not only did he arrive exactly as planned but he arranged taxis for us to get back to the airport as well.  This place was a great base to visit the Sagrada Familia but also awesome for walking through the Eixample area which is pretty coo; a great 20 minute walk not only passed a subway station but also landed us in the shopping district along Passeig de Gràcia.  The neighbourhood around the apartment is quiet and residential but there are still lots of restaurants and bars nearby.  This place is highly recommended.  Thank you Eberhard&Aurélie for having us!

Wifi doesn't work well, air conditioner is very bad - doesn't work properly. Our flight was delayed and Jaime charged us a very absurd price due to the small delay, also there is a very sketchy "new turist rule" that he also charged per person as soon as we got in the apartment that ended up being more than 60 euros. Our stay ended up getting extremely pricey and was not worth the money, since Jaime was also very rude as a host. He did an unappropriate comentary to me refering at my profile picture when we were getting to see the apartment. Also, the check-out was stated to be at 11:00am and I received a message from him on the day of the checkout at 9am that the check-out would be at 10:30am instead. We were rushing to shower and get our things packed when at 10:00am the woman that was signed up to clean the house entered without ringing the bell and we were covered in towels leaving the shower and it was a very unpleasant moment. WOULD NOT RECOMMEND THIS APARTMENT/HOST.
Piso muy bonito, ideal para 3 parejas.

Appartement très bien situé, proche de la Sagrada Familia et des stations de métro. 
Appartement agréable mais un petit peu bruyant à cause des travaux en cours dans les étages inférieurs.
Logement conforme à la photo, bien situé, hôte gentil et patient
Muy bueno todo, tal cual las fotos
Ottima posizione ed appartamento silenzioso.

We booked the apartment for a surprise birthday weekend for my boyfriend and it didn't disappoint! Great location, fantastic cafes and bars near by and Jaime (who met us at the apartment) was so patient and helpful! Thank you for the wonderful stay
Sehr schöne Unterkunft. Absolut zu empfehlen
Nice apartment, very good communication, excellent flexibility around check-in. Nice and clean. Just as advertised.
地理位置很好,离景区都很近步行就可以了,周围吃的也很多,很方便,房间基本都可以就是厕所浴室太小了,基本只能容纳一个人,4个人住要排队洗澡有点麻烦,隔音不太好,其他都OK

This apartment is basic but very clean and large and quiet. It would suit a group of friends. We arrived early and the host agreed to meet us earlier than normal check in. He arrived exactly on time and was very friendly and helpful. It is about a 10 minute walk to the nearest metro and close to Sagrada Familia. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay.

This apartment was very clean and in the perfect location!! We loved that there was an elevator to help with getting luggage up to the apartment and everything was simple but well acquainted and very true to the listing. Wonderful water pressure in the shower and loved having the wash machine (with detergent included :)).  Jaime was wonderful - he met us early and explained everything in detail  before leaving - he was just perfect. THANK YOU SO MUCH!

We had a great stay at the apartment which was clean and modern. There was the very useful washing machine, a/c and everything we needed for a comfortable stay. The apartment was also close to restaurants,  shops and public transport. We were met by Jaime who was most helpful and ready with suggestions for great food tips for our stay. I would definitely stay again.

It's a spacious apartment very close to the Sagrada Familia. Not super close to public transit/the center of Barcelona, so there wasn't much to do around there. On a nice day it was a nice walk to the Gothic quarter through Parc de la Ciutadella. Clean apartment with enough for basic cooking. There was a bit of noise from the inner courtyard (smaller room) at night as we had to sleep with the windows open (we didn't test out the A/C, but it was too warm in early November to sleep without the window open). Middle room (with the small pullout couch) is in an awkward place, given the glass-block window facing the shower. Would be pretty awkward to sleep there and have someone else showering (the glass blocks don't block much, to say the least).

The apartment is very nice and clean and big enough to accomodate us (2 families with 4 adults and 3 babies). 

The area is quite but very well served (including supermarkets within 200 meters from the apartment) and walking distance to the Sagrada Familia. 

Absolutely recommended.
Buen departamente reciclado a nuevo cerca del metro , bien ubicado , y maggi nos evacuo todas las dudas
My group had a tremendous experience renting out his flat. I highly suggest anyone who’s considering this to take it. Exactly what you need!
Excelentes anfitriones y el apartamento espectacular... quisiera vivir ahí jajajaja espero volver pronto muchas gracias hasta la próxima.

Great stay! We booked the apartment a day before flying. The host's communication was brilliant & eased any last minute stresses. Apartment was great, ideal for myself, sister & mum with a bedroom each. Bathroom & separate WC, comfortable beds, kitchen with coffee maker, cooker, fridge, dishwasher, washing machine. Apartment was ideally situated for visiting Sagrada de Familia, & with easy acess to the Monumental Metro station to all the other city sights.  The hosts kindly recommended a great cocktail & tapas bar - La Fianna - which made our stay even more enjoyable. Could not recommend enough. Thank you.
非常市中心的位置｡距离圣家堂步行不到10分钟即可到达｡住在这里,可以步行去很多景点,十分方便｡房东热情好客,房间很大,有两个卫生间,洗澡什么都很方便｡装修属于现代风,很有味道｡强烈推荐入住!
좋아요

The host was SUPER friendly and we really loved the space! It's a cool place for younger, modern people especially but everyone will like it because it's so neat and tidy. It's a really bright space with a lovely ceiling and awesome lights. Close to some interesting attractions and there's a supermarket just next to it which is quite handy. Would book again!

This apartment is beautiful. Probably my favorite airbnb I have ever stayed in. The natural light is gorgeous and the location cannot be beat. We didn't want to leave and had a hard time saying goodbye; even our Barcelona friends that saw the place said, "can we live here when you check out?" The place was delightfully Barcelona; we adored sitting on the balcony in the morning light drinking our coffees and watching the residents of the other buildings hang their clothing out to dry. What an experience! 
The check-in was easy and our hosts were flexible when we had trouble getting our bags and ended up being late. You will find everything you need in the kitchen to cook, but bring your own food supplies, as this apartment was spotlessly clean without a speck of food, apart from a little sugar, coffee and oil. There's plenty of shops and restaurants in the area to stock up with so there won't be trouble finding what you need. 
I cannot recommend this place enough. We adored it and have no interest in staying anywhere else in Barcelona.

This apartment was in a great location - a 15 min walk to Sagrada Familia, a 15 min walk to Casa Mila, and a 5-10 min walk to several different Metro lines.  The beds were very comfortable, bathrooms nice & clean upon arrival, Wifi and AC both worked well.  I have recommended they get a larger coffee pot - the current one only makes enough for 2-3 people.

We had an issue with a running toilet and no hot water in the main bathroom on the last day of our stay, but the hot water was fixed within the day.  Eberhard responded to all requests & inquiries in a timely manner, which we really appreciated.

Be aware that if you want to book the taxi pick-up/drop-off option through the Air BnB link this needs to be completed more than 24 hours in advance of when you need it.

Nice flat that is accurately described and is in a good location. The 'OK' rating is due to that fact that on arrival we were advised that one of the two toilets in the flat was broken and would be fixed the next day. However, the next day (before 8am) we were advised that it would not be fixed until later in the week. This caused some inconvenience and was disappointing. Otherwise, the rating would have been higher.
Schönes Appartment in toller Lage. Alles prima.
very good location
Great flat, great location and amazing hosts. Clean, stylish and comfortable! The host are superclear in communication and offer lots more extra services. Top airbnb!

The apartment is very spacious, clean, quiet, in a great neighborhood, close to the metro and good restaurants. We enjoyed the minimalist style in the decoration and the comfort of the beds. Communication with our hosts was easy and direct. We highly recommend it!

Loved our stay here the apartment is so beautiful, clean and comfortable with all amenities you could need. The added airport transfers made our stay stress free. Also any questions we had we always received a quick response. Would definitely recommend to anyone looking for a perfect place to stay in Barcelona!
A great flat right in the middle of the city.  The flat was very modern, clean, and exactly what we needed.  The local contact Magui was very helpful.  We highly recommend!

This was our first stay with Airbnb and was made into such a wonderful experience! Stellar communication made us feel attended to, the place was a wonderful location and checking in early was a huge help. We thoroughly enjoyed the beautiful, well-lit space and felt secure and safe in the flat. It was a perfect spot to walk to whatever we needed. It truly felt like our home away from home!

Excellent apartment well located in the center of the city. Was more than big enough for 5 of us to stay over an extended weekend. Check in and check out went very smoothly and the apartment was exactly as advertised. Would recommend to all.
Heerlijke plek, goed ontvangst. Met de taxi nog geen €10 kwijt om aan de haven te komen
Our stay was amazing, just as expected. The host is very nice and very quick at responding to messages. The apartment is very beautiful and a good location.
Eberhard & Aurelie's apartment was beautiful. Amazing location, quiet, spacious, comfortable. Perfect place to explore Barcelona from!

This is a charming old apartment building in a real neighborhood.  It has a skinny elevator, narrow stairs and is dripping with character.  Scenes from movies could occur anywhere inside. It was exactly what we were looking for. 

The apartment looks out on the inside of the block, not to the street. It's quiet but there's no distant views. 

The people you see on the street live there. The shops and restaurants nearby are genuine neighborhood places.  When you go in and out, when you walk around the hood, you're getting a taste of how people live in great cities. 

Transit is every where and there's lots of famous things in walking distance. We had a great walk to the harbor, stumbled on to two of the three train stations and of course that big famous church is right up the street.  Walk ten blocks in any direction and surprise and delight are all about.
Great place to stay. Brilliant location and great responses from the host. Would highly recommend.

This Flat was in a good location and very clean. Only issue we had is we did not have any AC the entire stay and it was between 26-28 degrees in the loft the entire time, we could not leave windows open as it was very noisy due to hallway construction on the main floor.  Other then that the place was a good value and a good location.
Hôte unique et très gentil! Merci pour le séjour!

Ever hard and Aurelia are great hosts. They responded our questions within minutes and provided us very helpful information. The apartment is in great location, only 9 minuets from Sagrada Familia. We can also walk to La Rambla and Cathedral. There are super markets, shops and restaurants nearby. The apartment is very clean. Kitchen has all we need. We will definitely stay in this apartment if we come to Barcelona again.

Unser Aufenthalt war super. Es war alles vor Ort, wie beschrieben. Wir haben uns sehr wohl gefühlt in der Wohnung. 
Die gute Lage  hat uns ermöglicht alles schnell und möglichst unkompliziert zu erreichen.
Empfehlenswert!

Lovely flat, great location, everything we needed! Check in was really easy and we arranged a transfer from the airport with the airbnb which was great.  Easy to get everywhere from the flat either by public transport or walking, and some lovely restaurants very close to the flat.
A lovely, stylish flat in a great location.

This apartment was great!  It has great lighting, it's quiet and the beds are comfortable.  It was a great size for the four of us and we could have easily had another person stay and it would not have been crowded.  The location was great.  We were close to metro stops and went to the bakery/cafe across the street every morning (Teixidó).  

We were warmly welcomed and although we never needed to contact Aurélie & Eberhard, we knew they would be responsive.  

We'd love to stay there again next time we're in Barcelona.

This is a really clean and large space.  There was plenty of room for my mother, myself and my daughter to relax.  It is close to the Sagrada Familia and LOTS of great restaurants within a few minute walk.  I would definitely stay here again.
Nice flat very close to Sagrada and metro station

We very much enjoyed our time in Barcelona.  The apartment was very comfortable and well located so that we were able to walk to  many of the places we wanted to visit.  Unfortunately, there was a problem with the electricity supply throughout our visit which meant that the power went off whenever we tried to use even a small number of electrical appliances.  The hosts tell me this problem has now been fixed so it shouldn’t be a problem for future guests.

Lovely apartment which was bigger than expected. The check in process was effortless and the flat was super clean. Location had plenty of supermarkets, coffee shops and local restaurants.

It’s only a few flights up but also has an elevator for those with bigger bags.

Thanks for having us on such short notice!
I had a great stay! Would highly recommend because of location and decor.

We loved the fast communication and flexible check in time! Such a perk that is great for Americans flying in overnight and need a place to relax In the morning and put down our bags. Great location. Hoping to rebook!
Great flat with 3 bedrooms. Owners were very responsive and kind at all times. Would definitely suggest anyone to stay at this place.

name: Beautiful 2Bed/2Bath | Ocean View | Steps to Beach
summary: Enjoy our beautiful 2 bedroom 2 bathroom condo in the Kamaole Sands Resort that sleeps 4; the beach with clear and warm waters is just a few steps away! Air conditioned, parking and high speed internet included. Please note: The Kamaole Sands Resort charges a one-time resort fee of $61.46 upon check-in. This fee includes the use of all complex amenities, WiFi, parking, etc. The resort fee is in addition to Airbnb total price.
space: Aloha, welcome to Kamaole Sands, at our beautiful unit with nice ocean and mountain views. This complex is the premiere resort in South Kihei, just a couple blocks away from Wailea. You will find yourself just steps away from the beautiful Kamaole Beach III (Kamaole Beaches I and II are just a short walk up the coast). All are famous for their white sands & crystal-clear water, beautiful sunsets, whale watch, family friendly atmosphere, swim and fantastic snorkeling.  There are 15 acres of lush tropical landscaping, waterscapes, lush gardens, fountains and tropical birds. Some of the many conveniences and amenities featured at this resort include: four tennis courts (racquet rental and court reservations can be made at the front desk), a large pool, two hot tubs, children's wading pool, eight gas BBQ grills, picnic area, cyber cafe, exercise room and a 24-hour front desk, internet access and activity center. Also enjoy complimentary Mai Tai’s and hula dancing by the pool every Wednesda
