neighborhood_overview: Haleakala Shores is located within a 25 minute drive from Kahalui Airport. Top restaurants are within walking distance of the condo. The world class Wailea Golf Course is within a 5 minutes drive. The Kamaole Beach Park III is just across the street in front of the resort. It is a family friendly beach with clear waters. Nine top golf courses are located within a 25 minute drive. Shopping is within walking distance and the luxurious Wailea Shopping Village is only a five minute drive. A cinema is also only minutes away.
notes: Enjoy the beautiful island!
transit: The best way to explore the island is by car.
access: The guest will receive the access instructions at the front desk of the resort.
interaction: We are locally present and reachable.
house_rules: Neighborly Conduct: You will be staying in a privately owned property that has neighbors. Please ensure that you act in a neighborly and courteous manner towards your neighbors. Please keep noise to a minimum before 8:00 am and after 10:00 pm. Please treat the property, its furniture, fittings, utensils and other facilities with all due care and respect. Please treat the property and the neighbors with the respect you would want others to treat yours. Furnishings: Furniture, bedding, mattress pads, kitchen equipment, utensils or any other property supplied with the rental property must not be moved. Loss of these items, as well as damage to the property or furnishings in excess of normal wear will be charged to you. All contents of the home are the property of the owner. If something should break, you must notify Midway before check-out so that a replacement can be made. Guests are not permitted to alter the wiring of the television. Only people listed on AirBnB listing allowed in unit

host.host_about:
Welcome to Midway Realty, we are a licensed full-service real estate management company and Travel Agency specializing in high-quality destination vacation rentals in Waikiki on the beautiful island of Oahu.

Our objective is to help you create a memorable vacation where you and your Ohana (Hawaiian for family) will make new memories… rejuvenate, relax and refresh relationships by providing you with a complete Hawaiian experience and atmosphere full of quality time in Hawaii Nei (beautiful Hawaii).

- No surprises! Plenty of photos of each rental unit on our website. You accurately know what to expect before you arrive.

- All units are fully furnished, all properties provide dishware, cookware, bed linens, towels, and initial start-up supplies (toiletries). Enjoy the comforts of home in paradise.

- Dedicated Property Manager for each condo we manage. If you have questions, problems or concerns, you will always have someone to contact at any time during your stay.

- All units are professionally cleaned prior to your arrival by our superb housekeeping staff.

- We take pride in providing superior rental properties. We take great care in maintaining our high standards and attention to details.

reviews.comments: This spot was fantastic. Good location, clean, safe, secure, met all expectations. We stayed as 2 couples but would also be suitable for families. We loved our unit. Will return here again for future trips!

transit: To reach us, there are a lot of options: -Metro - line E-Violet (Aeroporto – Estádio do Dragão), then go out inTrindade station and catch another metro to S. Bento (yellow line). The Andante ticket needed for this journey can be purchased at any of the automatic ticket machines in the Metro station – occasional ticket (Z4). It costs 2.30€, is valid for 1 hour and 15 minutes and is also rechargeable. If you come by metro then you have to walk all the Rua das Flores till Largo S.Domingos, then turn right to Rua do Belomonte, continue staight and you'll find Rua das Taipas and the apartment (10 minutes walking). -To get to the city center by bus, you can take either line 601 or 602, the last stop is 5minutes walking from the apartments, they stop at Cordoaria and you just need to go down Taipas Street (on the right side of Centro Português de Fotografia – cpf). reviews.comments: it was great stay in Maggie's place.
The apartment is just like in the pictures, was comfortable, clean and in a nice area of Porto. Self check-in (we arrived in the evening) was easily done. Would stay here again!
A nice, clean apartment on walking distance from the old city centre

Very good location, Safe, clean, quiet except for the occasional chorus of angry sea gulls. Easy walk to everywhere. We dragged our roller bags from train station. The last half was a bit uphill. Maggie was friendly and gave an excellent briefing on our arrival. The bed is a full size, smaller than queen, a bit small for 2 people. The mattress was a bit firm for me.  The couch was not very comfortable.  I would have liked a top sheet because the duvet was too warm.  Overall a good value.

Maggie’s apartment is in a great location in Porto, a short walk to the front port and bridge, as well as nearby attractions further in land. Her apartment is surrounded by wonderful restaurants, we were spoiled for choice. Check in was super simple and easy, and the apartment was everything we needed in terms of space and facilities.

Jess

name: Large private room in Bondi 15mins from Beach!
summary: Look no further for your little home away from home! Your very own queen-sized, private room right in the heart of Bondi. I'm a Bondi local and will give you all sorts of tips on what to do, where to eat, where to go for drinks - the best ways to enjoy your stay in Sydney! Conveniently located for great cafes, walking distance to the iconic Bondi beach/Tamarama Beach/Bronte Beach, and transport to Bondi Junction. There's also plenty of free street parking if you need as well.

notes: Once you arrive in Hong Kong, everything is quite simple. *All starts with a call from the FREE phones at the airport located in the hall immediately after you pass through baggage customs.  *If you would like some maps or local travel guides to read, there is a Visitor Centre at the airport, or simply text us in the Airbnb app. *If you need a local SIM card, there is a 7-11 in the middle section of the main arrival hall (PCCW brand suggested). *Please message me if you have any questions regarding the apartment/location. I look forward to hosting you very soon! 一旦抵达香港,一切都很简单｡ *所有通过行李海关后,立即通过位于大厅内的机场的免费电话致电｡ *如果您想要一些地图或当地旅游指南来阅读,那么在机场有一个游客中心,或者只需在Airbnb应用程序中给我们发短信即可｡ *如果您需要本地SIM卡,主入站大厅的中间部分有7-11(建议使用PCCW品牌)｡ *如果您对公寓/位置有任何疑问,请给我留言｡ 我期待着能够尽快見到你!
transit: Transportation: 5-minute walk to East Tsim Sha Tsui MTR station (Exit K). - Near Sheration Hotel. 2-minutes walk to Tsim Sha Tsui MTR station (Exit B2). - Near K11 art mall. 45 minutes by A21 direct express bus from HK airport. 30 minutes by Airport Express train from HK airport. 交通: 步行5分钟至尖东站(K出口)｡ - Sheration酒店附近｡ 步行2分钟至尖沙咀地铁站(B2出口)｡ - 靠近K11艺术商场｡ 从香港机场乘坐A21直达快线巴士45分钟｡ 从香港机场乘机场快线30分钟｡

reviews.comments: 挺不错的,交通便利,环境安静｡

The place is a typical hongkong apartment got separated into several rooms. Even though it’s small(which is the case for every place in HK), it’s has everything. The price is a steal for its location.

My partner and I traveled with our baby and this room was totally clean and perfect. The details in the room make it much more cozy than other rooms I’ve seen. It’s definitely more spacious than the typical room you’ll find in Hong Kong. The location is super convenient, right in the heart of TST where isquare is. Check in is very easy and you never see the host in person, but the host was very responsive when you have questions or needs. I would probably stay in this room again.
Lighting was a bit dim in the room. Maybe adding white lights can help. But overall, it was okay. Everything was clean.. and cute :) Location is perfect.
Excellent location on Nathan Rd., but windows facing the quiet yard. Good size for Hong Kong, very new and stylish.

The location of the flat is great. Its easy access to the MTR and the bus stop. The place is walking distance to the ferry. I love the place. Highly recommend for those who aint chosey to where they will sleep.

位置非常好,房间很干净也比较大｡
新装修的房子味道有点大,住了几天一直开着窗户｡床有点太高了,非常不方便,也没有椅子可以坐｡入住的时候发错了房间号,没找到到房卡,不过很快解决了｡
整体比较满意

It was more cozy and had perfect location than I expected. The room was clean, and all I need were prepared.
This was the best among I stayed before in Hongkong.

I had never been to Hong Kong and I made a last minute booking with the small amount of time I was there. The host communicated extremely well and getting to the apartment was relatively easy. The bed was outstanding in my opinion and I slept off some jet lag. I was not around long enough to get a handle on the location, but I took an early morning stroll through Kowloon park. It’s simply nice to have a park nearby. If you are traveling to and from HKG, the bus A21 or A22 is definitely the way to go rather than the train. I’m sure there’s some better deals than that which I received with the knight Hub, but considering the privacy and the last minute booking, and that it’s Hong Kong, I think it was very reasonable.

房間很整潔跟乾淨
讓人住得很舒適
該有的日常用品都有
而且旅館位置很方便
外面就是港鐵站跟公車站
伴手禮店就在附近
值得一住的旅館!
location 很好.去哪里都很方便｡房主也非常的nice.

非常棒的房東,回覆率超快的!
房間非常跟照片一樣美麗,沒有落差｡
地點在非常鬧區的尖沙咀,去其他地方也都方便｡
唯一小缺點是隔音比較差一些,鄰居大聲吵鬧就會聽到,但不影響房間整體的完美｡
非常感謝房東的美麗房間與熱情回覆,下次如果在來香港一定會回住｡
飯
建议不要抱太高期望,香港房子小得很,如果没有清洁,完全没法住,脏,乱,差,需然房东还好,说等二小时做清洁,但心里已有阴影,直接没住,回广州了
离尖沙咀的各个商圈都很近,地理位置超好,下楼出门就是地铁口,交通非常方便!虽然是一套房子隔成不同房间的,但是一点也不会影响自己的独立空间,居住环境舒适整洁!房主待人处事非常nice!如果想买买买,就住这里就行,周边满足你的一切!
周边购物场所与美食很多,房间很有格调,安全､干净｡

性价比很不错
下次会再去的
房东很nice
ok
房東親切,住宿位置方便!地方乾淨!
位置很好,就在弥敦道上,值得入住｡

Nestled in the peaceful, quiet and lush complex of Kihei Garden Estates, this is an open, airy and spacious loft unit. Come relax and enjoy a glass of wine on your private lanai and sink your toes into the nearby sand.

neighborhood_overview: Maui’s unique and varied terrain offers a multitude of activities. From relaxing on some of the world’s most beautiful white sand beaches to the more adventurous undertakings of zip-lining and paragliding. Kihei Garden Estate's location is such that there are many activities and attractions right at your finger tips. Some of Maui’s top attractions are: Maalaea Harbor - 6 miles - Many boats leave from Maalaea on snorkeling trips, deep sea fishing, scuba diving, whale watching (in season), sunset cruises, and more. It is much faster to leave from Maalaea Harbor than Lahaina Harbor when taking trips to Molokini Crater and Turtle Town. Other attractions include Maui Ocean Center, Haleakala Volcano, Shops at Wailea, Iao Valley, Wailea Golf Club, King Kamehameha Golf Club, Maui Tropical Plantation, and the Whale Sanctuary. The town of Kihei is a quant, laid-back beach town boasting some of Maui’s most pristine stretches of white sand and turquoise waters. South Maui is fun for couples and fa
transit: Kihei is only a 20 minute commute from the Maui airport and is the perfect location if you want to explore the island. Centrally located, accessing any part of Maui is easy from Kihei. We always recommend renting a car and we have access to better rates with AVIS and BUDGET, please contact us so we can assist you with booking.
access: This serene and newly renovated loft unit is comfortable, spacious and modern. Upstairs on the loft you will find a large bedroom with an en suite bathroom. Open up for sunlight and garden views. Downstairs you will find a cooling ceiling fan spinning from the high ceiling, a large, plush sofa sleeper, and a flat screen TV. Air Conditioning provides cool air for the living areas. Enjoy the convenience of a newly remodeled and fully stocked kitchen (includes blender, coffee maker, cookware, microwave, cooking range and oven, full-sized refrigerator, rice cooker, ice maker, and toaster) and a spacious breakfast bar area. Cook yourself a wonderful meal then sip your coffee or enjoy your Mai Tais on the oversized private Lanai, (complete with cushioned seating), attached to this unit.  Off of the kitchen and living space is a comfortable master bedroom equipped with a full bathroom. This unit can easily accommodate a part of six guests. Great location, tasteful decor, comfortable seating a
interaction: We are always available to be reached via email or phone. We have a cleaning team on call; additional cleaning could be arranged at a $50 fee, generally our long stay guests take advantage of this service. Our Maintenance team is on call and can assist at any time. Check-in and Check-out are very simple. We send you a pre-arrival email that has all necessary information on how to get to the condo, what the electronic door lock code is, pool access code, how to access laundry room, etc. We recommend you print the email prior to the trip or saving it on your smart phone to easily access it when you arrive at the complex. A private Concierge is always standing by to help with any activity bookings, island recommendations and restaurant reservations.

host.host_about:
I am hospitality professional, who genuinely cares about creating great vacation experiences for our guests. Prior to assisting with vacation rentals, I worked for high end, well known hotel chains and private hotels for over 17 years. Hospitality is my passion, to ensure that our guests have a great booking and stay experience is always my priority.  
We offer discounted rental car reservations, travel insurance and concierge services to help you make the most of your Maui vacation. Our team of guest experience specialists consists of Paige, Carine, Taylor, Jennifer and Tim, they help me connect, respond and assist our guests 24 hours a day, 7 days a week. I am so proud that we are able to offer warm, friendly, professional and resort quality services in an un-hotel setting for our guests. 
I love to engage in all different forms of art in my spare time, I draw, dance and aspire to play the drums. I love Maui, it would be hard to imagine living at another place, other than paradise.
Mahalo for reading. I hope we get the opportunity to assist you with your next Maui vacation!

reviews.comments: Viktoria provided great recommendations on where to eat and activities on the island.  All her suggestions were spot on and fantastic.

Great location...1/2 block from the beach. There is a grocery store is in walking distance and other food/shopping centers close by. The center of Kehei activities are a short driving distance. 

The property itself is well maintained and
clean. We used the outside grilling area near the pool. The condo has all the needed amenities and is great for a small family/group.

Viktoria and her staff are exceptional...very responsive and provided suggestions for activities, local dining experiences, and places to visit. 

My daughter enjoyed her “Sweet 16” celebration!!

This property is second to none for location.  It is ideal for one couple with the main floor bedroom nicely air conditioned.  We have suggested that the air conditioning unit in the living room be taken off of the one hour timer that runs it.  This timer prevents the loft area from being cooled down and with the timer the loft is not usable as a sleeping area.  The property is nicely furnished and has a nice layout.
They have everything for you, even beach chairs and boogie boards!

We had a great time at Viktoria’s place in Kihei! The beach close to the condominium is perfect, the sunset is just amazing! The place has everything you need and Viktoria is really easy to communicate. Don’t hesitate to stay there!

This is a very well laid out condo with plenty of room. The loft area was ideal for my daughter and her fiancé. Great pool and jacuzzi area and amazing location to the beach, grocery store and a local restaurant/bar Nalus which quickly became our “local”. 
We had so much fun here! Thank you!!
We will be back

name: Hono Kai # C10
summary: On the southern edge of the isthmus that forms Maui’s Central Valley, lies a thriving yet tranquil community: Ma’alaea, population 352, plus or minus. This intriguing corner of Maui includes a bustling boat harbor offering excursions that range from whale and dolphin watches to snorkel and snuba adventures to romantic dinner and sunset sails to chartered fishing expeditions.
space: Adjacent to the Marina are the Ma’alaea Harbor Shops, including The Maui Ocean Center Aquarium (voted Maui’s nbr.1 attraction), The Maui Golf and Sport Park for mini golf, water bumper boats, extreme trampoline and rock climbing, and various shops, restaurants, and a gas station. And then, tucked away off the main roads, on a secluded cul-de-sac named Hauoli Street (Hawaiian for Happy Street), you’ll find a small community of laid-back direct oceanfront resorts. The Hono Kai Resort is one of these. The Hono Kai’s four 2-and 3-story buildings rise just above the white sands of Ma’alaea Beach, facing the bay straight-on. From the pool and barbecue areas, you have a panoramic, nothing peek-a-boo about it coastline view that extends down to the Makena cinder cone, up the heights of Haleakala, and that sweeps out across the bay to the sunken volcanic cinder cone of Molokini Crater and neighbor island, Kaho'olawe. Lounge chairs are lined up on the front lawn at the ocean’s edge to give you a

name: Perfect and charming apt in Leblon
summary: Enjoy the best of Rio de Janeiro, in the best neighborhood.The apartment comfortably accommodates 5 people. Quiet and well equipped. In a walking distance from Leblon Beach and the trendy Dias Ferreira street, full of restaurants/bars.
space: Very cozy apartment, bright and quiet! It is fully furnished and we provide linen, duvets and towels. In the first room there is a double bed, ventilator, air conditioning and a wardrobe. In the second bedroom there are 3 single beds, cable TV, ventilator and air conditioning. In the living room there is cable TV, WIFI, air conditioning, and a stereo with connection for iPod/iPhone 4.  The kitchen is equipped for any type of cuisine with all the necessary utensils. Microwave, oven, stove, fridge/freezer and blender. There is also a service area with washing machine and dryer and a little extra bathroom.

Guests have access to the entire apartment, except for a closet with private items in the hallway, that is closed. We are available by phone, (SENSITIVE
neighborhood_overview: Walking distance to Leblon beach, which is for everyone and there is also a playground space - "baixo Bebe". Or you can stay close to Rainha Guilhermina street, where nice people hang out. After the beach, a good choice is the famous Jobi bar, where you can have lunch and cold beers. You can also walk on the beach and watch the sunset.  Cafeina or Talho Capixaba are good choices for a delicious breakfast/brunch/coffee. Bibi Sucos have all kinds of juices and great sandwiches. For dinner, we recommend one of the fanciest restaurants in Dias Ferreira street, which is Sushi Leblon, and also Zuka, CT, Bodega (best risotto!), Pipo, Venga, the traditional La Mole and Pizzaria Guanabara, place of "carioca bohemia". Have fun! Enjoy the best of Baixo Leblon.
notes: Our doorman, Mr. Francisco (Chico), is a very nice and helpful person! Any problems or information do not hesitate to contact him. Check in until 11 PM.Check out anytime during the day.
transit: There is public transport in front of the building - a mini bus that runs up and down between Alto Leblon and Ipanema (bus number 503) and it costs R$ 3.00.  But you can easily walk too!
access: Guests have access to the entire apartment, except for a closet with private items in the hallway, that is closed.
interaction: We are available by phone, (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN), (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN) or email for any information (EMAIL HIDDEN) also during your stay. We are very happy to help with all kinds of information and services for your trip. We can for example indicate a driver or a cleaning service. We also have contacts in Buzios, Paraty and other places around Rio for hotels, trips, boat excursions, etc.
house_rules: Just relax!

host.host_about: Nos interessamos por viagens,gastronomia,Pets e fotografia! Nosso apt é muito aconchegante, especialmente planejado para receber hóspede, Bem vindos!

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.comments:
Nous étions 5 hommes chez Deborah, pour la coupe du monde 2014. L'appartement était très joli, propre, plus spacieux encore que sur les photos et très fonctionnel (magnifique tv, climatisation, cuisine, lave linge...). Nous avons été accueillis à l'heure, et Daniela était à notre disposition en cas de question.
L'appartement est bien placé, à quelques centaines de mètres de la mer, de bars très sympas (jobi, stuzzi,...), supermarchés, banques, ou restaurants parmi les plus côtés de la ville. Le quartier est très sécurisé.
Attention aux toilettes, qui, comme partout au Brésil, se bouchent facilement.
Je vous recommande donc chaudement cet appartement si vous cherchez confort et sécurité, en particulier si vous venez en famille, mais également en groupe d'amis si vous sortez pour faire la fête.

I stayed here during the world cup finals when Rio was extremely crowded, except in the apartment aria, it was calm, safe with security at the building gate, and surrounded with the best restaurants & bars in Rio. Still 5 mins walking we reached the Leblon beach. 
Facilities at the flat was perfect especially the internet it was excellent.  
P.S.: there was very nice lady welcomed us at the time of arrival and she gave us useful tips about Rio with map and directions and all in English ;)

On a été très bien accueilli. Rosanna était présente lors de la remise des clefs et du check in de l'appartement. Fransisco et les autres surveillants de l'immeuble sont d'une grande gentillesse et toujours souriant !
Adoramos o apartamento e a estadia. A localizacao é ótima e o apartamento bastante limpo e bem equipado. Tanto a Deborah quanto a Rosana, que nos recebeu, foram extremamente simpáticas e solícitas.

We are very glad Deborah apartment, very clean and very well located. Rosanna thank you for the help and caregivers for their kindness and help. YOu can go without problems it's really great.
A very goos stay.
I thought Deborah was a very good host. Very easy to get a hold of and quick to help out if I had any issues

We spent 4 days absolutely delicious in the apartment of Deborah. 3 children and 2 adults. Everything worked perfectly and the extreme kindness of Deborah served to make things even better. Thanks for everything.

Deborah's home in Río is wonderful! I can say that it even looks better in pictures, the location is in Leblon neighborhood, close to everything, in safe and beautiful surroundings.
 We received the house in excellent conditions through Deborah's sister Rosana, and the whole process was really smooth. 
Deborah is a great host, she was from day one worried about every detail, replying super fast to our inquiries and providing great information about places to go/eat. Deborah, muito obrigada for everything! We felt like home at your place.  I recommend this place 100% and would definitely stay here again.

If you're looking for a place away from the action of Ipanema and far away from the gritty tourist beach of Copacabana, this Leblon location will fit the bill.
 
Overall this is a very lovely apartment in the quiet and chic Leblon neighborhood, adjacent to Ipanema. However the location is aprox 20mins walk from the beach and the apartment is located up a very steep hill. Personally I am fond of hiking so this was fine for me. You can cab it up the hill but you'll have to hail a cab for a quick pickup which can be tough during rush hour. There is also a garage should you want to rent a car while you are there however several Carioca's suggested against due to crazy traffic and regular DUI stops. 

Deborah is very responsive to texts. Deborah manages the listing remotely and has Rosana directly manage the apartment. Rosanna was wonderful and always immediately responds to texts. The apartment truly felt like home and was well maintained. It's perfect for a couple.  

The Internet worked very well as well as all the appliances and there is a great big fridge for all your Brahma beer. The door men were always courteous and kept a close eye on everything.
The host canceled this reservation the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.
El departamento es hermoso y lleno de luz, el anfitrión nos recibió para aclarar todo tipo de dudas y hasta darnos pautas sobre dónde encontrar el supermercado más cercano, etc

Eu e minha mãe curtimos uma ótima semana no Rio. Deborah e sua irmã Rosana, que cuida do apartamento, foram super atenciosas e responderam todas as nossas dúvidas rapidamente por (Hidden by Airbnb) . O apartamento é muito bem equipado e fica numa área super tranquila do Leblon. Um pouco distante do comércio, para quem pretende se deslocar a pé, mas ideal para uma boa noite de sono longe do barulho das ruas do Rio. Seguramente, eu voltaria a me hospedar nesse apê!
The host canceled this reservation 56 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Very beautifull house, perfect and lovely!!!

Apartamento muito bem localizado, a anfitriã e seu marido Mark são pessoas muito atenciosas e prontas a ajudar caso seja necessário. Os porteiros do prédio são todos muito simpáticos e prestativos também. O apartamento é muito bem iluminado e equipado e o lugar muito agradável de se ficar. Muito obrigado Deborah e Mark por essa ótima estadia.
Excelente espaço, tranquilo e mto gostoso.
The host canceled this reservation 28 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Terrific apartment with great light and ventilation, good amount of space.In very good residential area of Alto Leblon, I timed trip down hill to beach at 18 min. Host was very responsive and helpful, extremely resonably priced for the area.

O apartamento é muito bem localizado, limpo e tão novo e bonito como as fotos. Destaque para a cozinha bem equipada e para o banheiro, que é novo, limpo, e tudo funciona otimamente bem. 
Tivemos alguns pontos negativos que pelo que pude ver acredito ser pontual. O ar do quarto principal faz um barulho muito alto e não tem condições de ligar. Esperávamos chegar e ter uma casa de casal e um beliche como mas fotos, mas nesse segundo só havia um colchão, e por estarmos em três, tivemos que dormir junto na cama de casal. Por último, no airbnb está descrito que o checkout é até as 20:00 mas fomos comunicados na noite anterior que teríamos que sair até as 12:00. Adiantamos o voo e fomos embora, sem problema. Como falei, acredito que seja "problemas" pontuais. No mais, o apartamento está em ótimo estado e recomendo. Basta combinar esses detalhes antes e terá uma excelente estadia.
Apartamento super agradável perto de alto Leblon fácil de locomover. Fui bem atendido pela anfitriã. Recomendo a todos o apartamento.

Deborah was a great host. She answered my message super fast, which was really important since our need of an apartment was very last minute. 
Her place cozy, comfortable and stylish. Not to mention the silence of the area and the incredible bird noises you hear as you wake up in the morning. 
Since it’s in the top of the hill you need a car for most things you want to do. But everything is very close by. This small distance gives you a sense of being outside of the big city caos, but still close enough when you want to be part of it. 
Totally recommend it! 
Thank you, Deborah!
Apartamento amplo, bem localizado, limpo e bem equipado. Anfitriã sempre disponível e flexível em todas as nossas demandas de horários para check In e check out. Recomendo!
Apartamento MUITO lindo, por um bom preço. É num lugar bem tranquilo sem muito barulho, é bem seguro. Mas somente 2-3 minutos dos restaurantes e praia. Eu recomendo esse apartamento e Deborah 100%.
O apartamento é muito limpo, bem equipado e espaçoso. O bairro é tranquilo e a anfitriã foi muito educada e gentil! Recomendo!
Não poderia ter sido melhor! Apartamento limpo, bem decorado e com tudo funcionando bem. Localização tranquila e porteiros extremamente receptivos.
El departamento es muy confortable
Läget kändes mycket säkert, dock ligger lägenheten uppför en lång backe så att ta sig fram och tillbaka flera gånger under en dag blir lite drygt.

Recomendamos absolutamente el apartamento de Deborah, es una persona muy preocupada de los detalles desde la llegada hasta el último día, el apartamento cumple con todo lo que ofrece y más, en un sector muy tranquilo y seguro, bien ubicado y elegante, para nosotros lo mejor son las comodidades del apartamento u su ubicación, también es destacable que cuenta con estacionamiento y que Deborah, te ayuda con cualquier dificultad que necesites solucionar.

100% Recomendable.

Fuè fantastico la estadia, un departamento lindo , espacioso, Pràctico, linda Vista, Muy tranquilo el barrio y en general todo muy agradable, estamos muy contentos de haber escogido este lugar, andabamos en auto y fuè còmodo y agradable que tuviera estacionamiento. cerca de todo! supermercado , metro , lugares como bares ,restaurantes para salir de noche. Efectivamente a la Playa caminando son casi 20 minutos. Pasamos unos dias maravillosos!
me encanta Rio !

Apartamento muito limpo e organizado. Destaque para as roupas de cama e banho: limpíssimas e de ótima qualidade. Apartamento em ótima localização, em rua muito tranquila e silenciosa, perto da praia. Destaque para os porteiros, muito gentis e solícitos.

O apartamento é muito confortável, mobiliado e equipado.
Toalhas e roupas de camas limpíssimas e de qualidade.
Ótima localização!
Anfitriã preocupada, atenciosa e sempre pronta para atender.
Recomendo 100%

Apartamento bem localizado, limpíssimo e bem equipado e decorado (muito bom gosto). Anfitriã super atenciosa me respondeu tudo que precisava com agilidade. Os porteiros também muito simpáticos e prestativos.
Eu e minhas 4 amigas vamos voltar mais vezes, com certeza, foi incrível!
Tive uma excelente estadia no RJ! O apartamento de Deborah não deixou nada a desejar, tudo perfeito! Só tenho a agradecer.

O apartamento é bem equipado, limpo e numa boa região. É perto de vários locais bons para passeios, mas é necessário utilizar carro. A anfitriã foi atenciosa e educada. Assim como os funcionários do prédio. Me senti em casa.
El departamento es muy lindo, cómodo . Esta muy bien equipado con todo lo necesario para la estadía.En un barrio hermoso.  La pasamos muy bien !!! Es muy recomendable.

El departamento es una belleza! Muy lindo y luminoso, esta a pocas cuadras de la playa lo que lo hace muy atractivo.
Todo excelente y seguramente volveremos! Muy recomendable!
Excelente apartamento, bem localizado, arejado, tudo limpo e muito bem arrumado. Comunicação excelente com a dona. Superou minhas expectativas!
Adoramos passar uns dias  no apartamento da Deborah, não poderia ter sido melhor. Confortável, limpo e  conveniente. Recomendo e não vejo a hora de retornar.
Ótimo!

Ótimo apartamento, com boa localização, perto de bares, bancos, mercados. 
Prédio calmo, bem organizado e que funcionários maravilhosos!
Second time here, our favorite stay in town. Thanks Deborah!
Apto limpo e porteiros muito educados.

Very good and safe neighborhood, quiet (we did not need air condition in July) and brite 5th floor appartment. Very easy 24h access. It's a bit uphill but no problem for us since we used uber quiet a lot. Deborahs communication was very good, fast and reliable. We definately recommend this place. It has an excellent value for that price! Thanks!
Apartamento limpo e confortável, com tudo o que é preciso para uma boa estadia no Rio.
La casa esta muy limpia, Deborah es muy atenta y muy agradable, siempre estuvo pendiente de lo que ocupamos, y el precio esta perfecto, con gusto me volvería a quedar allí
Apartamento ótimo!! Todo organizado, toalhas de banho, roupas de cama, louça, bem decorado!
O apartamento está em uma rua maravilhosa. Calma e silenciosa. O imóvel está equipado com todo o necessário para uma excelente hospedagem. Eu voltarei com certeza
Deborah é mto atenciosa e rápida em suas respostas. O zelador do edifício, sr Francisco, é muito educado e simpatico. A garagem também é multo boa. Enfim, tudo bom! Voltaremos

Amazing vacation. Great place, located near the beach and the center of Leblon. The apartment has everything one needs to relax and enjoy a good time without worries. It is a very well equipped, cleaned and well designed apartment. The hostess is very polite and dedicated to ensure that our stay is the best possible one. There is a place, approximately 10/15 minutes far from the apartment, called Mirante do Leblon. It is a small place, located in the beginning of a small hill that divides two neighborhoods, where we can sit, eat snacks and other popular dishes, and relax while enjoying a beautiful view of the beach coast. I had a really good time and I hope to come back soon.

Die Wohnung ist ruhig gelegen, den Strand von Leblon und zentrale Einkaufstraßen erreicht man zu Fuß. Um zur Wohnung zu kommen, muss man einen Berg hinaufgehen. Mit Kindern (5 Jahre) ist es das in ca. 15 Minuten machbar. Es fährt auch ein Mini-Bus, auf den wir aber nicht zurückgegriffen haben. Das Personal im Haus ist extrem freundlich und hilfsbereit.

The place is nice and clean and in a very safe area. If you don't speak Spanish make sure you know the check in details because the Portier is not speaking English and nobody could help us to get inside. When we called Deborah in the end, it worked.

Nossa experiência no local foi perfeita. Débora é rápida e atenciosa. O apartamento é ótimo, muito funcional e charmoso, com instalações e equipamentos ótimos. Mesmo a subida a partir do canal do leblon, que de fato é puxada, tem seu lado positivo, pois a vista de cima dá uma sensação de estar meio fora do movimento lá de baixo. Sendo que descendo, em 5 minutos você está no agito da Dias Ferreira e a praia é logo ali. Recomendamos muito.

es un departamento precioso, muy lindo. muy cómodo.  un agrado volver de un dia de playa. la lavadora es perfecta para lavar los pareos y bikinis del día.  es silencioso además,  un perfecto descanso para recuperar energía.  el aire acondicionado se agradece. el barrio es seguro y puedes volver por 8 reales desde la playa si no quieres llegar caminando. lo recomiendo 100% !!! estuvimos felices ahí!!!

E um apartamento bonito, bem localizado e bem equipado. Os quartos são confortáveis e o ar acondicionado funciona bem.  O único teria a dizer é que se a sua família e numerosa (como a minha) e precisa de dois banheiros este apartamento não é uma boa 
opção. Tem um banheiro bom, mais o "outro banheiro" e só uma privada na área de serviço, sem lavabo, e com o box quebrado (impossível usar). fora disso e um bom apartamento.

name: House with Park View in Beyoğlu (Taksim)
summary: First flat,3 sides view, front side (livingroom and bedroom) sees sururi Mehmet efendi park, 50 m2 takes evening sun therefor its cool in summer, air condition is not necessary. 10 minutes to taksim tünel 15 minutes galata tower 20 minutes to taksim square by walking.
description: First flat,3 sides view, front side (livingroom and bedroom) sees sururi Mehmet efendi park, 50 m2 takes evening sun therefor its cool in summer, air condition is not necessary. 10 minutes to taksim tünel 15 minutes galata tower 20 minutes to taksim square by walking.

name: LARGE CONDO ON THE BEACH IN KIHEI, MAUI A306
summary: New to AirBnB, but one of our most popular condos at Maui Sunset.   Best of both worlds, privacy and views.  Watch the life of Maui unfold from the morning till evening from your private 114 sq foot private view deck. Third floor means easy access to tropical gardens and the ocean beyond.  Quiet location features large private view deck and renovated interior.     Doesn't get any better.    Condo A-306 Maui Sunset South Kihei Road, Kihei, HI
description: New to AirBnB, but one of our most popular condos at Maui Sunset.   Best of both worlds, privacy and views.  Watch the life of Maui unfold from the morning till evening from your private 114 sq foot private view deck. Third floor means easy access to tropical gardens and the ocean beyond.  Quiet location features large private view deck and renovated interior.     Doesn't get any better.    Condo A-306 Maui Sunset South Kihei Road, Kihei, HI  **Hawaii Hotel Tax of 14.41% is included** No other charges once you book, what you pay on Airbnb is the total.   We believe in transparency of pricing.
notes: **Hawaii Hotel Tax of 14.41% is included** No other charges once you book, what you pay on Airbnb is the total.   We believe in transparency of pricing.
house_rules: - Quiet hours from 10pm to 8am  - Pool area open from 8am to 10 pm - Only registered guests please - All guests must register at front desk

host.host_about: Aloha!   I am a father a 4 girls and love the Maui Sunset.  Its our home away from home.    I'm lucky to have this condo and others at Maui Sunset available.

reviews.comments: Nice place to stay, everything you need is there. Clean place. Very beautiful grounds, close to restaurants and stores.

name: Kapila Gardens Glamping - On Private Mango Orchard
summary: We will provide a private Glamping site with your own personal Glamping canvas tent, patio and barbecue.  One single 10 inch spring coil mattress on a solid wood frame. One single 18 inch air mattress with electric air pump to quickly inflate. Two "Zero Gravity" patio chairs for your own private patio. Outdoor lighting to hang out at night comfortably at your site.
space: Our 1 acre food forest is loaded with mango trees and many other tropical fruits. Fruits may be available to pick. Ask us first.
description: We will provide a private Glamping site with your own personal Glamping canvas tent, patio and barbecue.  One single 10 inch spring coil mattress on a solid wood frame. One single 18 inch air mattress with electric air pump to quickly inflate. Two "Zero Gravity" patio chairs for your own private patio. Outdoor lighting to hang out at night comfortably at your site. Our 1 acre food forest is loaded with mango trees and many other tropical fruits. Fruits may be available to pick. Ask us first. - personal Glamping site - use of communal bathroom with water, composting toilet and cool water shower - barbecue, dishes, pots and cutlery. - shared social space with table and chairs - clear marked pathways to amenities - fresh fruit on site to purchase My family and I work from home so we're almost always available if you need something or just want to chat about local attractions. Our farm is tucked away in the country. We like to think of our neighborhood as the "Hidden Hawaii" very few know
neighborhood_overview: Our farm is tucked away in the country. We like to think of our neighborhood as the "Hidden Hawaii" very few know about. It’s much less crowded and local than pretty much anywhere else on Oahu. The people are friendly, the beaches are clean and the surf is world class without the line-ups...
notes: Things to do within 3 miles of campsite: - Surfing (yes, we have boards to rent) - Snorkeling - Hiking - SUP A little backstory... My wife and I bought Kapila Gardens in 2005. We planted 15 more mango trees which have grown nicely into large fruiting trees (most of them). Now our tropical food forest has some beautiful little nooks which we're excited to share as camp sites. Animals We have a milking goat that produces about a quart a day. We are open to selling this milk and allowing others to try their hand at (Website hidden by Airbnb) a cool experience! We also have dogs, cat and chickens (very free range). We mostly keep the dogs inside our home and let the cats roam outside. Who lives here Jason, Rasika (owners and husband and wife) have 2 girls 10 and 9. Rasika's mom also lives with us.
transit: Bus stop is about 300 feet away. It's a great service that covers the whole island.
access: - personal Glamping site - use of communal bathroom with water, composting toilet and cool water shower - barbecue, dishes, pots and cutlery. - shared social space with table and chairs - clear marked pathways to amenities - fresh fruit on site to purchase
interaction: My family and I work from home so we're almost always available if you need something or just want to chat about local attractions.
house_rules: - Quiet after 9 pm

reviews.comments: Best place to stay.  Jason and his family have created a special oasis in Hawaii.   For a female traveler I felt so safe and taken care of. They were so welcoming and the atmosphere on the Orchard was superb.  Glamping is the best - so comfy - quiet and away from the bustle. Woke up to amazing sunset rises in the east and the mountain view in the west. A girl couldn't have asked for anything more. I would highly recommend this property to anyone who wants to get away from the commercialized hawaii and get into nature with a friendly and kind local flare!!!  I don't have enough thumbs to put up for this place!!!
very cool place got to meet fellow travelers over the fire pit.

Not what you see in the pictures. Roaches and huge centipedes everywhere. The grounds are not maintained or groomed, when showering the people staying in a cabin can look right at you showering.  Just not good

My daughter and I only had one day on the island. It was a great experience getting into the country and experiencing Hawaii in a different than the usual, "Tourist" kind of way.

Jason was an excellent host and greeted us upon arrival. We got a tour of the property and our spot (way cooler than a hotel room).

It was a cozy space for 2 people but cute and functional. We camped and loved the special touches with lighting, a private fire pit, and mangos hand picked and given to us from a tree right next to our tent.

All of the things are needed to make it easy. Jason provided shampoo/conditioner, towels, wifi, and an outdoor shower & bathroom. 

Don't  worry about bringing sleeping bags or your own sheets. That is included. 

We were given great local tips for dining and adventure. Dinner was good and the ocean 2 miles away was beautiful.

Keep in mind, you are camping and it's a nice version of roughing it. You are camping in a mango orchard and  there are a few farm animals on the property (chickens/roosters and goats).

 Roosters start announcing the new day long before sunrise. If you are a light sleeper, consider packing ear plugs.

We really enjoyed our adventure. Thank you Jason!
If you’re interested in camping and being surrounded by nature this is a good place and a good value.
It’s a beautiful place!
This is such a cute glamp set up! it was tucked in between the trees and I loved the sounds of the farm!

A truly unique experience, we absolutely loved it! Very clean and accurate to the pictures. The family was so hospitable meeting us personally out the front and showing us the property. Thanks so much Jason and family!
Really nice place to reconnect with nature. Jason and his wife are really convenient and give you local tips. Highly recommended

This is a special place. It is like a good combination of camping and still have your own private area where you feel comfortable! The fresh fruits were super delicious and it is a really nice area to stay. It is not as busy as in other areas of the island. You can easily take the bus to almost everywhere on the island! The host are super friendly and helpful if you have any questions or if you need anything. I really would recommend it because it is a experience worth it!
Very friendly people, was very cool and way more adventurous than a hotel room
Beautiful farm! Awesome nighttime sky!  Super hosts. We hope to return!

This glamping site is amazing. I really enjoyed sitting on the chairs, reading. The wifi works great and it is a really nice touch.

Jason and Rasika are extremely friendly and reactive. They care a lot about the well being of their guests. I stayed there 3 nights and they kept improving things so I can only guess how great it will be a month or year from now.

I highly recommend it!

Jason's glamping place is a private tent at the end of his backyard / mango orchard. It's very cosy with a bed and some pillows, lawn chairs, your own BBQ, WiFi and electricity. The compost toilet and outdoor shower, as well as the common area / kitchen space, are located closer to the house. Jason is a great host, very accommodating and full of helpful tips about the area. Thanks!

This place is a gem for travelers wanting a friendly, beautiful, and peaceful Oahu stay. Right at the base of the mountains the views and hiking are great, and you can get easily into town for food, shopping and the beach! Jason and family are so welcoming and friendly and the mangos are delicious! Would stay again in an instant!

There was a beautiful place for chilling out with lovely welcoming host. The glamp site is perfect. The bathroom is ok. I rent a surfboard $10 per a day from Jason. It was a great experience surfing at Makaha beach that is 10min a way by a car.
however you should watch out the sharp reefs; 
It was raining before I got there. So the path that lead you to the site was flooded. It was hard to walk on. But it was not a big deal.
And be sure to bring your ‘bugs away’ if you don’t like any bugs.
There was a lot of mosquitoes and more.
But They have some stuffs if you don’t have;
Anyway, I highly recommend to stay here if you like the outdoor experience!
Mahalo!

Cozy tent space that came with pros and cons. 
Pros: cute tent, exactly what glamping is. Out of the city on the west coast which is very nice! Love the outdoor shower-nature at it's finest, and the hosts are very friendly. Bed was very comfortable and the air mattress was pretty great as well. 
Cons: 5 miles away from 2 active gun ranges and could hear the gun fire. Not super loud but you can hear it for sure. You are on a farm tons of wildlife and roosters around (if you're sleeping outside in Oahu you won't find a quiet sleep-not a biggie but just a note), the ant problem is huge- I live off grid in BC and don't experience nearly this big of insect issues. We packed all our food away but maybe this issue was from past campers who left the tent doors open? Since there wasn't just one or two, expect to have some small insects around you. 
When we arrived there was one camping tent set up on either side of us, (about 30 ft away) with people camping in them. So wasn't nearly as private as we were expecting. These people did leave the next morning. 

Thanks for hosting! The goats were really cool as well :)

This glamping situation was everything I'd want from an air mattress in a tent. The rain on the tent was really nice to fall asleep to, and the lights and wifi and patio made it all feel less like camping and more like a tiny room that was a tent.

Amazing spot out in country Oahu. We're not city people so we lived the location, only a few minutes drive from the beach and great hiking spots.
would recommend having a car though, just makes things easier. 

The tent itself is really nice, very private and quiet at night. Jason and the family are amazingly welcoming, even located some still ripe mangoes for my mango obsessed girlfriend! 100% recommend.

I had a great time at Kapila Gardens! Jason and Rasika were so helpful and hospitable that it made me as a solo traveler feel so taken care of. The glamping space was so cute and fun and everything I expected it to be. The bed was super comfortable and I greatly enjoyed it.

The community aspect of the whole property was a nice added touch I didn’t expect. Being able to meet other travelers and find cool ways to connect is something that was so unique. The first night I was here, I came back from having dinner in town and the family made a campfire in a fire pit and invited me to join. We roasted marshmallows, Jason had a guitar out, and it was just a really awesome way to set the tone for my stay. I got to talk to other guests and learn about the hosts. It was so nice!

The mango I received from Jason ruined mangoes for me forever. Best mango I’ve ever had!

I would absolutely love to come back to Kapila Gardens and spend more time with Jason, Rasika, and their lovely family.

We really enjoyed our stay at Kapila Gardens. The local area has a lot to offer and explore. Jason was a great host, checking us in seamlessly and giving us a thorough tour of the place. The tent was comfortable enough for two with all the amenities needed for a short stay. Keep in mind that you are glamping so you may need to deal with some bugs etc. but as long as you're prepared for that it's an amazing place to stay!

I slept really well in the glamping tent. The bed was comfortable and the tent was nice! Jason communicated well and gave me great tips on places to explore. 

The part I didn’t quite expect was how noisy the neighborhood was. I was expecting a sort of peaceful farm vibe, but it was more like camping in someone’s big yard. There were loud dog fights (it sounded like) from neighboring properties, music being blasted from neighbors, and the property itself is rough. I wouldn’t call it glamping. Im glad I got to see that part of the island, and glad the bed was nice, but I didn’t want to spend any time there relaxing as I expected I would. 

Overall I’d recommend it for a no-frills low-budget place to sleep immersed in a local neighborhood, but not for any kind of super relaxing nature vibes.

I have never been a camping type of person but still spent 3 weeks Glamping and think it is an incredible value for the level of comfort.  The tent had a real bed with an awning overhead and a small patio with comfortable chairs making the arrangement very livable.  A cooler was provided to store food items in with cooler packs available.  Jason, Rasika, their daughters and extended family were very friendly and helpful.  The outdoor shower and toilet although not fancy were functional and did the job.  I can't thank them enough for providing an affordable option to experience paradise and would definitely consider staying again.
Beautiful location and it was much more comfortable than expected. I appreciated all the thoughtful touches, and enjoyed meeting Jason and his family!
The tent is immaculate.  Very nice family.
We just staid 3 nights. But the tent was really clean as it was expected according to the description. Also, Jason  takes really care of his guests since he gets fresh fruits for them :)))
place is super cute goats are super cute and hostas are amazing would recommend this to anyone!!!

Better than I expected. Coolest camping experience. This accomodation is definitely a must. Quick replying and very hospitable host. Jason is willing to answer all my questions about the best places in Oahu. Location is quiet and in the more chill part of town which suits the laid back Hawaiin lifestyle. We had rented an expensive car for the one day for fun. Jason was able to make sure that it is parked in a safe area.  The tent fits the definition of Glamping for sure - humble and chic. Highly recommended. Although they did provide the mosquito spray, I brought my own mosquito coils just in case. I am more prone to mosquito bites. But hey, Its camping - there will be bugs :) Overall, we wish we had stayed longer.
Really fun place to stay well worth the price. Super friendly host. Location was peaceful and the area felt safe.

One of a kind experience, Jason and Rasika are really warm hosts, Jason has great knowledge about various great places to visit around. 

Highly recommended for anyone who loves nature and experience it the real way!!

Please know that this is a tent amidst Mango plantation with compost toilet  and a shower. Please read the description to know what to expect .

Before I leave  a very positive review, here are the 3 negatives:

1. Check-out is at 8am (we noticed this last minute, unfortunately). 

2. The mango “orchard” isn’t much of an orchard from what we experienced. Though we did get a few mangos upon arrival :)

3. EXTREMELY loud music in the middle of the night (12/29/18) that kept us up. Granted it was Saturday night of New Years week, so that was probably the reason for the loud music. But it was unexpected and did make our experience less enjoyable.

That all being said....

This place is pretty cool. You are surrounded by beautiful Hawai’i cliffs in the country, with a very welcoming family there to greet you. The mini-yurt, as we deemed it, was nice and worth the price (arguably). Ultimately, it’s a lot cheaper than most places people stay on the island. As avid travelers/backpackers/campers, this stay was fair comparable to other places. We LOVE how environmentally-friendly Jason’s family is, and their place reflects that (e.g. be prepared to use a compost toilet). Great place, amazing family, few complaints, and a great time.

My husband and I absolutely loved our stay here. The location kept us out of the super crowded spaces where tourists frequent and let us see a more rural and beautiful part of Oahu. Jason and his family were so welcoming when we got there and we didn’t see them again until we checked out so we definitely had our space (we were gone almost all day, everyday). We will be staying there again if we make another trip to Oahu and I would recommend it to anyone.

Jason and his family were all very welcoming and kind. The glamping tent was a unique experience and I would recommend it to anyone. Jason also suggested a few local spots, all which exceeded our expectations.
Highly recommended! We had a great time away from the crowd. Jason and his family were really knowledgable about local attactions and very helpfull.

I did a day stay and it was fun and worth it for the price. Was able to bbq and hang with fam. It’s just like camping in the woods but in someone’s backyard. The set up for sleeping was very nice. There will be other glampers surrounding you on the property.

I absolutely loved Jason's place!!! It was very clean and welcoming. It is definitely a place for someone who is used to camping and loves the outdoors. I read other reviews of noise at night. I did not have this problem. I enjoyed the sound of country animals at night. I loved the outdoor shower. It was very refreshing after long, hot day. The bed was very comfortable. I would definitely recommend bringing a headlamp if you stay here. Mine came in handy at the night time when the path to the tent and bathroom were dark.

The camp site was the perfect home away from home while on my extended layover in Hawaii. Jason was extremely friendly, helpful, and flexible. The nearby fire pit was an awesome addition— my friend and I had a blast. Thanks again!
Great location. No issue showing up later then expected.  A private atmosphere, build a fire and get lost under the stars.
Great place to stay to experience local Hawaii

Jason and Rasika and charming and accommodating hosts. Their two girls are lovely as well. This was my first glamping experience and it’s made it difficult to go back to regular camping. The space was thoughtfully outfitted and extremely comfortable, I could have easily stayed for a month. The location is gorgeous and unassuming and perfectly located. Jason gave me insider tips on where to go for the best views and experiences and Rasika shared fruit from their trees. Their girls loved visiting my cat and are every bit the consummate hosts their parents are. A wonderful experience all around.

This place is a gem! My boyfriend and I stayed at the “glamping” site on their property, and it was lovely. We love to camp and enjoy the outdoors and this was a great option for that. There are animals and such on the property, and it was pretty windy when we stayed, but those were all things that are expected in the outdoors. The shower/bathroom area is very rustic but gets the job done. Would recommend for outdoorsy folks who want a unique stay!
Great value for money and a fun experience.

Our stay at Kapila gardens was really nice and comfortable.
Jason and his family were very friendly and helped with activities in the area. As we like go surfing we appreciate his surf rental with affordable prices. 
We had a lovely time. Thank you.

Jason and his wife were very nice and even though I stayed for a night it was an experience to remember!
They took us in last minute and I loved that the tent was in touch with nature.

We had an amazing time here! The hosts were very nice and accommodating. The glamping site was perfect and kept us dry even in the rain. We did a few of the activities suggested by the hosts and had a great time.

Beautiful tent, great wifi, and really fresh linens. The best parts of my stay were sitting out on the zero gravity chairs and looking at the mountains and greenery of kapila gardens. Keep in mind that the toilet and shower set up isn't necessarily glamourous but is functional and kind of adds to the appeal of camping. The hosts were really great. They responded quickly and were very accommodating!

It is an awesome experience. Waking up to the Mountain View on your background is breathtaking. Jason and Rasika planned the site perfectly with everything you might imagine. They both are really sweet. I highly recommend the place.

name: Enjoy Porto - Douro
summary: Fully renovated apartment building, this wonderful piece of heaven is the perfect option for you to fully enjoy the city of Porto.  It's located right in the heart of Porto where guests have the advantage of being able to walk to all major landmarks. Also, it is a very typical building of Porto that embraces a cozy and beautiful style.
space: The apartment building is an antique building from Porto that was fully renovated. Apart from its stunning location, you can enjoy the sun through its garden.  It is at a walking distance from most landmarks such as the historical "São Bento" train station,  the exquisite "Lello" bookshop where Harry Potter came to life among many other iconic milestones. Asides, from these landmarks the apartment is 20 minutes walking distance from the very pleasant "Riberia Douro" river area.  The apartment  embodies a modern environment whilst being fully equipped. Couples that are looking for a genuine experience will find this a suitable choice, with a comfortable queen sized bed and stylish decor.  Furthermore, there a selection of restaurants in neighbourhood with a wide range of options, suited perfectly for any type of guest.

Couples that are looking for a genuine experience will find this a suitable choice, with a comfortable q
neighborhood_overview: It is settled in a beautiful, traditional neighborhood, walking distance from Porto´s City Centre. Nearby you may find mini markets and all the necessary shops for all your needs. In the neighborhood you can find an historical, cultural, musical and artistic Harbour, set in cosmopolitan young art district, surrounded by restaurants (typical or sophisticated), shops, art galleries and coffees. Within our place you can find some cultural appeals such as São Bento Station, Coliseu do Porto, Majestic Café situated in one of most well-known streets of Porto - Rua de Santa Catarina, and Mercado do Bolhão  our best traditional market. If you prefer, you can easily reach the Art District in a few minutes walk through Cedofeita and Miguel Bombarda street and feel the atmosphere of the alternative shops, art galleries and restaurants
notes: HOUSEKEEPING - Our efficient cleaning staff has a very rapid response rate towards any situation that you may require.  BIKES - If you wish to rent electrical bicycles we can assist you in arranging this service at the best available price, from our business partner in Porto. ´ TRANSFER - For a more comfortable and private ride we can provide a transfer service from our business partners, however not included in the room price.
transit: Close to the main hub of Porto, so you can get easily to any point of the city or region. If you are arriving by plane, take the metro at the airport (Line E - Purple) and leave in Trindade station. Leave the station and it's only a 15 minute walk to the apartment.
access: Guests have access to all areas of the building, including use of all equipment in the apartment, garden and laundry. A kitchen is equipped including all the necessary things for a proper dining experience. The apartment has 1 full bathroom with towels, shower and soap, all arranged by us. In addition, a bed linen is provided. The check-in will be Express, and will be provided by our team the accesses to the apartment few days before your stay. Wi-fi is available 24 hours a day, within the entire area of the apartment.
interaction: Our guests are highly valued by us, so we are always available for any clarification before and / or during your stay. The check-in will be Express, and will be provided by our team the accesses to the apartment few days before your stay.
house_rules: - At night, after 22:00 pm, please beware with the noise so that everyone has a relaxing night.  - It is not allowed to smoke inside the apartment. - Domestic animals of any kind of animals are not allowed inside the apartment.  - Please, be careful and pay attention to decorative objects, furniture, bed and bath things.  - Any questions that you have we are available to clarify them and help you so that you fell at home.

name: Appartement avec jardin dans le Vieux Montréal
summary: Mon appartement se situe au cœur de Montréal dans un immeuble typique du Vieux Port à côté du marché Bonsecours, du vieux port et de la place d'Armes. Le métro est à 5 min : station Champs de Mars. PAS DE PARKING - appartement idéalement situé pour visite à pied et en transport L'appartement est pour 1 à 2 personnes (1 lit). C'est un cocon tout équipé avec un jardin privé. Le ménage est fait avant et après votre venu. Voisinage et environnement calme
space: Cet appartement est celui dans lequel j'habite, je le loue uniquement en mon absence, les placards seront donc souvent occupés par mes affaires. Il n'est pas possible d'organiser de fête dans l'appartement, le quartier et le voisinage sont calmes et intolérants aux bruits.
description: Mon amie et voisine Fanny s'occupera de la location de mon appartement. Elle est attentionnée et pleine de bons conseils. Vous êtes autonomes pour votre arrivée et votre départ puisque les clés sont dans un locker devant l'appartement accessible par un code que nous vous fournissons pour votre arrivée. Métro, vélo et bus 5 min à pied : •	métro Champs de mars (ligne Orange) 10 min à pied : •	métro Berri-UQAM (lignes Orange, Verte & Jaune) •	métro Place d’armes (ligne Orange) Stations de vélos BIXI à proximité : télécharger l’application de BIXI Nombreux bus : télécharger l’application de la STM Pour votre épicerie : Epicerie : IGA - 10 min à pied (750 m) 865 Rue Sainte-Catherine Est Pharmacie : Pharmaprix ou Jean Coutu - 10 min à pied (800 m) 901 Rue Sainte-Catherine Est Epicerie bio : Rachelle-Bery - 13 min à pied (1 km) 1150 Rue Sainte-Catherine Est Dépanneur - 4 min à pied (300 m) 321, rue Notre-Dame Est
neighborhood_overview: L'appartement est situé dans le Vieux Montréal juste derrière le marché Bonsecours, à quelques pas de l’Hôtel de ville, du Vieux-Port et de sa grande roue. Le quartier est à visiter absolument. En 10 min à pied, vous accédez à la place d'Armes avec sa magnifique Basilique et en autant de temps vous serez dans le quartier gay (le village) ou le quartier Chinois. En 20 min à pied, vous serez à Place des Arts ou Griffintown. Et sinon le métro à 5 min à pied vous emmènera dans tous les quartiers.
notes: Pour votre épicerie : Epicerie : IGA - 10 min à pied (750 m) 865 Rue Sainte-Catherine Est Pharmacie : Pharmaprix ou Jean Coutu - 10 min à pied (800 m) 901 Rue Sainte-Catherine Est Epicerie bio : Rachelle-Bery - 13 min à pied (1 km) 1150 Rue Sainte-Catherine Est Dépanneur - 4 min à pied (300 m) 321, rue Notre-Dame Est
transit: Métro, vélo et bus 5 min à pied : •	métro Champs de mars (ligne Orange) 10 min à pied : •	métro Berri-UQAM (lignes Orange, Verte & Jaune) •	métro Place d’armes (ligne Orange) Stations de vélos BIXI à proximité : télécharger l’application de BIXI Nombreux bus : télécharger l’application de la STM
access: Espaces accessibles, l'appartement entier : - salon / salle à manger - cuisine équipée - chambre ouverte - salle de bain avec baignoire - jardin avec terrasse
interaction: Mon amie et voisine Fanny s'occupera de la location de mon appartement. Elle est attentionnée et pleine de bons conseils. Vous êtes autonomes pour votre arrivée et votre départ puisque les clés sont dans un locker devant l'appartement accessible par un code que nous vous fournissons pour votre arrivée.
house_rules: - Respect de mes affaires personnelles - Vaisselle lavée et rangée à votre départ - Draps et serviettes sales dans la laveuse à votre départ - Clés remises dans le locker au départ - 2 personnes maximum dans l'appartement

host.host_about:
Bonjour,

Française installée à Montréal depuis quelques années, je travaille dans l'informatique et vit dans mon appartement du Vieux port que mes amis appellent le "chalet". J'aime les gens positifs, cultiver le bonheur et comme beaucoup, voyager !

Mon appartement est un cocon où j'aime vivre et recevoir mes amis, c'est un lieu calme où on se sent bien. Je vous souhaite d'y passer un agréable séjour et de profiter de Montréal, cette ville d'adoption que j'aime tant.

reviews.comments: Great place – great location!

Charlene's apartment was exactly what we was advertised: well organized, easy to use, clean, with all appliances and maps of the area. It is located in the vieille ville, close to restaurants, museums and cinemas. Charlene was easy to communicate with. Perfect place to stay.

La residence de Charlène était magnifique: très propre et tous est fournis. L'appartement est bien localisé (proche du metro et du vieux port) et dans un quartier très charmant. Nous aimerions rester encore!

name: Featured on Hawaii 5-0! Hawaiiana 1 BR in Waikiki
summary: Clean and spacious one bedroom apartment in a secured building in the heart of Waikiki. Hawaii 5-0 recently filmed a scene inside the unit. One block from the beach and right next to the bus stop and the newly remodeled International Market Place. 100+ shops and restaurants within walking distance. Washer and dryer in the unit. Queen bed in the bedroom and memory foam futon in the living room. No pets allowed and no smoking.
space: There is plenty of space for you to feel comfortable and to unpack. No sand in the washer/dryer or in the bed please. There is a hose by the staircase and you can use it to rinse off. Also NO smoking in the apartment. Please feel free to use anything in the kitchen. I will make sure you have anything from towels to shampoo and body wash. If there is anything specific you need, please let me know.

One block from the beach and right next to the bus stop and the newly remodeled International Market Place. 100+ shops and restaurants within walking distance. Washer and dryer in the unit. Queen bed in the bedroom and memory foam futon in the living room. No pets allowed and no smoking. There is plenty of space for you to feel comfortable and to unpack. No sand in the washer/dryer or in the bed please. There is a hose by the staircase and you can use it to rinse off. Also NO smoking in the apartment. Please feel free to use anything in the kitchen. I will make sure you have anything from towels to shampoo and body wash. If there is anything specific you need, please let me know. There is cable, wifi, and Showtime. I'm available almost all the time (except when I sleep ). I answer messages very quickly and I'm also available in person as well if th
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is about 50 feet away from the newly remodeled International Market Place. There are hundreds of shops and restaurants all within walking distance. It is centrally located right in the middle of Waikiki, which makes it very easy to get around. Sacks  5th avenue, Nordstrom Rack, Ross, H&M, Apple, Cheesecake Factory and many many more are only about 5 minutes walking distance. The world's famous Waikiki beach is only a short walk away. Enjoy a day of surfing with The Beach Boys or dancing at Duke's Waikiki.
notes: The building is secured and you need a key fob to get in. There is a building manager on site who is very helpful should you have any questions or need anything.
transit: The bus stop is right outside. Lyft and Uber are available and the average wait time is 2 minutes. There are also BIKI bikes all around the building that you can rent for $3.50/h and get around that way.
access: There is cable, wifi, and Showtime.
interaction: I'm available almost all the time (except when I sleep ). I answer messages very quickly and I'm also available in person as well if there is anything you might need. I have beach floaters that I can leave for you to use as well.
house_rules: - No loud noises after 10pm. No sand in the bed please and/or in the washer and dryer. Absolutely NO smoking in the unit.

reviews.comments: Zhulieta is was great and prompt in responses. Very accomodating and nice person. The place location is great and the ameneties were very convenient. I would definitely rent the place again next time I’m in Hawaii.

Zhulieta has been amazing host. The place is perfectly located amidst market places. Everything is so near. Beach is 10 mins walking.  The only problem is parking which Zhulieta can definitely manage. I will highly recommend this place.
Fantastic! Incredible location, very cozy apartment, thoughtful and responsive host.

We couldn’t have asked for a better space or host! In transit from Australia to Canada, we booked a 6 day stop over in Honolulu - looking for some time
On the beach, rest, and good food. The suite was perfectly accessible, a quick walk to Waikiki beach, tons of great food options and though we Walked everywhere, local transit buses seemed quite frequent. The location and thoughtful “ extra touches” from Zhulieta along with her kind accommodations for early/late check in/out made  for a lovely and stress free stay in Honolulu. Thank you so much! 
Chantel & Ryan

This place was at the heart of everything yet in a quiet, secluded, very convenient location. Check-in was simple and we enjoyed our week long stay.  Washer and dryer were a huge plus.  We would definitely stay here again without question. Zhulieta was a very responsive host.

Zhulieta was super helpful. 
Place is as advertised. Close walking distance to everything you need. Bus stop a 5min walk which made it easier to get to the malls. had some issues with the dryer not working but it was looked into straight away. The building manager there is lovely and always willing to help.

Great place, great host. Located in the middle of WAIKIKI strip great access to all popular places. 
Highly recommend.
It’s very clean. Great location. Right on the heart of Waikiki.
Excellent place , perfect location   will definitely book it again  once I’m back in Hawaii
The location is great, but the place was not cleaned well and the sofa had many stains. I felt we paid to much considering the conditions.

A very rare find, Zhulieta’s place was amazing and relaxing especially when you’ve been traveling or walking around. The location is conveniently close to everything in Waikiki. As for the host, she was wonderful. Full of smiles and very accommodating. There’s no other place I can think of to stay at next time I visit Oahu than Zhulieta’s place.
Very cute inside! Felt comfortable. Great host and amazing location! Right near international market place and walking distance to most everything. Amazing stay!
因为我们提前到达,行李比较多,所以房东帮我们提前把行李寄存了,离开的时候也是帮我们寄存了行李,我们没有雨伞,房东借了雨伞给我们,非常好
very clean and huge space in center  of WAIKIKI!!! Zhulieta responsed quickly and kindly.

reviews.comments: Jerson is a really nice person who has helped me a lot. We keep communicating with each other. I really enjoy the time here!
第一次去香港订的民宿,总体来说很nice,房间很干净,虽然有点小但是够用,性价比很高了｡交通很便利,下楼不远就是地铁站｡
非常好,性价比也非常高,房东也特别热情｡很喜欢｡

This is much much better than expected. The apartment location is great. A market downstairs and the metro only 10 min slow walk away. I have been to HK 6 times before and this has been my top 2 places to stay so far. Would book again if available.
房间和描述一样,房主很好很热情｡
Nice place to stay.. The host is also a filipino so we communicate very well and they give us some information about places to visit.. Really thankful. ❤️ Hope to stay here again next time..
Jerson and Jay are both so nice, the room is well decorated. All the common place is well organised, clean and tidy. If u look for a warm stay, here is the place :)
Neat, convenient and sweet. As same as described. Nice hospitality. Will totally recommend it.
The house is in very good location. Big kitchen! We are very happy when we stay here.
This sweet home is very nice, and Jerson is a nice guy. The location is also very convenient.

我在Airbnb上找到了一个最符合Airbnb风格的香港房间｡上下架子床铺,刚好住下我和我的朋友,屋子里设施很方便,房东还帮我们拿来了插线板｡算是个不错的落脚地,适合没有太多行李的我们｡

I found a most “Airbnb style” room in HK. The bunk bed fits quite good for me and my friend. It is quite easy to access the equipment in room, and our host also helped us for extra sockets. This is a good place to stay overnight in HK, and good for us without many luggage.
Great location, great room, great hosts.

Jerson's placewas perfect for a one night stay in HK. His place is located right in the heart of Mong Kok, where literally everything is available. Jerson is great with communication too, so you'll have no problems with checking in and finding the place.
房东高大帅气,地理位置很棒!除了洗护用品要自己带其他没啥｡
Nice house and room
房东非常好 很热情 住宿干净卫生 麻雀虽小 五脏俱全 英语不好也不用怕 沟通没有问题

Jerson's place was tidy, stylish, and comfortable. The buiding was easy to find (as per his guide) and strategic. Although the stairs may pose as a challenge for people with larger luggage. Still, I love the room as it was clean, lovely, and well-put together. The facilities and amenities were good as well. As a host, Jerson had been very nice and pleasantly polite. Thank you for hosting me!
很不错的房间,适合两个人居住,离地铁站都不远,附近洗衣街有个米其林一星
It’s really a nice stay, thanks so much to jerson
Very nice
Jerson很热情,即使英语不是很好但是交流依旧没有问题,床上用品很干净,性价比很高,就是位置有点不太好找
Great location

Jay and Jerson are great hosts - warm and friendly. I only met them briefly but they made me feel welcomed and responded quickly to my messages. The apartment is clean and comfortable and has the nice addition of a kitchen. They even have toiletries for purchase. I only stayed one night but would definitely stay there again! Location is very close to a metro station and in a cool part of Mong Kok. Highly recommend.
雖然房間比較小,位置不太好找,性價比還是不錯的,Jerson也挺熱情
Strategic location! Very nice host to deal with! Feels like home!
Lovely stay. Highly recommend. Floor just needed to be vaccumed and bathroom needed a quick clean. Apart from that it was a decent place to stay. Get ready climb some stairs.
highly recommended for budget travellers. strategic location.

The place was quite easy to find. The house was exactly in the shopping district of Mongkok and you can have access to anything you may need. The flight of stairs may be a challenge to someone old but it was fine with my mom and I.
Brilliant air bnb. Really enjoyed my stay here. Close to the MTR and local amenities.
都可以,就是房东不会说普通话跟中文,交流起来不方便
非常棒的一次体验,房子很干净,住的很舒服,房东虽然讲的是英语,但是交流还是没问题的,很热情好客｡
房主人都特别好!!Dearone是一个超级可爱的女孩子,回复特别及时,而且特别乐于助人,虽然语言不同,但她非常耐心细致地告诉我路线｡
房間與圖片符合,雖然小但簡單整潔;要注意的是如果行李太多會不好上樓,整體來說還是不錯的｡

位置和房间都非常好,晚上也很安静｡
房东人很不错的,英语不太好也没有关系｡
是非常美妙的一次旅行!
Nice place and worth value
房间不错,靠近地铁站,而且没想到还有客厅厨房,房东好热情我很好相处
The room is so clean! I love it. Near the subway station and there are many good restaurants downstairs. So convienent. Thus I had a great trip~

Had a very pleasant stay. Host is very friendly and replies quickly to anny questions. The location is in a very lively area of hong kong, yet, it was quiet at night in the bedroom. So in all it was very good value for money!
The host is very nice! The location is convenient, a nice stay! Strongly Recommended!
一切都很好,就是床有点小,身高高于180会睡不下
在这里的两晚过的很不错,开始不太会热水器,房东很热心的帮助我搞定了,然后很多设施配套很齐全,就是找位置可能有一点点难,但是找到一次之后就很方便了,周围交通很便利｡
房间跟预料差不多,只是位置太难找了,而且楼道是脏脏的居民老楼,但是房间感觉还挺好的,干净,也不算窄,在香港来说,性价比真的很高了
Might be hard to see the stairs going to Dea’s place but her place is really accessible to all especially if you really want to feel like a local. Dea is very accommodating nice host!
性价比高的住宿,干净卫生,Dea也很热情,值得推荐｡

name: 乾淨房間,旺角MONGKOK,1分鐘到旺角地鐵站,舒適設計,獨立公寓

host.host_about: 想結識世界各地的朋友

reviews.comments: It was a clean space, with convenient location. Yeung is very friendly with quick response. The apartment was same as what it shown. Recommended.
交通方便,房間整潔,住得舒服,房東快回覆
本来对寸土寸金香港不敢奢望太多 一进到房间后 !! 真的!!好温馨的感觉!!尤其和小姐妹两个人 好舒服 房间干净 应有尽有 还有一些小零食 房东人也很好 回复速度很快 是个小哥哥

位置很好,离地铁站很近,附近就是各大商场,购物街区;
环境很好,单身公寓的感觉,完胜香港那些所谓的星级宾馆,总的来说很赞很赞,下次再来香港还会住这里.
Youga人很nice,很温柔,当天等我们入住等了很长时间还耐心的给我们指路,房子很好,东西很齐全,细节做的超可爱,位置很方便,离旺角地铁､朗豪坊都很近,很推荐噢,Youga很帅:)

房间位置很好,很近地铁站｡
房间布置很温馨,很干净｡没有异味,还有香香的味道,很舒服,
房东人很好,非常nice,非常helpful｡非常快回复信息,还推荐了几家好吃的餐厅给我｡
非常推荐!下次来香港还会再住这里｡
房源很好 1分钟走到地铁站毫不夸张 房东小哥哥贴心准备了好多吃的还有我最爱的瑞士莲巧克力~房间干净! 唯一的一点就是房间窗这边是弥敦道,晚上噪音有点大!不过住到后面习惯了就好了~

Youga家位置很好,從巴士站or地鐵站出來只需要走1分鐘不到,附近真的是應有盡有⋯而且好多燒味店簡直是人間天堂｡
Youga的房間同照片一樣,雖然不大,但絕對是我喜歡的色調和風格｡房間真的很乾淨,這個是重點!!!有冰箱吹風機和熨斗,也準備了一些洗浴用品｡公寓大樓內有自助洗衣間,可以洗滌及烘乾,一切都很方便｡
一個人來HK玩,住在這裡讓我感覺到舒服安心:)下次再來的話,Youga家會是首選
BTW:Youga回覆速度快,是個很nice的小哥哥:)
不错的旅行体验
房东非常nice,房间整洁干净,已推荐给其他朋友!
总体还不错,位置非常方便,房间很干净,水压也够,就是冷气机声音实在太大,房间是靠马路边的,来往车子声音也很频繁,睡眠不太好的朋友还是考虑清楚｡
房间干净整齐,比预想中要好,这次行程总共4个人,房间大小刚刚好,不会太挤,非常满意
Very convenient location, close to metro station, surrounding by lots of local night food restaurants. Always a good choose to stay if you want to explore to local hongkong life.
房主很好,房子位置也不错｡冷气声稍有点大｡
非常不错,环境好,交通方便,性价比高｡

The best thing about youga’s place is it is sparkling clean.  There are four of us and there is a queen bed and sofa bed, that is just nice for the four of us. The WiFi provided by youga in his room is superb.   The picture portrayed is just like the real room. Btw, the location of his place is also superb, it is just a stone throw from eatery places and there are malls nearby. Thank you, Youga.
地理位置优越
Apartment was clean and tidy. Good location as well.
地方很干净很棒,跟图片差不多｡稍稍有点小,不过3人住足够｡房东人也很好｡位置好交通方便
热情的小哥哥 房间很干净位置挺好的
房东人很好,房间也很舒服!很开心的一次旅行^_^
房间干净舒适 地理位置很好 房东也很nice 下次还会选择这里
很干净,住得挺舒服的
房间虽然比预想的要小,但是房东很热情!

房間還算乾淨!
難得的是衛浴空間雖小但很足夠
房東回應快速
提供的資訊/影片清楚

下次來還是會想再來住

首先肯定房东的态度真的很随和 先说优点 房子地理位置很好 离地铁站朗豪坊很近
但是房子上面还是有一些问题 
首先入住的时候发现屋子里有泡面之类的味道 然后发现水池下面的柜子里有一袋子垃圾没有处理 房东及时来带走了 也一直表示很不好意思 ｡另外 沙发床是没有床单的 应该是没办法换洗｡一个皱皱巴巴的套团着放在了沙发上 觉得有点不卫生吧｡就没用｡全程都是穿着长袖衣服裤子睡的｡洗手间发现了小强 睡在地上一直担心会不会爬身上 ｡还有｡因为就在马路边 真的太吵了 很难入睡｡也有凌晨两点突然被街上跑车声吓醒那种｡所以综合来说｡加上服务费清洁费700多一晚 性价比来讲 真的不如新世纪广场里1000多的酒店了｡
还可以 可以入住三个人
房间很干净,房东很热情,住了4天,体验感非常好
地理位置非常方便!!隔壁一条街全是小吃非常满足我的需求了哈哈哈~Youga回复都很及时,很热情
房子很干净,东西也很齐全,挨着弥敦道和朗豪坊地理位置没的说很方便｡房东哥哥人超级好!有什么问题都会及时提供帮助
房间很干净,装修也很有格调,三个人一起来港旅游,住的很舒适,下次还会再住,推荐｡
很好的一次住宿体验 房间很干净 房东人不错 房间位置很好｡

Very small space, it's just a one room flat if you can imagine. Nonetheless, it is very clean but the towels provided are really tiny so bring your own. For 3 people, if you have one luggage each, it's almost impossible to be in.
地理位置优越,就在旺角,离地铁口和朗豪坊很近,楼下还有机场巴士｡房东回应迅速,也很热情,还给了些小建议,十八弯狗仔粉的确不错!房间很干净,三个人住妥妥的,有张沙发床,也能展开箱子,生活用品齐全,还有小冰箱,总体很满意!
距离旺角地铁站很近,附近有好多东西吃,房间干净整洁有格调,总体来说很不错｡
