host.host_about: I born in the house which is adjoined to the topkapı palace. I run a tourisim agency for turkey. I love my city and would be delighted to bring guest coloser to the city.

reviews.comments:
Ayasophya house is located a short walk from the Hagia Sophia in picturesque and quiet street. The apartment is newly renovated. Very clean and comfortable. Metin is a charming host who answered all our demandes. 
We did not have the apartment is on the photo but it was resssemblant and I was not disappointed.
I recommend this apartment, ideal for a pleasant stay in Istanbul.

Metin was great. I had arranged to have him pick me up at the airport. My flight was 2 hours late but someone was there when I arrived. The place was just as listed in Airbnb. It was nice and modern. I don't think the location could have been any better. It was on a cobblestone street about a one to 2 minute walk to Hagia Sophya. Also quite close to the blue mosque and not too far to walk to Taksin Square and the Grand Bazaar. He answered all of my questions and even responded to an email late because I had lost his address and needed it to get home. Also, he, himself, got up to take me to the airport at 5 am. I head back to Istanbul in 3 days and am hoping to stay with him again.
This was my second stay with Metin. It was another great stay. I was treated like family and it made my short stay even better. I will certainly stay there again when I return.
Great stay thank you, as there was a bigger room free we got upgraded! Great location for all istanbul old town sites. Would highly recommended. Very friendly
Wonderful host, who has a fantastic apartment in an optimal location. I will definitely stay here again!

The location of this place is AMAZING. It looks over the water and main and best part of Old Town, but the entrance is opposite of the crowds and is in a cozy alley. The best of both worlds. The building is 500-600 years old and the room was so charming with a canopy bed and huge tub. And the room had AC!!! Also, there is a very large, communal room, garden area, and rooftop. No other guests were ever there when we used it--all to ourselves. The host, Metin, is very kind. Highly recommend this place!
Metin was very good about prompt communication and welcomed everyone openly. The place was lovely and very central. We had an excellent stay!
Magnifiquement bien placé, cet appartement est un cocon au milieu de l'hypercentre. La rue est à la fois calme et sûre.

This apartment is great base to explore Istambul! The location is fantastic, the flat is clean, beds are comfortable and Metin and his family are always available to assist you with anything you need, at any time (including moving furniture!). We felt safe and relaxed during all our stay. The only issue is that the flat might get a bit noisy for some people (we could hear other guests both in the building and from the street), but it was never until very late, so we had a good sleep anyway. Very much recommended!

We couldn't have found a better accommodation for our weekend in Istanbul. The house is in a nice and quiet location by the Gulhame park, yet just a few hundred metres away from Sultanhamet, very close to the tram line, restaurants and other services. The house is tiny but it worked well for us (a couple traveling with a toddler). Our kid was excited to sleep on the couch but Metin also offered a baby bed.
We found all the logistic support we could wish for by the building staff, and we only wish we could have stayed longer and had more time to connect with the owners. We will definitely come back and recommend this place.

This place was the best! Situated in a great part of town just steps from the major sites Topkapi Palace, Hagia Sophia, Cisterns, and Grand Bazaar.  Unit was exactly as the pictures, quaint and cozy.  Loved that just outside the door was a cafe.

I can only echo what other guests have said, Metin was an excellent host for our 5 night stay, and very helpful in advice on the City attractions and things like arranging an airport transfer as we were nervous arriving in a new City after dark.
The appartment and the location is as described - a historic building on Soguk Cesme street - part of the walls around the Topkapi Palace - so central that the entrance to Gulhane Park with its Archaeological Museum is at one end of the street, and Hagia Sophia further up the slope. The 'Blue Mosque' is no more than 5 minutes walk, whilst trams (to the metro/Airport connections or to Galata) and the main rail station and ferry routes (for Marmary/crossing to Asia side) are also extremely close. 
The area is served by abundant restaurants and cafe's and we were able to experience the sights and sounds of the historic centre of Old Istanbul at our leisure, without needing to worry about long journeys to and from our accomodation.
There was a little noise from the cafe outside the appartment, but certainly not enough to trouble us after many full days exploring the City we slept soundly each night!
My daughter and I would certainly go back and Metin's ayasofya house would be our first choice location!
Perfect location and very helpful landlord. If I have the chance to come back to Istanbul one day, I will choose the same place to stay!

Notre hôte nous assuré un transfert privé de l'aéroport à l'appartement. Nous étions attendus à notre arrivée. L'appartement est très cosy tel que décrit dans l'annonce propre et confortable (nous étions 2 adultes et 2 enfants). Il est très très bien situé à côté de la plupart des grands monuments (ayaSophia, mosquée bleue, Palace Topkapi, Parc Gulhane, Bazar Arasta, ...) station tramway à proximité ainsi que beaucoup de restaurant, café et boutique souvenirs et artisanat.  Nous avons adoré la ville et surtout la proximité de l'appartement de tous les monuments historiques. Notre hôte nous a également assuré le transfert à l'aéroport au retour. Si je reviendrai un jour à Istanbul je prendrai certainement le même logement.

Nous avons beaucoup apprécié l'accueil très sympathique de Metin malgré notre arrivée tardive. Pour nous faciliter la vie durant notre séjour, il nous a prêté sa carte de transports en commun (tram, métro, bus, bateau-bac) que nous n'avons eu qu'à recharger de temps en temps.
Et puis, évidemment, ce qui était extrêmement appréciable était la localisation de l'appartement adossé aux remparts du palais Topkapi, à 100 mètres de Sainte-Sophie, à 300 mètres de la Grande Mosquée bleue et à vingt minutes à pied du Bosphore. C'était magique. Des restaurants de toutes sortes étaient également très proches.

Metin was great. Really helpful and friendly. Good contact beforehand and helped arrange the early morning airport taxi on our way out. Flat was perfect... very clean and well kept. We were with our 2 small children (4 &1) and everything was just as described. Great neighbourhood. Locals very friendly and a 2 minutes from Ayra Sophia and the centre but a quiet and secluded pedestrianised road (although a taxi can still get to it outside of peak times which is handy). Recommended very highly as a perfect bolt hole for a short visit.

L'appartement est très bien situé (collé à la muraille de Topkapi), cosy, sympa. Metin est un très bon hôte ainsi que son neveu qui prenait la peine de venir nous saluer tous les matins (il a un commerce juste en bas de l'appartement). Nous avons été bien accueilli et je recommande vivement cet endroit près de pas mal de sites touristiques. 
Si je repars à Istanbul, je reprendrais cet appartement.

great place to stay, all very close. I was there with my wife and three year old son, in a flat place enough for all.
The apartment fits the description. Only positive feedback.

I booked Metin apartment for my parents whom were visiting Istanbul for the 1st time, It couldn't have been much better experience for them with Metin hospitality, help, and quick response, the apartment was so clean, not to mention its perfect location in the middle of the historical city, they actually felt at home.
I do recommend it so much for single or couple travelers.

If you are coming to Istanbul to visit some of its must-visit-places, then this is the best place to stay at. Amazing location, located exactly behind Hagia Sophia and sharing the same wall with Topkapi Palace. It's located in one of a historical and famous street in Sultanahmet called Soğukçeşme (you even can find it in Wikipedia). A very decent and safe neighborhood. 24/7 there will be polices and security guards in the neighborhood, given that it is in the museum, historical and touristic area. We were given the bigger room with no extra charge. You definitely can explore Sultanahmet area (Blue Mosque, Hagia Sophia, Topkapi Palace, Gulhane Park, Basilica Cistern, etc) simply by walking, even it's closer than the famous hotel you can find in the area. We (me and wife) loved this place so much! We stayed there comfortably. Highly recommended. Metin was a very kind and good host. Communication was quick and simple. He helped us a lot, such as providing and fixing an electricity plug converter, lent us a temporary simcard, and also his nephew who happened to work in the cafe besides the place was really helpful. 

Please note, that Sogukcesme street is only for pedestrian most of the time. I think its only at late night up to early morning, cars are allowed to pass. Also, you need to climb up to the house a little bit through the stairs (from the entrance of the house), which  was just one floor up. So with these, if you have a lot and big luggages, you might want to consider this. We personally had quite big luggages with us, it wasn't that big deal, since it just happened once during the checkin and Haroon (Metin's nephew) and Metin himself helped us carrying the luggages up to our room.

At night, we did hear some music played from the cafe next to the house like what other reviewers said, but it was not a disturbance to us at all.

Overall, fantastic place and host! We loved it and will definitely be back.
Great location! We were able to walk to most of the sites. Clean and safe apartment.

Location is good for sightseeing, but shops and restaurants are expensive in this area. Very clean place with nice big windows. Hosts are lovely people. We stayed on the third floor and there was no wifi at all in our place. Walking distance to Gulhane tramway station, to Hagia Sophia, Blue Mosque. Iron is on request.
Everything was fine
Идеальное место для проживания, если задача - посмотреть Стамбул. В самом центре и в то же время в тихом переулке. И гулять было удобно, и возвращаться приятно. Чисто, уютно, удобная кровать.

Metin's apartment suited us (my girlfriend and me) perfectly. Reviews are always so subjective but we found the accommodation was fine - for our needs. It scores really well in terms of location. It is almost literally on the doorstep of the big tourist attractions and not onerously far from Eminonou and Beyoglu if you want a change from Sultanhamet. I'd have no difficulty in returning.
조용한 곳, 위치가 좋았어요!
地段超级好,离地铁以及景点非常近,我们在这里住了三个晚上,每天都是走路出行,非常方便,房东也很好,到车站接的我们,帮我们拿行李,房子楼下有个咖啡店,好像是房东的亲戚,有任何需要都可以去找他们

Metin was very kind and always responded whenever we called. His home is very close to several of the main tourist sites in Istanbul and near a tram stop to get you anywhere else you would need to go. I recommend using his service to get you to and from the airport if you have big bags because it actually is less expensive than hiring a taxi and the driver was very kind. Overall, Istanbul was a great experience for my friend and me and I highly recommend you stay at any of Metin’s places.
예약에서 미스가 있었어요. 호스트께서 예약을 실수로 이중으로 잡으셨더군요. 많이 짜증났지만, 다른 호텔도 알아봐주시고 적극적으로 상황을 해결해주려고 하셔서 마음이 좀 풀렸습니다.

This was a fantastic location!  Close to all the sites of Sultanahmet and a short tram ride to Beyoglu.  Also a short walk to Eminonu and the ferries.  Metin was an excellent host - responsive and accommodating.  We loved Istanbul!
Amazing location, just next to Topcapi in an old building. Very hospitable host. The  was an internet connectivity issue but Metin took care of that as soon as possible.
It was the best choice in terms of location. Very central and close to everything.
Pretty clean and tidy flat. Suitable for cooking. Usually very quiet. Excellent location! Most important is that Metin and his nephew were always there for help.

Situation idéale, et dans un cadre tout à fait exceptionnel. L'appartement est situé juste derrière Ste Sophie, et collé au mur de Topkapi.
Je recommande sans hésiter cette adresse.

This has been my favorite experience with Airbnb ever! Metin’s place was in the perfect location for us to see everything we wanted in the short amount of time we had. We had four people in the place and never felt cramped or uncomfortable. It was truly perfect and with AC! We got in to Istanbul at around 3 am and was worried we wouldn’t be able to get in, but Metin’s family was there to greet us and help us get in quickly and comfortable. Metin’s nephews Kemal and Harun were amazing and treated us like family. The Airbnb is the location they grew up in and the location of their business, Gülhane Sur Café. The cafe is just as cute as the Airbnb. This is the spot to be in Istanbul! And if I could recommend it to every person visiting, I absolutely would!

Metin and his family were great host! They went beyond to provide anything to make us feel comfortable!! They’re very nice people who even make arrangements with you to provide you a safe pick up from the airport. Unfortunately I fell ill and my family and I had to make some changes on our travel plans. 

We’re grateful with their hospitality!

The apartment is in a perfect location right next to the Hagya Sofia and built into the walls of the Topkapi palace. There is a little street noise, but it's lovely and atmospheric. We slept well, the shower is good and the air conditioning in the bedroom.
We were out most of the day and appreciated being so central to come back to rest.
Metin is around to ask questions and also his brother has the shop down stairs and is very helpful.
Thank you

Je recommande vivement le logement de Metin, logement idéalement situé, à deux pas du palais Topkapi, de la mosquée Bleu et de Sainte-Sophie!!!!  Nous reviendrons à Istanbul et nous savons deja où loger, encore Merci Metin
Metin and his nephew were kind and accommodating, helped me get a ride from and to the airport, and the location is so prime.

Metin was a great host. The location of thid apartment is just superb. not only is it right next to the key attractions at sultan ahmet, it is also a 2 min walk to the tram station Gulhanay on the main line. This makes it super convenient to also visit the Dolmahbace Palace and to get to the ferry for the Prince's Islands. 
it's a bit of a climb, albeit a 2 min one, on a pedestrian only street, so travel light.
Also, take the airport transfer shuttle that Metin offers to book for you. very very convenient and pretty much the same price as a taxi from the airport. 
thanks Metin!
Appartement petit mais très bien situé en centre ville.

Great location. Right in the centre of the tourist district.

However, the place was overpriced. The apartment was poorly furnished. It did not have have a lamp, only harsh overhead lighting. The furniture is old, the decor drab. The whole place needs a revamp.

In addition, it is very noisy. There is a cafe next door that plays music late into the night, every night. There is construction next door that carries on every day and into the night, including weekends.

Great location, right in the centre and next to TopKapi palace wall.
Had a bit of issue but Metin resolved it promptly. Great host. Provided great local tips.
The place was nice, great location, and the host was extra helpful, I would recommend to everybody
Excellent location if you intent to visit Hagia Sofia, Blue Mosque, Gulhane Park, etc. All within several minutes walking distance. Walking distance to Sultanahmed and Gulhane metro stops.
Nice small flat on quiet street. Very close to Hagia Sophia.
Well located and easy to communicate even if we never met the owner

name: Suite in family home.
summary: Air conditioned suite for a couple with up to 2 children! Spacious and airy bedroom, with double bed, closet, TV, home office, wi-fi and a large bathroom. Family environment. With possibility of tour guide and driver (paid separately).
space: It is important to point out that I live in the house. I have a daughter who speaks intermediary English and basic Spanish, and I can offer you driver and guide services (paid on request). Easy access (10 minutes) to the biggest shopping center of Latin America (Brazil's largest movie screen)

name: 4 quartos na praia da Barra
summary: Luxo, 4 quartos sendo 2 suítes com cama de casal e 2 quartos com camas de solteiro, com 3 vagas na garagem, varandas com vista panôramica e cozinha equipada. Ar condicionado nos quartos. TV a cabo. Roupa de cama e banho.
space: Além de ficar em um dos melhores trechos de praia do Rio, ainda é possível ir a pé até a rua Olegario Maciel, onde pode ser encontrado todo tipo de comércio (bares, restaurantes, pizzaria, mercados, bancos, etc), economizando em transporte.
description: Luxo, 4 quartos sendo 2 suítes com cama de casal e 2 quartos com camas de solteiro, com 3 vagas na garagem, varandas com vista panôramica e cozinha equipada. Ar condicionado nos quartos. TV a cabo. Roupa de cama e banho. Além de ficar em um dos melhores trechos de praia do Rio, ainda é possível ir a pé até a rua Olegario Maciel, onde pode ser encontrado todo tipo de comércio (bares, restaurantes, pizzaria, mercados, bancos, etc), economizando em transporte. A locação inclui todo o espaço do imóvel e as partes comuns do condomínio (piscina, saúna, etc). Para qualquer necessidade, basta acionar a portaria do condomínio ou o celular do anfitrião. Acesso por ônibus e metrô.
transit: Acesso por ônibus e metrô.
access: A locação inclui todo o espaço do imóvel e as partes comuns do condomínio (piscina, saúna, etc).
interaction: Para qualquer necessidade, basta acionar a portaria do condomínio ou o celular do anfitrião.

host.host_about: Gosto de tecnologia e adoro a Barra da Tijuca, no Rio. Também gosto de praia e cinema.

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.comments:
Lo mejor del departamento es la ubicación, frente a una playa hermosa, tranquila y familiar y a una cuadra de la Av. Olegario Maciel, muy popular, con restaurantes, bares y tiendas, muy concurrida.
El edificio es muy lindo tiene una piscina templada que a los niños les encanto, sobretodo porque no es profunda y podían jugar.
El departamento tiene una sala y cocina muy amplia, los cuartos son pequeños, lo mejor es que tiene 5 baños y con muy buena presión de agua y temperatura ( nos bañábamos en todos a la vez sin problema).
Tiene un lindo balcón con vista al mar ( con una red de seguridad que arruina un poco la vista)
El departamento no es de lujosa decoración, es exactamente lo que muestran las fotografías, es básico, con muebles un tanto viejos y con mezcla de estilos.
Los aires andaban mal, pero Frank fue muy servicial y solucionó momentáneamente el problema.
Eramos 11 personas, yo lo recomiendo para 8 o máximo 9 ya que estábamos un poco apretados.
Recomendable para los que no buscan grandes lujos pero si buenos servicios y ubicación.
El departamento es muy grande y cómodo, la ubicación inmejorable. Justo en frente de la playa y a pocas cuadras del centro de Barra Da Tijuca. Yo lo recomiendo.

Fuimos de viaje con amigos , el departamento tiene una ubicación óptima , al frente de la playa , con una gran vista , además caminando puedes ir a Olegario Maciel , calle con comercio y vida nocturna (bares y restaurantes ) 
El departamento es amplio , sin embargo, los muebles y artefactos están descuidados y son antiguos 
El anfitrión frank , es una gran persona siempre estuvimos comunicados , a pesar que no pudo recibirnos el
Lugar espetacular. Excelente localização. Apto muito confortável e anfitrião flexível. Sem defeitos.
el departamento con muy buena ubicación, pero con poco o nada de mantenimiento y renovación de griferías.
All right

name: Beautiful house with private yard in downtown Mtl
summary: Beautifully renovated house with an exceptional private backyard. It's in the heart of gay village,  6minute walk to Berri Uqam metro.  St. Catherine with all of it's restaurants and nightlife is 1 block away.   Backyard boasts a waterfall and pond with Koi.  My house is open to families, with children,  but take note that there is no door or gate on the stairway.  very open concept living space.  Which means if small children stay,  parents must attend to them at all times.
space: The house is 1000 square feet.  Completely renovated open concept on 2 floors.  The bedroom is huge...entire 2nd floor of the house.  There's a jacuzzi in the bedroom as well as a fabulous work space.   There's a king and a queen mattress upstairs which are both together on the floor.  They can be separated and one could be moved downstairs and used in the living room if required.   The couch in the living room also folds into a comfortable bed so the entire place could sleep up to 5 people if they are family (or don't mind sharing sleeping spaces).  There is no door to separate the bedroom from the downstairs.... just stairs.

neighborhood_overview: The  Village has an upbeat vibe and a lively club scene. In summer, the main drag, Rue Sainte-Catherine, is pedestrian-only and strung with colourful decorations, and bars and eateries spill onto terraces in the street. Rue Amherst is known for its boutiques and antiques shops.   Excellent public transit access and a central location. By foot, it takes ten minutes or less to get to Place-des-Arts, the Plateau, the Latin Quarter and the downtown core.
transit: The house is located less than a 2 minute walk from Beaudry metro station.  In the heart of Gay village.  Everything is very accessible from here.
access: You will have access to the entire house and the backyard.   This is our house (We only airbnb it if we are going away)  so our things will be put away in closets.   You are welcome to make yourselves coffee/tea welcome to cook etc.

name: Sunny Attic with Pool and Terrace near the Beach!
summary: Beautiful and sunny high standing Attic/Penthouse with large roof terrace and community pool and garden.
space: In the heart of trendy Poblenou area and a few minutes walking distance from Mar Bella Beach. If you look for the mix of cool urban living and relaxed beach and park life...this is your place! The neighborhood is characterised by the thrilling contrast of old Mediterranean building structures, refurbished lofts and stunning new architecture by international stars as Jean Nouvel, Domenique Perault and Carlos Ferrater. The flat has plenty of light, a large roof terrace for sun bathing, on the ground floor a big garden with a children area and a swimming pool to cool off after a day of shopping or sight seeing. The subway stop is right next door and brings you in 10 minutes to all major sights. The beach with its vibrant club and restaurant scene can easily be reached by foot.

house_rules: - To make sure, that you enjoy this city just as much as we do, please take note of some friendly advice. Especially during the intensive summer months natives in Barcelona are very sensitive towards the enormous impact of tourism in their city and the police observes very strictly the compliance of all codes and laws of civic conduct. Fees are quite high, so please make sure to always wear a shirt if you are not on the beach and do not drink alcohol and urinate in public.  The Building: . After 10pm and before 8am, the law of Barcelona specially prohibits noises that can alter neighbours' sleep. This includes loud talking, singing, turning on loudspeakers, noisy walking or running and any other activities that can be heard from neighbours. The police is very strict especially during the summer and you will have to pay for the fees of up to 300 euros. . Guests are requested to refrain from ringing other neighbours' doors to ask questions or to ask directions. If you have an emergency c

space: L’appartamento di circa 70 ma è stato riformato di recente e si trova in un condominio  recente.Gli ospiti godranno di intimità grazie alla presenza del bagno privato nella abitazione e alla possibilità di poter chiudere la porta  La Abitazione è provvista di un piccolo balcone per fumare di a/c è di riscaldamento Il soggiorno e la cucina sono utilizzabili per l’utilizzo del frigo o per preparare e consumare piatti freddi ,non è possibile cucinare nel appartamento

name: Cozy Room in İstanbul
summary: A fully furnished and cozy room with a double bed at a peaceful neighborhood in the heart of İstanbul. It takes 10 minutes by walking to Gayrettepe metro station, 5 minutes by walking to bus stations. Guests are more than welcome to enjoy their stay.

The host is really helpful and accommodating :) so great to stay at this place... the accommodation is clean and value for money

name: Sunny and Beautiful Loft in Old Factory Building
summary: This beautiful and sunny apartment is my personal living space. Please be respectful! You will love it though; Located in trendy Mile-ex (Montreal old industrial area), the apartment is in an old shoe factory building with very high ceilings, spiral staircase and a pretty terrace on the roof top with the views of famous Mount Royal. The area is perfect to discover Montreal's true essence with Jean-Talon market, Jarry Park and plenty of good restaurants all within 10m walk.  No animals, No party!
space: Cet appartement magnifique et ensoleillé est l'endroit ou j'habite personnellement. Soyez courtois :-) Vous allez adorer; Situé dans le Mile-ex, quartier nouvellement tendance (ancien quartier industriel de Montréal), l'appartement s'insère dans une ancienne manufacture de chaussures avec de haut-plafonds, une escalier en colimaçon pour monter au deuxième étage et une charmante terrace sur le toit qui donne vue sur le Mont-Royal. Vous avez le marché Jean-Talon, le parc Jarry et une tonne de bon restaurant à moins de 10 minutes de marche. Pas d’animaux, pas de party!

neighborhood_overview: The MILE-EX is one of the newest trendy areas in Montréal; old industrial quarter of the Little Italy, you will find plenty of small local boutiques, amazing cafés and restaurant offering a wide menu of fresh food from the close by market / Le MILE-EX est l’un des nouveaux quartiers branchés de Montréal; vieux quartier industriel de la Petite Italie, vous trouverez de nombreuses petites boutiques locales, des cafés incroyables et des restaurants sympathiques proposant un large menu de produits frais provenant du marché agricole voisin.
notes: This appartement is my own living space. I gladly freed up some space in the kitchen, bathroom and closets for your own comfort / Cet appartement est l’endroit où je vis quand je ne suis pas en voyage. Ça m’a fait plaisir de libérer de l’espace de rangement dans la cuisine, les salles de bains et les placards pour votre propre confort.
transit: There is plenty of parking on the streets / Il y a plusieurs places de stationnement dans les rues adjacentes.
access: 1st floor and second floor / Premier et Deuxième étage du loft Private roof terrace/ terrasse privée  Both bathrooms/ Deux salle de bains
interaction: I’m easily available by email or text message / Je suis disponible facilement par message texte et par courriel

host.host_about: Life is wonderful

reviews.comments: Patricia and her friend Rebecca were extremely friendly and always responded very quickly. The place waa clean and beautiful and exactly what I was looking for. Would definitely recommend

Patricia's place is just breathtaking. You come in and the natural light just fills the entire space. Everything was just perfect, the place was stylish, clean and had everything one would need for a wonderful stay. I would totally recommend her place to anyone who enjoys beautiful lofts not too far from the downtown area. Thank you so much Patricia!
The host canceled this reservation 8 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

appartement très bien situé quartier vivant bien desservi et proximité du marché Jean Talon très appreciable.
logement  accueillant et confortable
lumineux et calme
belle terrasse avec vue
seul point noir: la litterie très spartiate !
Great place to stay
Very clean and trendy place. The loft was very cozy. It was a quick walk to Little Italy, the Jean-Talon metro stop, and Jean Talon Market. Would definitely recommend.
Très beau condo et très propre près de tout les restaurants et le marché Jean-Talon.

What a wonderful location and apartment. It was such a great to be here and be surrounded by the beautiful high ceilings and furnishings. A super relaxing respite in the city, and very close to other cool spots.

Lovely, comfortable apartment, easy communication and check-in, and conveniently close to restaurants and pubs. The bed (a foam mattress on the floor), was, surprisingly, honestly one of the most comfortable beds I’ve ever slept on (and I am picky about back and neck support). I also liked waking up to the industrial view from the loft bedroom.
Séjour parfait. Propre, lumineux, facile d’accès et très bien situé.
Great place to stay at. No compliants to be made at all

Truly a beautiful and sunny space! Patricia’s home was exactly what we were looking for. Check in and check out were simple using the lockbox, we were able to book on short notice and they responded right away.

name: 3-Bedroom Apartment With Big Terrace
summary: Trinitat Terrace is a very light and cosy apartment located in Barcelona's district Trinitat Vella, about 30 minutes away from the center of Barcelona. The neighbourhood is residential and, therefore, very quiet. It is a nice area to choose for those who seek a peaceful stay in Barcelona away from the bustle of the city center.
space: The apartment is very comfortable and has 3 bedrooms. One of them features a double bed and the other two - individual beds. One of the individual bedrooms has a balcony. The spacious living room has sofa, TV and a dining area for 4 people. The little kitchen is fully equipped, and the bathroom has a shower. The big advantage of this apartment is its big terrace. It is a great place for a romantic dinner with your loved one or an early breakfast with your roommates before heading to work or university.  Trinitat Terrace is fully-equipped and has all the necessary amenities for your stay in Barcelona. They include WIFI, air-conditioning, washing machine, iron and a dishwasher among others. The apartment can accommodate up to 4 people and is perfect for families and groups of students.

name: Suite privée a  10 min de l'aéroport
summary: Superbe suite récemment rénovée avec salle de bain privée dans une maison centenaire située a 10 min de l'aéroport et 15 min du centre-ville. Votre chambre au plafond de 9 pi est éclairée par deux grandes fenêtres. Vous y trouverez un lit queen, un bureau de travail et votre salle de bain  avec douche.  La maison entière (cuisine, salon, salle à manger, salon tv, solarium) et le magnifique jardin sont à votre disposition. Nous vous offrons également le petit déjeuner.
space: Le secteur  Situé entre le fleuve St-Laurent et le canal Lachine, le quartier Highlands est un trésor caché à proximité du centre-ville de Montréal.  Différents choix s’offrent à vous pour vous rendre au centre-ville. En auto, il vous faudra une quinzaine de minutes. Vous pouvez aussi prendre l’autobus directement devant la maison, qui vous amènera à la station de métro. Vous préférez le train? La station se trouve au coin de la rue. Et si vous préférez faire de l’exercice, prenez les vélos et suivez la piste cyclable jusqu’au Vieux-Montréal. La maison Construite en 1909, notre maison a été rénovée au cours des dernières années tout en préservant certains éléments qui font le charme des anciennes demeures. Vous serez sûrement séduits par cette maison unique. Vos hôtes Jacques et Marie-José. Nous avons tous les deux la passion des voyages et utilisons Airbnb depuis longtemps. Nous avons toujours vécu des expériences positives et rencontré des hôtes hors pair. C'est à notre tour de vous

host.host_about:
HI!
We have a passion for travels. We have been Airbnb guests for many years and our experience has always been extraordinairy. It is the perfect way to see how people live,  feel the beat of a city and meet wonderful persons.
We hope to share the same experience with our guests, help them discover our beautiful city and share our travel experiences. 
We hope to see you soon!
Jacques & Marie-José

Bonjour!
Nos somme passionnés de voyages et utilisons Airbnb depuis plusieurs années. Nous avons toujours eu des expériences enrichissantes et des hôtes hors pair. En louant une chambre de la maison, nous espérons par le fait même rencontrer des gens qui partagent notre passion. Au plaisir de vous rencontrer!
Jacques et Marie-José

reviews.comments:
Marie-Jose and Jacques were superb hosts! Marie-Jose responded to all my inquiries very promptly prior to my stay. I loved that they were so flexible and accommodating with the check-in and check-out times as this greatly helped with our travel plans. 

Their place is conveniently located in Lasalle close to the waterfront. The home has a contemporary design yet preserves its historic feel. We didn’t have a chance to enjoy their backyard but it truly looked like an oasis with beautiful flowers and a lush garden. 

The room was spacious and has lots of natural light. It was nice to have the bathroom in the bedroom which truly made it feel like our own private suite. Loved the little touches in the room like the phone chargers. 

The highlight of our stay was hands down Marie-Jose’s breakfast! There were homemade muffins on the table, freshly brewed coffee and a selection of teas, a chia yogurt concoction (amazing!), delicious cheese and apple crepes, and home cultivated honey. My mouth is still watering from the breakfast. 

Marie-Jose and Jacques made us feel right at home and part of the family yet we had our space to come and go as we pleased. I honestly can’t wait to book with them again for our next stay in Montreal. Merci, merci, merci Marie-Jose et Jacques - À la prochaine!

Venez découvrir l'ambiance Stirling. En trois mots: réconfort, hospitalité et convivialité. Des hôtes d'une grande générosité dans un décor majestueux, digne des plus belles maisons de Montréal. J'ai ADORÉ mon séjour chez Marie-José. Allez expérimenter par vous-mêmes, coup de foudre assuré !!!

Thank you so much Marie-José! My Dad and I had a great night. The room was so nice and clean. Marie-José welcomed us when we arrived and showed us around the house. Will recommend this place and will come back again for sure. Merci

In Summary: everything was perfect! Really nice, lovely and clean room with your own bathroom, super nice and lovely hosts and great breakfast.   Getting into the city by car within 20min and to the airport within 10-15 min.

More facts: You can use the living room, if you like to watch TV, the two cats are really sweet, the host have great recommendations for activities in and surrounding Montreal. The room has many lovely details like charger for smartphones, cookies, a little fridge and a folder with restaurant recommendations (the ones we tried were all excellent) and tourist informations about Montreal.

I can fully recommend it!

Staying here was such a treat! From the fresh smelling linens, home made cookies waiting for me in my room, to the thoughtful healthy breakfast- which included honey from their garden hives. This airbnb feels more like staying in a boutique- hotel within a gorgeous home. Can’t wait to return to Montreal to stay here again.

A beautiful room in an elegant old house , very comfortable and well equipped with a very nice shower. Very good value for how nice it is. I didn't meet the hosts (only their daughter) but they were friendly and easy to communicate with. Highly recommended for a good location close to the airport.
the best
Très bon accueil. Excellent séjour.   Merci!

Marie-José was such a gracious host! She offered such a warm welcome and incredible hospitality. She helped me find the nearest train station, made a delicious over the top breakfast and extended such kindness the entire time. The house was absolutely lovely, even more cozy than the pictures! I would highly recommend Marie-José and Jaque's place to anyone staying near Montreal! 11 out of 10!
Fantastic experience, one of my favorite hosts.

This place was very well furnished. The decor was very beautiful. The hosts were amazing people, very warm and friendly. They provided a lot of advice on Montreal foods and attractions. Will totally recommend this place to anyone looking to have an amazing visit in Montreal! If I ever go back, this is the place to be.

We loved staying in this 5* hotel quality room and en-suite. We were only there for one night but the hosts were very friendly, helpful and flexible. The whole house is stunning and very convenient for the airport. Highly recommended!

host.host_location: Kalapana SeaView Estates, Pahoa, Hawaii, United States
host.host_about:
Aloha!  Marylove is an active, fun, vital, semi-retired Tutu (grandma) who loves include music, gardening and the ocean. Marylove enjoys travel, meeting new people, organic gardening and cooking, hiking, biking, creating art, and almost any activity in the ocean.  I can offer many suggestions for nearby hikes, snorkeling, whale watching, surfing, etc.  Marylove is an RN as well as a nationally certified interpreter for American Sign Language, working throughout all the Hawaiian islands.  I am delighted to be your host since 2013!

Life is sweet here in the Kalapana area of Big Island, which is a place of amazing serenity and beauty.  Happy to share a slice of it while you visit!

reviews.comments: Marylove's quaint hale is a treasure! We enjoyed the luxury of the upscale cleanliness of this newer home as well as the large sunken bath. The kitchen is huge with a very large fridge and excellent new stove. It is easy to walk to black sand Kahena beach from here and the neighborhood is quiet and full of very interesting homes. The rocky coastline and palm tree's lend to taking photos. Ourdoor lanai space has cozy couches to have some quiet time with a breeze. I really love this place and will certainly come again! Mahalo Marylove! You are the most gracious host. Your smile is like a ray of sunshine for a tired traveler!

I was very comfortable and felt quite welcome. I really liked the 
opportunity to use the kitchen to prepare my own breakfast and late night 
sandwiches.

I was quite thankful that I was able to use WiFi to watch the semi-finals 
of the World Cup Soccer tournament. Using the cables on hand I was even 
able to plug in the computer to the large TV screen in the living room. I 
closed the blinds and watched hours of soccer over the course of 2 days 
with excellent quality. I know that the WiFi was also able to perform well 
for other tasks even while I was streaming the video.

It really rocked to have ATT wireless in and around the house.

Another outstanding benefit was the large selection of healing services in 
the area. I was able to select from a long list of massage therapists and 
the provider came to the house for the session I booked. The bodywork was 
excellent and it was so nice to be able to just relax at the house after 
the treatment

This is a great place to stay centrally located in a fabulous area. Mary 
Love is a wonderfully warm host and happy to share her vast knowledge of 
Hawaiian culture and history and the many attractions on Hawaii Island.

I'm definitely looking forward to returning to the area and hopefully there 
will be space available at Hale Puulena.

Mary Love's home is one of the most relaxing and inviting spaces I've had the privilege to experience. Located in a quiet, cool area, the only surrounding noise is provided by nature. The community in this area is very tight knit, open and welcoming. Every gathering we explored was full of warm people who were full of stories and hospitality.

Though located in a very rural area, most of the modern conveniences we are accustomed to are available, such as top notch appliances, comfy furniture and internet (if you have time to use it after all the community events).

There are so many interesting places nearby to visit that I wish I had booked more time for my trip! This island is quite large in comparison to the others, and I found it very helpful to be staying in an area closer to many of the natural attractions around the island than either of the developed cities.

The Big Island is unique in that there is very little light from the ground at night (by street lights and the like), which allows an immersion into activities like stargazing and just being present with the environment around us.

I will definitely be returning :)

The only thing lovelier than  Hale Puulena is the heart of our host, Mary Love. She is a kind and generous soul, sincerely interested in our joy and well-being. We felt nourished and peaceful as we relaxed in her tasteful, elegant, comfortable home. The journey to Hale Puulena sets the tone as one travels the mystically beautiful red road, passing rich lava beds, enchanted tree tunnels, hanging jungle vines, extraordinary plant life, and the ocean that beats wildly at the Lower Puna coast line. The Seaview neighborhood, where the home is located, is easily accepting of new visitors, making one feel welcome and at home. There is an instant feeling of tranquility, supported by the sounds of nature, gentle breezes, and the vibrant star filled sky at night. The home itself is recently renovated, sporting all the amenities that one would expect of a luxury property, but at an affordable price. It allowed us to take advantage of the restorative Kalani spa, the warm ponds, magical Wai'opae tide pools, stunning Mackenzie State park, charming farmer's markets, and various other natural wonders and delights. This place is ideal for those that want to get off the beaten track, relax, and take in paradise at a slow and leisurely pace. Get ready to fall in love and return to harmony.
Mary is a very friendly and professional host and her lovely place make you think you're comming home. She supported us with a lot of helpful advises and Tipps. Aloha Spirit.

Mary Love is an AMAZING host. She is the icing on the cake. The house is modern and immaculate. The house it set up in a way that the guest has their private bathroom and space. Everything you could need is provided. Towels, sheets, info books, wi-fi. Shower pressure is great, along with the solar living makes one feel better about life. The view is epic, the house is near a park and the infamous Seaview lawn is within walking distance. Take a stroll to watch the whales, or a short drive a wonderful retreat where you can soak in the saunas and hot tubs. Or drive a it further and hit up the blacks sands beach, or warm ocean pools. You really can't go wrong, and unlike some jungle rentals, this rental is in a drier location. Don't pass this up and go breath all the ALOHA this spot has to offer!

Its a very beautiful place with a nice patio to relax and watch the sunrise from. Marylove and mimi were excellent hosts and I would definitely go there again. Her place is very close to the Red road (beautiful scenic drive) and if you get a chance be sure to attend the farmers market a short drive away to look at their interesting fare. Its about an hour drive from Volcano national park, but you can see the latest lava flows near the town of Pahoa which is a short drive away.

It was a wonderful experience staying at Lava flow private room. The house is located in a very peaceful neighborhood and offers you the amenities of a resort. Really wanna appreciate the way Mary love has maintained it. It's indeed very beautiful and the host has tried to provide all facilities that make you feel totally at home. We could not meet Marylove as she had gone out on a vacation her self but she had ensured that we be greated well and made provision of everything that a guest would probably need. Would really wish to stay there again.

Marylove's house is beautiful. Everyone in my family was impressed. Marylove provided fruits, bagels and yogurt and we enjoyed having our breakfast on the lanai. We even wish we could have something similar set up at our own house. There are lots of "hidden" attractions close by that is not crowded. We felt like that we were touring like the locals instead of tourists.  Marylove provided beach gears and sand toys so we could get the full experience. One thing that is impressive about Marylove is that she is unbelievably responsive. Almost every time I sent her a message, I got her reply right away! Since we stayed at two different houses (the other in Kailua Kona) during this trip and the beds at the other house were not very comfortable, I think it is important to mention that the beds at Marylove's house were very comfortable. Everyone loved Marylove's house and her service and we would definitely book her house for our next trip.

Beautiful house in a not so touristic part of the Island, just a 10 minutes walk from the ocean. Perfect for a Long stay and as a "base" to return to after a day exploring the Island. Very very friendly host! Five stars, more than earned!
The listing is accurate, and the accommodations are clean and tasteful.

This is the perfect base camp from which to explore the Big Island and especially Puna, Volcanos and south east!  Marylove is wonderfully gracious and provides the perfect sanctuary to recharge.  The house is immaculate and feels better than the pics.  Not only is it a perfect home base but one can also easily be a peace reading on the porch.  Never slept better... rain on the roof at night.. Hawaii sun in the day.  I doesn't get much better.  And Marylove is the perfect ambassador to such a paradise - caring, giving and wonderfully helpful with little secrets of the island... Big Aloha to you Marylove and see you on the next one!!! :)))
Marylove's place is a paradise, beyond the dream, gorgeous! Highly recommend!!!

Best airbnb accommodations we have yet encountered!
An amazingly comfortable, upper scale home with top of the line appliances and furniture, tastefully decorated with a real Hawaiian flair, spotlessly clean, quiet and relaxing. Perfectly situated for exploring the southeast Puna coastline and only a few minutes drive from the lovely black sands Kehena Beach (clothing optional), tidal pools (with terrific snorkeling), and several other magical spots.
Then there is Marylove! An incredibly lovely and wonderful hostess. Friendly, engaging, a font of information regarding the island, and extremely generous with providing advice and suggestions, as well as maps and guidebooks to help find activities and places to go, but also gives you all the space you need. 
Can't say enough about Marylove and her terrific facilities, although think we might already have, as we don't want the rates to go up too much before our next visit. Aloha and Mahalo
einfach nur top. wir haben das haus geliebt.

Mary Love was awaiting the birth of her grandchild so I did not meet her person.  Her responses were expedient though!  I could feel the warmth through her words!  The house was exquisitely beautiful!  She has great taste!   When I walked into her home, I immediately felt relaxed and nurtured!  I was surrounded by greenery and beautiful art.  This sacred space was the ultimate retreat experience!  My mother and I enjoyed it immensely!   I will cherish the experience forever!  A treasure indeed.

It has been such a beautiful experience being in Marylove's home. I felt so warm and welcomed. Every detail was taken care of with so much love. It sure felt a home away from home. She helped me make my first experience in Hawaii so memorable. Always there for helping me with travel information places to visit. I have indeed found a great friend and a wonderful host. Will surely return and be with her again. Thank you so much for caring for me. Much love Ekta
The room is very beautiful,Mary is so nice to guide us how to enjoy our tour in big island.

Marylove is a good-humered and affable lady. She will ensure everything to make your stay memorable. The house is esthetic decorated and you sleep in a very comfortable beed. Your own bathroom and the hole house are very clean too.
You will spend most time out on the lanai which is huge and perfect for reading or whatever.
Would go back at any time
Mike

Our stay with Marylove could not have been more amazing. She was unbelivably helpful in pointing us in the right direction let it be for a tourist spot or the best place to buy fish in town. She was a leo great in pointing out local off the beaten path spots instead of the big touristy ones. We have now made a friend for life and look forward to seeing her again.

We absolutely loved our stay with Marylove.  Not only was her home gracious, clean, gorgeous with every amenity one could wish for but her hospitality was unparalleled.  This area of the Big Island has such a wonderful laid back charm and style and there was so much to do.  Marylove provided snorkel gear, boogie boards, maps, advice and such an insiders perspective that we always knew what to do and when to do it!  If you are lucky enough to get to stay with her, you won't regret it!  A special lady and a special place.  Thank you Marylove!!!

The house is very nice, with a nice relaxing outdoor area - in a very quiet area at the South-West corner of Big Island. We have stayed a couple of days and have enjoyed the location. While this is remote location, there are few things to go and see there (with less tourists than any other areas :-)).

It was my first time to use airbnb and Mary provided us a very warm and comfortable experience! The house has a nice looking and well decorated just like what you see from the gallery. Each detail you feel in the room are carefully considered by Mary. The stars are so beautiful outside the house in the evening. I have no doubt that I would come back and stay at Mary's place next time!Malaho Mary!

I received the information for Marylove's house from a friend of mine. It was a beautiful place to stay. Marylove was very loving when she was around.  She was away a lot and I was away a lot, so we need not share all the time the living space. I liked this.

Marylove was absolutely wonderful.  We were running very late, as we stayed too long in Kona after our flights arrived, and we didn't get to Marylove's house until way after dark.  She was so gracious and inviting.  Her home is beautifully decorated with such a warm feeling and so relaxing.  We could not have asked for a better place to spend our first four nights on Hawaii.

I have had many great Airbnb experiences, but staying with Marylove was one of my favorites by far.  Everything about her home is relaxed and comfortable, and I felt at home from the moment I stepped through the door.  Marylove is full of loving and positive energy, and is an all-around amazing host.  My time in Hawaii was more memorable because of Marylove, and I feel very blessed to have had the opportunity to stay with her!

My stay with Marylove was fantastic. Her space is clean and modern, not to mention completely green (she runs on solar power and collects rainwater). She also had plenty of snorkel gear to lend me, so that was an added perk. Thank you so much for the stay Marylove, I look forward to returning and checking out the spots I didn't see before I left!

I can't say enough good things about Marylove and her great place! Thank you so much for all of your hospitality, and making our birthday weekend so amazing!

The bed was so comfortable, and the breeze at night kept everything so cool! The kitchen is a delight to use, and the water is second to none!

We had an amazing time at Marylove's! She went above and beyond to make sure we had a great stay. She told us great spots to go to we wouldn't have known of otherwise, provided us with gear (mountain bikes, headlights, snorkeling equipment), and was overall super friendly. Possibly the best Airbnb host I've visited!

Mary love is a generous hostess and opens her lovely home to stay in . She recommended places for us to see and made us very welcome and comfortable. The neighborhood was very close to some great spots and Volcano was accessible from there. It was close to Pahoa village for supplies and a range of places to eat....all up a great experience. Thank you , Marylove!
We really enjoyed our time with Marylove, she was so friendly and helpful

We spent 6 wonderful days here! The location is great: 10 minutes away from the end of hwy130 for the lava flow viewing, and 15 minutes away from the Issac Hale Park, the warm tide beach. We could find everything you need in the place, and the design and decoration is amazing. Marylove is a great host: we didn't meet her until the last day of our stay - because of Christmas season - she provided useful information for check-in and our stay, and can be easily reached via inbox mail. Would definitely recommend this place!

Wow! This place is an amazing deal! Close to the ocean, so close you can smell it in the air. Easy going, Aloha style neighborhood. The local town is a short drive away, Pahoa, which is rich with surfer culture and basic needs. Mary Love's place is a short walk from whale watching and beaches. Her place offer all the basic needs and so much more.  Like a fullly stocked kitchen & beautiful comfortable beds that make you feel like Royalty. A great outdoor area that holds space for that deep relaxation feel. Close by are so many amazing spots that its easy to keep busy exploring. MaryLove was exceptional in helping us find where things are and when special events are happening. Her personality is very relaxed & positive & she is an exceptional hostess. Best instructions for using everything like switches and so forth, lots of things are labeled. We can all appreciate clarity. Overall the best priced for value place in Hawaii.

Marylove's place is very comfortable with access to a full kitchen! The lanai is a great place to start or end the day.  Marylove is full of great information and tips about the area. Communication was great and prompt. Thanks Marylove!

We had a wonderful time staying at Marylove's place.  She is warm, friendly & full of excellent information on the area.  She has a beautiful home which is so comfortable to stay in.  I would highly recommend staying with her & experiencing the Puna area of The Big Island as it is "special" is sooo many ways.

We had a lovely stay at Marylove's. She totally deserves the 5 stars that she has. Very nice host, flexible and understanding, gave us tips and indications all with a big smile on her face. The property is in a quiet area, the house is very nicely decorated and gives you the feeling of peace and spirituality. Highly recommend this accommodation for any kind of travelers be it couples or friends traveling together. We will surely miss it.

Majestical is all one can say for our restful stay at Mary Love's abode. The house offers a perfectly peaceful retreat. The location is fantastic. It is close to black sand beaches, the lava flow, fresh markets, warm pools, tide pools and Kalani retreat center. The room was immaculate and Love provides all things you didn't even think to bring. The house is fully stocked with all the fun extras. Mary Love is also an experienced host and is knowledgeable of happenings in the area. She is welcoming, available, gracious and unobtrusive. I would not hesitate to book a room, or the apartment. We were also thrilled to use the Sondors electric bikes on the beautiful red road for an experience of a lifetime. Mahalo Mary Love!!!!

Belle grande maison spacieuse et bien équipée pour couple et/ou famille qui désirent passer du bon temps dans un endroit situé près d'attraits touristiques intéressants (coulée de lave, bassins naturels, plage de sable noir, etc.).

Notre famille a été accueillie avec amour et générosité. Les enfants ont adoré chercher des lézards et jouer avec les jeux de société. Nous, les parents, avons adoré prendre nos petits-déjeuners et notre apéro sur le patio magnifiquement aménagé.

Thank you for everything! Your place is amazing and so are you!

La famille Doyon-Mathieu
XXxxx

A lovely home and such a nice host! She offered us tips on how to get to places and helpful ideas to fill our evenings with! The house was beautiful and very close to the coast with a beautiful view! We stayed there for a week and had an amazing experience with no problems!

What an amazing vacation we had in Hilo. MaryLove is an amazing host with a beautiful place. She made us feel like family and was helpful with awesome suggestions on things to see and experience while on the island.

name: Your home in Istanbul
summary: The apartment is located at a very central location in one of the most central neighborhoods (Kadıköy) in Istanbul and definitely the most central of the Asian side of Istanbul. It is 10 minutes walking distance from Ferry Station, Metrobus Stop and Subway statıon. It is located next to Yogurtcu Park which is just 5 minutes walking distance from the main street of Kadikoy, where you can find all the main attractions like Fish Bazaar, Pub Street, Clubs, Antique Shop Bazaar and Parks.

reviews.comments: Much more better as we thought! The location, the apartment everything was good! We had some problems with a washmashine but it was very quickly fixed. We recommend this lessor!
Great place in a good location in the center of kadikoy.

Oksan and all her family were very helpful and hospitable. The flat and its location are perfect. We thank you once again for the possibility to stay at your adorable apartment and enjoy your city as locals Once we come to Istanbul again, we will for sure choose Oksan’s apartment!
Oksan hanimin evi temiz ve kendisi yardimsever birisi dairenin bulundugu bina ve sokak nezih ve guzel bir yer. Tekrar geldiğimizde kalmak isteyeceğimiz guzel bir ev.

This flat is very convenient and comfy for a family and much nicer than what you see in pictures. We had a very good time for a week here.
I couldn't think of a negative point during my stay other than maybe the shower (needs a bit renovation) and sometimes a bit issue with water pressure but they are just fine.
Oksan is very nice host and helpful. I enjoyed the flexible check in and check out times.
The most important of all, the location couldn't be better. You have everything you need around you from super markets to shopping stores and at the same time quietness at nights for a nice sleep.
We will glady choose this place again for a stay in Istanbul.

Host: It was very easy to communicate with Oksan. She was punctual, trustworthy, thoughtful and warm.  Great host. 
Location: Perfect location. Close to almost everything. You can make the most of (Email hidden by Airbnb) fort: As a family with a baby we had zero problems comfortwise.  Beds, shower, kitchen, heating system offer problem-free holiday. A baby blanket was a nice gesture as well.
Equipment: Well equipped. We enjoyed the coffee machine and microwave. 
Cleanliness:  Perfect cleanliness. We were quite pleased with the cleanliness since our baby likes to be on the floor. 

We highly recommend this convenient  
house and its caring host to anyone who visits Istanbul with no hesitation. We would definitely stay in this house again. 

.................

Muthis ev sahibi muthis ev. Herseyiyle cok konforlu, huzurlu ve kolay bir kalisti. Bebekli bir aile olarak evin temizliginden ve kullanimindaki rahatliktan cok memnun kaldik. Sicacik bir yuva oldu bizim icin kisin ortasinda 4 gunlugune. Oksan cok ince dusunceli, kibar ve guleryuzlu bir ev sahibi. Iletisim sorunsuz ve kolaydi. Evin konumu oldukca merkezi. Aradigimiz her sey yurume mesafesindeydi. Metrobuse, metroya,otobuse ve vapura oldukca yakin. Bir dahaki gelisimizde yine orada kalmak isteriz. Ic rahatligiyla tavsiye ederiz herkese.

Flat very well situated. 
We recommand it.

This is an amazing apartment. It is very confortable ans well-located. Very close to the ferries and in one of the liveliest areas of Istanbul, Kadicoy. We are very glad we picked it because we got to see Kadicoy and its amazing atmosphere, day and night. Our host was amazing, taking care of every detail and of every request right away. An incredible experience. I recommend this apartment and its host Oksan to every visitor. Thanks again for a lovely time!
Evin locasyonu çok iyi.Temizlik ve konfor konusunda beklentimizi karşıladı.Okşan hanıma misafirperverliği için teşekkür ederim.
Great place, friendly host and easy access to most everywhere in Kadikoy, Thanks Oksan.

Very clean and very accommodating. Thanks so much!
Nohora place was clean comfortable close to everything, but parking was issue the first night  and gotten better after we found a parking spot on the side street.

name: Lovely Hell's Kitchen Studio...
space: My adorable 400 square foot studio apartment is available while I am away.  You will have the entire apartment to yourself for the duration of your stay!   The apartment is very pretty - beautiful decor and very feminine and whimsical.  The building is great: quiet, neighbors are friendly.  Every kind of comfort you could wish for is within a couple blocks.   The building is in the heart of Hell's Kitchen, just a couple blocks west of Times Square - but removed from all of the crowds.  (The neighborhood is also referred to as 'Midtown West', 'Clinton', and/or the 'Theatre District'. )  Every Broadway theatre is within easy walking distance, as well as Times Square, Radio City Music Hall, Rockefeller Center, every major subway line, Port Authority, Penn Station, Restaurant Row, The Javitts Center, and plenty of amazing restaurants- specific recommendations by request! GREAT LOCATION!!!!  Wifi and utilities included, A/C in the summer months (unit gets removed fall-spring), queen-sized b

All other house rules (where to dispose of trash during the week, etc.) will be posted inside the apartment.
