host.host_about: young female artist who loves travel, theatre, yoga, animals, film, and eating out.

reviews.comments: Carey's place was great! Nice central location, clean and cozy.
My husband and I found the place very cozy and well maintained. It was in a great location very central to things in Manhattan and her adorable cat loved to cuddle and purr. Wonderful experience!

Carey is an amazing host.  She made sure that I had what I needed and give me good directions and info about the appartment. The appartment was cozy and charming. The location is just perfect. Minutes from Times Square and a Grocery Store.

Carey was great. We had a problem where our flight was delayed because of weather and Carey did her best to accomodate us, which we really appreciated!  She was always available by email and phone. The apartment was beautiful. It overlooks the garden, so it's really quiet and comfortable. It's also close to Time Square and easily accessible by subway. Her cat is really friendly and quiet. We'd definitely stay here again the next time we're in New York City!

We were delighted to meet Carey for the first time after exchanging emails with her quite often.  We had a great time in the city with what we wanted to do and found the location of the apartment excellent. Carey was very accomodating and helped us get settled and showed us around her apartment. Her apartment is very tiny but was all we really needed (about the same as a hotel). The bed was comfortable, the AC adequate, bathroom and kitchen facilities were just right. The one drawback was lack of comfortable seating and TV which I didn't realize beforehand. There was a radio which was helpful. The apartment was quiet for the most part except the upstairs neighbor was a little noisy. There is a parking garage on the same street that we used and the worker Luis was helpful in giving us a good rate for two days.  For those who are pet friendly, Carey's cat was there and she was as sweet as can be. She kept us company and never bothered us. We ate at the 44th SW Restaurant for lunch and had a great Caesar salad and excellent pizza. Another restaurant was Westway Diner on 9th Ave. which was good. In the evening we walked to the pier on 12th Ave. which has a restaurant with outside seating and we enjoyed a drink there. The pier has many seating areas and some grassy areas to relax on. It is a nice quiet space when you want to get away from the noise. Overall we had a great trip, got to go to Times Square, Central Park, Carnegie Deli, Juniors Restaurant, and saw the Naked Cowboy. We did it all by walking too!
The reservation was canceled 2 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Carey's apartment is located in a great area ,very close to everything and yet -very quiet....The apartment is clean and cozy ....

I will definitely will recommend this apartment to my friends

Arie and Meirav
(Thank You Carey)

This cozy little apartment was exactly what we needed to experience a nice Christmas and New Years holiday in central Manhattan.

Carey received us in a very nice way. The kitchen was well-equipped, the bed was large and comfortable and we loved the bathtub. We felt safe in the neighbourhood and it was very easy to go out to eat or buy food to bring home. We highly recommend this apartment for other couples who wants to experience New York on a reasonable budget.

Some friends who was in New York before warned us about insects in apartments, but we did not see any! :-)

Loved Carey's studio.  Excellent quiet location, steps away from the busy scene.  She was very resourceful and responded quickly to my few questions I had.  Overall one of my favorite place I stayed in the big city thus far.  Thanks Carey!
The apt was nice and good to stay! Great location and recommend it 100%. Thanks much!
Carey's apartment was perfect for our stay. Awesome location, quiet at night. Carey was flexible with our check in/out times and was super helpful. Would definitely recommend it! Thanks again!

Great location. Quiet spot. Perfect if you plan on seeing shows as everything is steps away. Carrie communicated quickly and easily. This was my first airbnb experience, so I was a little nervous, but everything worked out great. Highly recommend this spot for anyone wanting to visit New York.

We had a great time at Carey's place. The location was perfect, and she was an excellent host giving us tips about places and transportation, and helped us a lot being flexible when we had a schedule problem!

Carey's apartment was exactly what we had hoped for. Excellent location, clean, cozy and felt like home. Carey was an excellent host, and made us feel comfortable throughout the entire process (this was our first time with AirBNB). I would definitely recumbent this apartment to any couples or singles looking to stay in the Hell's Kitchen area!

Great place! great apartment! Carey was lovely! 
10 minutes walk from Time Square!
Perfect location to visit NYC (by walk to Meatpacking, central park and midtown; by subway from Time Square to downtown, Greenwich, Little Italy etc.)
Near Central Park, were you can run on Sunday morning, then enjoy an incredible brunch next to the apartment (44 1/2 restaurant, 10th Avenue).
We really recommend this place, perfect for 2 people, cosy and quiet. 
Carey, thanks again and be sure we will get in touch for our next trip to NYC!

My mother stayed at Cary's place for my wedding weekend. Carey met me before hand to give me keys and show me around the apartment. Carey is very nice, her apartment is clean and quaint. The location is great, since my mother does not like to walk a lot there is a great juice and salad bar market and restaurants, and bars all 1.5 blocks away. My mother said she was very happy there and had everything she needed. I will defiantly recommend this location to future visiting guests since it is close to our apartment. Also Carey made it very easy to "check in" and "check out"  Which is a huge plus since I've had to hunt down people sometimes to give them back their keys, which is the last thing you want to do on day of departure. All and all, great little cozy place to stay.

This apartment is just perfect. We stayed for a whole week and really felt home. Careys aparment is just perfectly situated in Hell's Kitchen. You can get to most of the famous spots in NYC within minutes and a whole selection of restaurants, delis and grocery stores are just around the corner. Careys apartment looks exactly like on the pictures. It is very clean and unbelievably quiet, so you will sleep like a baby after a long day of sight-seeing. Carey is a very helpful host. She answered all of my questions within a day. Though she couldn't be there to show us the apartment, she arranged a handover with the keys. It was really easy. 
I can really recommand the apartment. You will love it. Carey, thanks again for your help. You are a great host.

A perfect location for our first Visit in NYC. Cosy apartment in Hell´s Kitchen, a great location, comfortable, clean and very quiet. Just 3 blocks away from Time Square and 2 from the nearest subway which goes to most areas of the city. There is plenty of places to eat in the neighbourhood, in special 5 Napkin Burger! 
Communication with Carey was fast, great and she was always very friendly.
Would highly recommend this place!

Carey's apartment was the perfect place for our week in New York. Perfect size for the 2 of us and close to everything. It was clean and very comfortable. The water pressure in the shower was great and the kitchen was perfect for saving a few bucks by eating breakfast and keeping a few beers in the refrigerator. I hope her place is available the next time we visit the city.

My friend and went to NYC and we stayed at Caries place, cute cozy studio perfect for us, close to time square and lots of places to eat and bars, close walk to subway.. Carie was an awesome host answered my text when I had a questions. Totally recommend this cute studio for your stay if u come to NYC ..

Great location. Trendy area for locals yet close to tourist attractions. Quiet at night. No tv, however if you are going to stay in NYC, you shouldn't be watching tv unless it's Seinfeld or Jeopardy Recommended.

Carey was always quick to respond, very helpful with her tips and allowed us to leave our bags for a few extra hours.  The apartment is a great location, perfect size for the two of us, and very comfortable place to be.  Highly recommended.

My Mother and I stayed in Carey's Studio recently and had a really wonderful time! Carey is so sweet and easy to coordinate with. She made us feel comfortable using Airbnb for the first time :) The place is so charming and homey and was very clean and comfortable. The location could not be any (Website hidden by Airbnb) is very central to everything and the subway is only a few blocks away. It is 2 blocks from Times Square but you do not hear all of the hustle and bustle! You can actually hear the birds chirping in the morning in the courtyard outside the window. It was a very peaceful retreat after a long day of walking and sightseeing. 

The neighborhood is also wonderful! We felt very safe the whole time. Its located right next to Restaurant & Theater Row :) We frequented 5 Napkin Burger (corner of 9th and 45th) which was delicious and went to a few different diners for breakfast: Galaxy Diner (9th & 46th), Westway Diner (9th & 44th) & our favorite; Theater Row Diner (42nd & Dyer)...all were a great start to the day.  I also frequented Smiler Deli & Smoothie on the (9th & 45th)...The smoothies are great and they have lots of other groceries you might need. You also have to try the cookies at 'Schmackary's' (9th & 45th). As for entertainment in the neighborhood we tried out 'Don't Tell Mama' Piano Bar which was really fun (46th Btwn 8th & 9th). All of the bartenders are performers and have amazing voices! Swing 46 was great as well...wonderful Jazz bands and swing dancers :)

Overall our trip was amazing and Carey's studio made it that much nicer to recharge for the next day. We will definitely stay with her again! Enjoy~

My mom and I stayed at Carey's place this past weekend and it was absolutely wonderful! It's a great location - so close to times square and the subway but also quiet and tucked away so you can get a good sleep. The studio was clean and perfect for two people. Carey made it really easy for us to arrive and leave at the times that worked best for us too. I felt she was really accommodating.  I'd definitely recommend this place!

Everything worked out well with Carey, although we contacted very late!
Great location right in the certre, but quiet neighbourhood!
Studio has all items necessary. We spend 10 wonderful days, weather could have been better (thunderstorms).

Carey's studio was exactly what we expected and hoped for: super central, colourful, nicely furnished and filled with notes, thoughts and books. We were in the heart of NY but we felt at home. If you like what you see in the pictures you will like the flat too ;) 
Carey was very kind at every round of communications and gave us some extra time to leave on the last day. 
It was a real pleasure staying there.

Carey was very supportive and handed out the keys personally. The appartment is as described. The bed is very comfortable (which was a pleasure after one week in a students campus lodging area). Bath, kitchen and rooms were very tidy and we felt comfortable all week (we stayed for six nights). It was quite (as quite as NYC can be) and it is possible to sleep with open windows. Only restriction was that there was no space for clothes as cupboards were filled with Careys personal belongings. So it was a bit chaotic with our own stuff. Anyway, it was no big problem. The location is great, around the corner from 9th Ave with all the restaurants and bars and close to Broadway and Central Park. We definitely would come back another time.

Primeira vez que estive em NY e a localização do apartamento nos ajudou muito na locomoção. Muito perto de várias linhas de metro e a 2 ou 3 quadras dos teatros da Broadway e da Times Square. Encontramos diversas opções para comer, desde de fast food a excelentes restaurantes.
A Carey responde muito rápido a todas as perguntas e gentilmente aceitou que deixássemos as malas no apartamento de manhã bem cedo. O local é bem pequeno, mas o espaço é suficiente para um casal que só precisa tomar um banho e descansar depois de um dia inteiro andando por NY.  As janelas estão viradas para um tipo de quintal e não tivemos problemas com o barulho da rua nem dos vizinhos.

Carey's studio is really adorable. It is perfectly located for a city trip, very close to the subway and several nice restaurants. Although it is very small and the house is a bit old, the apartment is absolutely commendable. It was really clean and the communication with Carey was uncomplicated and supporting.

Great little place a few blocks from Times Square. Carey's apartment is tidy, cozy and a perfect place to use as a home base to explore this busy area of Manhattan. The apartment is very much Carey's home, and it is charming. 

A couple notes:

This apartment is on a relatively quiet street but it is a very busy part of the city and you will hear some street noise (which is to be expected). 

There is a main subway hub a few blocks away, but it can be very busy as a lot of Times Square/Broadway traffic comes through there. Be prepared for crowds at certain parts of the day, or take one of the many plentiful cabs.

Carey's place is just as pictured. It is cute, colorful, cheery and clean.  My friend Heather fell in love with the sofa and hogged it for the weekend (the two minutes I got to sit on it, I enjoyed it and understood her feelings of adoration).  The bed was comfy as well and Carey provides plenty of pillows !! The sun and the birds greeted us each morning and it is quite quiet.  The neighborhood seems fine and the location is really ideal, close to food, Times Square, Broadway theaters, and Central Park.  I would stay here again and highly recommend.
Carey was available when I needed her and provided her Wi-Fi password on request.
Carey is a good host: she is responsive and wants her visitors to have a good experience. The apartment is clean, very well located and exactly as shown in the pictures.

This is a really lovely studio - plenty of space with separate small kitchen, nice bathroom, and a delightful quiet outlook onto the back gardens of neighbouring houses. I loved the decoration as well, lots of personal touches that felt like a home away from home. All that and only a few blocks from Times Square, so could not be more convenient. Everything went smoothly for arrival and departure.

We had a perfect visit to NYC. Carey worked with us via text as we arrived a little later than anticipated thanks to traffic. She met us right away, walked us thru the apartment, left us the keys. All went smoothly. The apartment was in a perfect location for our needs. Everything was clean and comfortable. Her apartment overlooks a quiet courtyard so despite the location in the heart of Hell's Kitchen I was shocked at how quiet it was at night. We even slept with the window open and woke to birds singing, not sirens. There is a parking garage right next door and I would recommend using if you are driving. We will stay here again if the place is available.

Carey is an excellent host.  Her appartment is unique & perfectly located just a few blocks from the best view of the city! I had a wonderful trip & will book with Carey again.  She communicated well & we exchanged keys in person.  She even answered some questions, gave some directions & had books about the city laid out for me.  She was kind & responded when I had a question during my stay.  The neighborhood is nice & I felt very safe.  I would highly recommend staying at Carey's & plan on doing so in the near future!
Carey is an excellent host! Very polite, really down to earth, easy going person and the apartment is very nice, well located, exactly like the announcement . I highly recommend! :-D

Carey was welcoming and accomodating. Her place is perfect for 1-2 people, and very well decorated. The location was actually my favorite part of Carey's place located just far enough from Times Square but yet in walking distance to many of NYC's other attractions. And there are so many good bars and restraunts in the surrounding blocks. If I were making another trip to NYC, I would definitely consider staying at Carey's again.
Carey es muy amable, el departamento está muy bien ubicado, es algo antiguo pero cómodo.

Nous avons rester chez Carey moi et ma fille pour 3 semaines, vraiment la place est parfaite si vous voulez être prêt de tout :) en plus l'endroit est très cozy et un coins tranquille même si c'est très près de Time Square ❤ Carey a été une très belle hôte pour nous accueillir dans sont petit chez-soi :)
The host canceled this reservation 3 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Everything went really smooth and well. Carey was very responsive and available nearby to help quickly when I accidentally locked myself out. Place is exactly in the pictures, very roomy and near by all the great restaurants along 9th avenue in Hell's Kitchen. Will definitely recommend staying at her place.

Great location for going to theatre! The apartment is slightly different than pictured, a few furniture changes but not a big deal. It was nice to have all the amenities of home and a comfortable home base nearby.

Carey's place was exactly as pictured and she was very accommodating the entire weekend. Location was perfect. Easy to walk to the theater district but still on a quiet street. Would definitely stay there again.

The apt was perfect and well situated in the best part of the city for exploring. A cozy 2nd floor apt with a elevator if needed had everything from a great bed, fitted kitchen and a spotless bathroom. Carey was super easy to work with and the whole experience was super comfortable and perfect for a weekend getaway.  Strongly recommend.

Carey's place was perfect for our quick weekend trip to NY. It was in a great location and was really cute. Coordinating check in and check out was flawless. She was so friendly and hospitable. Highly recommend staying at Carey's place.

I had a great stay in Carey's studio! It was exactly as advertised and although I didn't meet Carey, she was in touch by text and was very helpful in making sure I got the keys and had what I needed. The location was great as well, very convenient for getting around and near a lively area in the evenings for dinner/bars, but quite quiet in the apartment at night, which was perfect. I'd definitely recommend this as a place to stay.

Excellente semaine chez Carey ! L'appartement est parfait pour un couple et sa situation, à 5-10 min de Times Square et du métro, est un atout considérable.
Carey a été très accessible pendant la semaine.  Je recommande ce logement.

Carey's place is awesome! Quiet building that faces out over a courtyard. Centrally located. Able to walk to Central Park, Times Square, the Subway and all of the major tourist attractions. Very cozy and charming. Carey was easy to get ahold of when we had questions! We had a wonderful stay and would recommend this Air b n b to anyone!

Such a great space! Studio was just the right size for two. Bathroom water pressure so much better than our own in the country. Perfect locale for getting around--shows, museums, times square. We took it all in and slept wonderfully. It is in the Theatre District but once just past 9th the neighborhood is residential, clean and quiet. We hope to be back and stay in the spring. Good communications with owner. Very responsive. Just a joy---so much better than the hotels. Thanks again, C.

Carey's place was just lovely.  My sister and I were in NY for a weekend getaway and Carey's studio was perfect for us.  It is a small space, but nothing out of the normal for NY, and we didn't spend much time in the actual studio because we were out and about being tourists! The location is perfect.  It is about 2-3 blocks from the middle of Times Square and from the subway.  Carey was easy to communicate with and always got back to me within the day.  The check in and out process was easy, and Carey helped make our stay perfect.  The studio has everything you need.  If given the opportunity I would definitely stay here again.  (And I got hooked on the halal that is offered all over the city! The best truck I found was right around the corner from the studio. Just one block to the right on 45th and 10th).

We stayed for almost two weeks at Carey's apartment and loved it, it's lovely and cozy, in the middle of many restaurants, bars, times square, metro stations and we like that we had the chance to live like locals for a while, Carey was very responsive to our questions and had no trouble at all checking in and out. Would definitely like to stay there again

great place to stay if you are in manhattan! very clean, very short ways to metro, restaurants and bars but also as quiet as it can possibly get in nyc!
Carey is also a very nice person and helps you a lot. wouldnt hessitate to stay there again.

Recomendamos 100%! Es un hermoso departamento, Carey es una persona muy amable que fue muy hospitalaria! La zona es inmejorable, ubicada a muy pocos metros de todo! De volver a NY no dudaríamos en hospedarnos nuevamente en este hermoso departamento!

Carey's home was lovely and quaint. The neighbors didn't like noise so we had to make sure to keep it down but we're two girls so it wasn't an issue. The space was cozy and perfect for the two of us there for a week. Carey stopped by a few times during our stay but always made sure to let us know when she was coming
El depto es ideal para dos personas. Bien ubicado, comodo,  bien equipado y muy cuidado. Nos hemos pasado unas hermosas vacaciones. Gracias Carey por todo!

Carey is a great host. Check in and checking out is a breez. Her place is awesome and is close to everything from Times Square to restaurants, Central Park, the subway and Broadway Theaters! Thank you Carey for hosting us.

We really enjoyed our stay at Carey's home. It's in the heart of Manhattan and compared to similar Airbnb's in the area, a great value for money!
Carey is a great host. Checking-in and checking-out was super easy, and Carey was easily reachable by text message and phone whenever necessary.
Her place is cozy and has everything you might need during your stay, and it was super clean and well kept.
The apartment is located in a quiet street, and is a short distance from many restaurants, bars and delis. It's a five minute walk to the closest subway station and eight minutes max to Port Authority Bus Terminal, so it's very easy to get to and from NYC area airports. 
Although it's not big, it's more spacious then we expected, so there is actually plenty of room for a couple. The bed, by the way, is very comfortable. Although the apartment is located in the heart of Manhattan, it's very quiet, since it looks out to the rear of the building.
Overall, our experience was great, and we would definitely come back. We highly recommend Carey's apartment.
Thank's a lot, Carey.
Location could not have been better!  Super close to EVERYTHING yet quiet at night.  Perfect! Carey was awesome and super flexible!

What a fabulous location!   You can walk to so much from here!
The studio is very comfortable, and Carey is so accommodating.

Great price, perfect location just a short walk to Times Square. Quick and open communication. Apartment is clean and well decorated. Shower is spacious with great water pressure and plenty of hot water.
This place is really cute and in a great location. Carey was very easy to work with too. I would recommend her place for great stay.
Good place, beautiful home, everything is convenient!

If you want to live like a local - this is the perfect place to stay. Amazing location for everything, NYC is so walkable but this place has everything on your doorstep.
Carey is warm and welcoming and extremely easy to communicate with and ensure you have everything you need. Her apartment is beautiful. Very stylish and comfortable. It’s really quiet too. No traffic noise, just old building sounds like most places in NYC. Highly recommend staying here.

Fantastic location if you are visiting the Theatre District. Place was cozy and warm and the building even had an elevator.  Carey’s place was very clean and she made check-in effortless for us.  Oh, the bed was well above average for comfort and we sleep well.

Great spot for an authentic NYC visit.  Location is only a few blocks to Times Square, the metro and the Hudson.  Hell's kitchen offers great bars and restaurants.  Carey's place is quiet and comfortable.  Recommend for a "real feel" of New York life.
Carey’s place was great for 2 and in a prime location if you’re looking to see some shows. She was a very helpful and responsive host. Would totally stay again.
Loved being able to have an open window and waking up to the sound of bids singing.

Extremely convenient location. Small but perfectly thoughtful, clean and organized. Carey is a pro and has great communication, had zero issues with check in or the space the whole time.

If you are looking to do central Manhattan / midtown / especially theater stuff this is a great option just off the total frenzy of Times Square, etc. A tremendous value for what you get. Highest possible recommendation.
Carey’s place was really nice. We’ve stayed in a few places around the same area and Carey’s was one of the best!

Thank you for being such a great host and letting us stay at your beautiful apartment! The apartment was in such a great location for all the restaurants, theaters and museums we wanted to visit.  We will definitely be staying again when heading to NY!
Carey’s place is a super cozy, clean, and quiet place. Location is amazing, quiet but yet close to everything. Carey is very responsive and easy to reach. Loved our stay!

Excelente ubicación, esta muy cerca de todo y es un lugar tranquilo para descansar. El departamento es idéntico a como se muestra en las fotos, muy acogedor y seguro. Carey te soluciona los inconvenientes de inmediato porque te facilita el número de (Hidden by Airbnb) en caso de que ella no este presente, y las personas de NY se portaron muy amables.
Nuestra primera experiencia con Airbnb, estuvo genial.

Gracias Carey

name: Private room in new apartment
summary: Private room and bathroom in a new apartment. Ideal for single travellers and couples. Access to kitchen, laundry facilities and living room. Close to public transport; bus stop outside building and train station is less than 10 mins on foot. Shopping mall is a 5 min walk. Easy access to Parramatta and Sydney CBD
description: Private room and bathroom in a new apartment. Ideal for single travellers and couples. Access to kitchen, laundry facilities and living room. Close to public transport; bus stop outside building and train station is less than 10 mins on foot. Shopping mall is a 5 min walk. Easy access to Parramatta and Sydney CBD Guests can use the all amneties in the apartment except my bedroom. There are internal laundry facilities, a fully equipped kitchen, living area and balcony. I can be contacted by email or phone. Will be happy to be of any help when required. We are very close to public transport so moving around is not a problem. There is a bus stop outside the building. Train station is around an 8 minute walk. Trains to Sydney CBD and all suburbs run every 15 minutes. If you have a car roadside parking is available.
transit: We are very close to public transport so moving around is not a problem. There is a bus stop outside the building. Train station is around an 8 minute walk. Trains to Sydney CBD and all suburbs run every 15 minutes. If you have a car roadside parking is available.

reviews.comments: Nida’s place was great for my 7 days in Sydney. It was really clean, 10 mins away from the train station and 5mins to the nearest mall (Target/KMart for shopping, Coles/Woolworth for groceries and the mall also has its own foodcourt and restaurants). Nida also was very accomodating and made us feel at home. We managed to really enjoy our stay in Sydney because of her! Her home was actually one of the memorable parts of sydney because of how comfortable we were staying at her place! Highly recommended and thanks again Nida!
The place is a brand new apartment.  There is a portable A/C in room which is perfect for summer heat in Sydney.

name: Amazing places. Love holidays. Barcelona.
summary: Easy access, no stairs to climb, this independent room in an apartment Proximity Metro and Bus. 15 minutes walk from the Ramblas. New trendy district of Barcelona. Microwave, towels, the bed is made when you arrive. Ceiling height, the room has just been redone.
space: Espacio  donde podrás disfrutar de tus vacaciones.
description: Easy access, no stairs to climb, this independent room in an apartment Proximity Metro and Bus. 15 minutes walk from the Ramblas. New trendy district of Barcelona. Microwave, towels, the bed is made when you arrive. Ceiling height, the room has just been redone. Espacio  donde podrás disfrutar de tus vacaciones. Espacio con ducha y pequeña zona con mesa, microhondas, tetera, cubiertos, platos,vasos y tazas para tu pequeño desayuno. Mi amiga te recibirá y te explicará todo. Yo por trabajo, casi no estoy en casa. Poble Sec, Barrio de moda en Bcn. Lleno de bares, tapas, teatros. Barrio artístico y con mil detalles de la Bcn más bohemia.  Andando a 7 min. De Plaza España. Y 15 min. De RAmblas y Playa. Zona rodeada de parquing de pago y una zona free en Montjuic. A la llegada se os explicará todo lo necesario para moveros y poder disfrutar de nuestra ciudad. Disfruta de Bcn y mi espacio, siempre respetando a los vecinos.

name: Nice Room for Two in Copacabana
summary: Comfortable room for two people. Bathroom for guests use. Blackout curtain, confortable double bed, Air conditioning, Fan, Wi-Fi, Morning sun. Important: We live in the apartment and have our own suite. You are invited to share kitchen, living room and dining room with us.
space: The room accommodates two people in comfortable bedroom. My apartment is located in one of the best places in Copacabana, right in front of a subway station, close to bus stops and near Ipanema and Lagoa.
description: Comfortable room for two people. Bathroom for guests use. Blackout curtain, confortable double bed, Air conditioning, Fan, Wi-Fi, Morning sun. Important: We live in the apartment and have our own suite. You are invited to share kitchen, living room and dining room with us. The room accommodates two people in comfortable bedroom. My apartment is located in one of the best places in Copacabana, right in front of a subway station, close to bus stops and near Ipanema and Lagoa. Guests may use the kitchen, living room and dining room. We are present at night most days as we work during the day. We will be happy to give you tips on how to enjoy your stay in Rio de Janeiro. Copacabana noble area. Very close to Ipanema and Lagoa. Easy access to subway, bus and taxi. This is a front room in a third floor apartment on a busy street. If you need absolute silence, unfortunately I can not guarantee it.

host.host_location: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host.host_about:
I'm 43 years old and I work in the IT Industry (Information Technology) in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil. I've always lived in Rio. My partner is called Neto, he is 37 years old and work as a Lawyer. We like to travel a lot. We enjoy going to the beach, movies, running, gym and outdoor sports. We also want to have friends and people from all around the world at our place. You are welcome!

Tenho 43 anos e trabalho com TI no Rio de Janeiro. Sempre morei no Rio mas gosto muito de viajar. Meu companheiro se chama Neto, tem 37 anos e é advogado.  Nosso prazeres preferidos são ir a praia, ir ao cinema, correr, ir a academia e fazer esportes ao ar livre. Gostamos de  amigos e pessoas do mundo todo. Você é bem-vindo!

Tengo 43 años y trabajo con TI en Río de Janeiro. Siempre he vivido en Río, pero me gusta viajar. Mi pareja se llama Neto, el tiene 37 años y es abogado. Nuestros placeres favoritos son ir a la playa, ir al cine, correr, ir al gimnasio y hacer deporte al aire libre. Amamos a los amigos y personas en todo el mundo. ¡Eres bienvenido!

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.comments: Marcos foi muito atencioso, desde quando saímos de nossa cidade ele nos acompanhou por MSG, nos ajudou informando a linha de ônibus e parada para chegarmos ate a casa dele gastamos apenas 3 reais da rodoviária ate sua casa... Seu apartamento e lindo muito organizado como esta nas fotos... Nos deixou muito a vontade ....adorei eles ... Recomendo muiiiiito..Obrigada....
I really enjoyed staying in Marcos´ apartment. It was even better than as described, and the location was perfect. Marcos was very helpful, and made our stay very comfortable.

Marcos nos hizo sentir como en casa desde el primer día. Nos dejo la llave con el portero y siempre nos pudimos manejar con total libertad. 
El departamento es hermoso, moderno y extremadamente limpio. La ubicación es genial, a pocas cuadras de la playa, cruzando esta el metro y tiene varios locales alrededor del mismo. 
Marcos es una persona muy amable, nos ayudo en todas nuestras vacaciones, nos guio para que nuestras excursiones sean buenas, y nos enseñó a como manjarnos en la ciudad. 
Estamos conformes con la estadía que pasamos! Recomendable :)

Staying in Marcos's apartment was just awesome! Flat has a great location, it is very clean and cozy, you could find there anything you need. Neighborhood is also full of shops bakeries, restaurants. Hosts are very good people! So friendly and helpful! We spent very pleasant days there, thank's to Marcos.

Marcos was very helpful and concise in his communication about the neighbirhood. Access was very easy and flat was very clean and even better than what was in the pictures. The flat is well situated in a calm, nice and safe area. Copacabana Beach is 10min away from the house. restaurants and shops are all around the praça eugenio jardim where the flat is situated. the metro station is just in the front of the house and bus stations are 5 min walking. We appreciated our short stay in Marcos' flat and we definitly recommend it !! Thank you Marcos for your hospitality and the nice discussions we had.. :)

Beautiful,Clean and well equipped apartment, centrally located. Marcos had given us lots of local information like restaurants, shops along with maps which was very helpful. If I get a chance we would stay there again.
Highly recommend.

Marcos un gran anfitrión, antes de llegar nos envió un mapa de muchísima utilidad donde hacia referencia a sitios como supermercados, farmacias, restaurantes,etc.
La casa perfectamente organizada y con una ubicación muy buena.
Mil gracias marcos por tu gran hospitalidad, esperamos que visites Colombia!!! Bienvenido.

Marcos has been an excellent host. Always willing to help and always with a smile. The flat is comfortable, cosy and functional. I could happily live there myself. Location is super: strategically next to a metro station and a few minutes walk from the sea.
Overall a great experience! Well done, Marcos

Marcos was a professional host - he had everything ready for us upon arrival and the apartment was spotless. It's super well situated in Copacabana and the Metro is literally across the street. Between that and 5 blocks from the beach - what more could you want?

Marcos is a fantastic host! He is a warm and welcoming person. He left a very detailed map of the area highlighting his favourite spots to grab a bite or shop. On my first day there, I was lucky that he had time to show me around the neighbourhood. The location is very convenient. The metro is just across the street from the flat building and the copacabana beach is a very short walk away. The flat is well designed, very clean and cosy. The room was spacious enough and comfortable. The guest bathroom is very clean and sufficient. Marcos even goes the extra mile to provide bathroom accessories.

I had a superb stay at the Flat and in turn a lovely time in Rio. Thanks Marcos!

Appartement parfait ! D une propreté irreprochable !! A 40 metres du metro  et a 5 mins a pieds de la plage ! Marcos est tres bien organise pour le check in et tres disponible pour le check out ! Merci encore pour tes conseils et ta disponibilité !

O apartamento é ótimo, muito limpo e organizado. A localização é perfeita, na frente do metro e muito perto da praia de Copacabana. 
Marcos é muito boa pessoa, deu para nos um mapa da cidade e um livro de recomendações. 

Fiquei muito contente.

Minha hospedagem no apartamento do Marcos foi bem agradável. Utilizei o apartamento basicamente para dormir nos três dias que fiquei no Rio de Janeiro, mas o apartamento é muito organizado, quarto e banheiro muito limpo. A localização também é muito bom, perto da praia e na frente de uma estação de metrô. O Marcos foi bem amigável desde o momento que fiz a reserva, sempre mandando mensagens.

O apartamento é ótimo, perto de tudo, bem localizado e super confortável. (Em cada parte uma historia contada pelos objetos de decoração, que dão todo um charme a mais ao apartamento) me  senti em casa, não deixa nada a desejar. O Marcos é uma ótima pessoa, disposto a ajudar a dar dicas de localização, restaurantes, etc. Obrigado Marcos, voltarei mais vez, pode ter certeza.

Fue una excelente decisión habernos alojado en lo de Marcos. Su departamento está muy bien ubicado, a 5 cuadras de la playa y justo enfrente del Subte, en un barrio muy lindo y de fácil acceso.
Marcos es una persona super gentil, que se preocupa porque te sientas cómoda y también te da el espacio necesario para que puedas moverte libremente por su casa. Incluso hasta se encargo de pedir los taxis a la hora de nuestra partida.

Previo a nuestra llegada nos envió un instructivo con información útil de Rio, un mapa con los puntos de interés cerca de su casa y otros tips de utilidad, además de responder casi instantáneamente cualquier mensaje que le enviábamos.

El departamento es hermoso, muy amplio y particularmente limpio, todo brilla como si fuese nuevo. Tanto las toallas como la ropa de cama estaban en excelente estado. 
Sin duda recomiendo el departamento de Marcos y si volviese a Rio de Janeiro, no dudaría en alojarme de nuevo en su casa.

Marcos was great! He was there to greet me when I first arrived and he was the most gracious! It was unfortunate that I had to leave early due to a family emergency. But Marcos and his place were great. It was walking distance to everything you would want. I really liked the park that was right in front of his house. Next time I'm in Brazil, I am staying with him. Oh, and let me not forget the doorman! He was always there ready to help with my bags and would help me get a taxi.

The apartment was very nice and it was easy to deal with Marcos prior to our arrival.  
Everything was as Marcos said it would be and we really enjoyed our stay.  The apartment is in a great location, right opposite Cantagalo Metro station and walking distance to Copacabana and Ipanema beaches. It is clean, excellently furnished and very well kept.  We were delighted with everything.

Marcos é um excelente pessoa e fez questão de ser transparente conosco para mostrar que era uma pessoa confiável !!! 
Desde o começo sempre foi zeloso , tirando nossas dúvidas e a hospedagem em sua casa foi muito boa.
O bairro é excelente, perto de tudo . Sua casa é extremamente organizada e confortável.

Recomendo para todos e pretendo voltar !!!
Marcos como sempre , muito receptivo !!!! Vou ser cliente fiel agora.

Nous avons passé une semaine extraordinaire dans l'appartement de Marcos qui a su nous donner de précieux conseils et nous  a remarquablement acceuillis . La chambre et la salle de bain privée sont à l image de l appartement qui est très propre , lumineux et très bien situé à Copacabana. Merci encore Marcos! logement à recommander sans hésitation!

Marcos es un muy buen anfitrión! Respondió siempre a nuestras consultas y nos aconsejó sobre diversos tips de la ciudad.
Además, nos dio total libertad para sentir su casa como si fuera nuestra, respetando siempre las normas de convivencia. No tengo dudas de que volveremos a contactarlo cuando podamos regresar a Río. Gracias por todo!!
Anfitrião muito receptivo. Apartamento bem organizado e com ótima localização.  Recomendo!!!

Todo fue excelente. Marcos es un gran anfitrión. La casa impecable y bonita.
Gran ubicación.
Excelente. En lo personal muy buen carácter y disposición.En cuanto al apto te sentís como en tu casa,y la localización inmejorable metro enfrente y playa muy cercana.

Marcos' place in Copacabana is great, clean, modern and very good located to explore the city as well as just a few minutes walk to the famous Copacabana beach. Everything worked very well from checkin to departure... Many thanks!

I had an excellent stay at Marcos's place. First, the location was perfect, situated directly off the Cantagalo metro stop. It was also a few blocks from the beach and many restaurants, cafes, and shops are all within walking distance. The entire place was very warm and inviting, as well as clean and spacious, making my experience extremely comfortable. The bedroom was very comfortable and I really enjoyed the open view and fresh air. Everything was great. Both Marcos and Neto were very friendly, attentive to all my needs, and they even helped me learn a little bit of Portuguese. Overall, my experience was superb. I would definitely recommend staying here.
Ótima localização, limpo e organizado. Marcos é um excelente anfitrião!

Todo perfecto! Viaje con mi novio y pasamos unos días estupendos. El departamento es muy lindo y esta muy bien ubicado. Una zona muy agradable y fácil de moverse porq está enfrente del metro. Marcos es muy amable y siempre dispuesto a ayudarnos! Lo recomiendo mucho!

Marcos' place was our first stop in Brazil and it was just perfect. The room was as described, the whole place was spotless and the location was great for easy access to the metro (just outside the front of the building) and Copacabana Beach. Marcos and his partner were great hosts too. We would definitely recommend staying here.
Pieza limpia, muy buen wifi, el anfitrión nos dio buenos tips de rio para recorrer.

Recomendo com toda certeza. O apartamento é lindo, muito limpo, confortável e super bem localizado. O quarto é silencioso, escuro e possui ar condicionado. Dormi muito bem! Literalmente bem em frente ao metrô e a poucas quadras da praia, me senti muito segura o tempo todo. Super recomendado!

Nos sentimos muy acogidos por Marcos y Neto siempre fueron muy cordiales y atento. El departamento estuvo limpio y ordenado en todo momento ubicado a pasos del metro el cual podías ir a cualquier lugar. Muy recomendable.
Buena atención , muy lindo departamento en un buen lugar de Río , Marcos muy atento...

somos una pareja de chilenos y viajamos por primera vez a Rio, la experiencia fue increíble, la ubicación del departamento es excelente, muy cerca de todo, con acceso a transporte público y metro ahí mismo, caminando a la playa de Copacabana son 5 minutos aproximadamente. 
Marcos es un excelente anfitrión, cuando llegamos nos estaba esperando con cotillón para asistir al carnaval, siempre tuvo muy buena disposición para responder a nuestras preguntas o ayudarnos con lo que fuera posible. 
El departamento es bello tal
Cual se ve en las fotos. 
Recomendado ciento por ciento.
O apto é perfeito. Limpo, com  ambiente leve e aconchegante. Marcos e Neto são excelentes anfitriões!

Marcos y Neto son excelentes anfitriones... se preocupan hasta del más mínimo detalle, te recomiendan lugares para visitar, te dan las precauciones necesarias para la seguridad en la ciudad, etc. el apartamento es limpio y muy cómodo... cuenta además con aire acondicionado y un baño privado muy cómodo! Feliz vuelvo!

We had a great experience staying in Marcos' listing. It's only a few minutes away from Copacabana beach, shops and restaurants, and it's right in front of a train station, which makes it so easy to move around. The place is very clean and very quiet at night. The room space we were given is just enough for two people and we were very comfortable. I didn't get to meet Marcos because he was away during our stay but he was very responsive to my messages. His partner was there and was also very helpful to us whenever we needed anything. Overall, a 5 star review and will definitely stay here again if I ever find myself in Rio again. If you're considering staying in this listing, book right away! You won't regret a thing!

La habitación y el departamento superaron nuestras expectativas. El lugar se ve tal cual las fotos publicadas, es lindo y con onda! Muy limpio y ordenado también. Ellos valoran que se cuide este aspecto, por lo cual es importante que te guste ser prolijo para estar más cómodos.
Lavamos ropa (organizarse con anticipación, para poder avisarle al host y contar con ese tiempo).
Los anfitriones fueron muy atentos. Neto, pareja de Marcos, nos ofreció un paraguas para salir un día de lluvia y nos averiguó lugares para escuchar Bossa Nova en vivo, con referencias y recomendaciones. 
Marcos nos envió antes de llegar un mail con información detallada para moverse por el barrio (supermercados, tiendas varias, atractivos); nos sirvió mucho. Ambos son muy alegres y se portaron muy bien.
Recomendable!
Both the apartment and the room is very clean and comfortable. The location is perfect if you want to enjoy beaches! Marco is really nice and his communication is great. Thanks again :)
I had to attend a meeting in Copacabana on Saturday morning. As a result of the meeting I had to return to São Paulo earlier than planned. My stay was comfortable & uneventful.
A estadia com o Marcos é muito confortavel, local muito limpo e aconchegante.  Ele deixa muito a vontade e fica bem proximo de tudo. Vale muito a pena!

Marcos' place was fantastic for exploring Rio. It is right across the street from the metro, and within walking distance to many restaurants and shops, not to mention Copacabana beach! The room was comfortable, and Marcos was more than willing to help out during my stay. The room can be a bit noisy during the night, as it is on a busy street, but it ultimately wasn't a problem for sleeping. I would definitely recommend it!

la excelente ubicación respecto a la playa, a la actividad diurna y nocturna de copacabana es muy buena. Destacamos el hecho de tener  a solo 40 metros la estación del metro para movilizarse incluso de noche sin problemas. Marcos y Francisco han estado muy atentos en cuanto a sugerencias, recomendaciones, cuidados, etc. El departamento es muy comfortable, luminoso, bien equipado y  agradable aunque un poco ruidoso  por el transito matinal. Se puede obviar tranquilamente

Marcos' place in Copacabana is amazing! The apartment is exactly as portrayed in the pictures, or even better. It is also extremely well located: it’s in front of the Cantagalo subway station, within walking distance from the beach, and near to amazing restaurants and coffee places in both Copacabana and Ipanema. Marcos was a great host, he’s on top of his game: he makes sure that you have no problems checking in and checking out, has fantastic advice on what to do in the city, and respects your alone time while being attentive and welcoming. I’ll definitely try to book this place again when I come back to Rio!
Curti muito o espaço. Muito bem limpo, organizado e com uma decoração de muito bom gosto.
Muito satisfeito com a reserva, boa localidade, ótima recepção, ótimo apartamento, muito bem limpo e organizado, recomendo.
Lovely spot, very conveniently located close to the beach,  the lagoa, ipanema, and of course Cantagalo station. Marcos and Beth were very friendly and helpful.

O espaço é muito limpo e organizado. Marcos e Neto são muito simpáticos e educados. Fomos muito bem informados sobre o bairro, o que  nos ajudou bastante a aproveitar ao máximo a estadia. Adoramos tudo!

Apartamento impecável, localização (proximo de metrô, principais avenidas, padarias, mercados, restaurantes) limpeza, atenção, preocupação, e a forma com que fomos tratados. Marcos uma pessoa incrível, atenciosa e sempre em contato pra saber se estava tudo conforme combinado e se estávamos bem. Nos sentimos em casa e cuidamos da melhor forma possível da mesma forma com que fomos recebidos.
Marcos es un caballero, siempre atento y con disposición a ayudar con todo.

Nous avons passé un excellent séjour dans l'appartement de Marcos. Bâtiment sécurisé, situé dans Copacabana juste à côté de la plage et d'une station de métro. Nous avons facilement pu réserver des Uber pour nous rendre au Pain de Sucre et au Corcovado rapidement.
L'appartement est très propre et Marcos un hôte très agréable. Nous recommandons vivement.

Everything just perfect:
Location of flat, style of flat, Marcos communication and organization.
Highly recommended!
Nos vimos muy poco, pero cumplen al detalle con lo que ofrecen, son atentos, 5 estrellas les queda corto, Neto muy amable y buena onda.

Paulo foi um ótimo host!

O apartamento é muito limpo. 

Quando chegamos, precisamos lavar roupa, ele ajudou com a máquina e quando chegamos da rua a roupa já estava pendurada!

O apt é bem localizado, a 10m da estação de metrô! Recomendo.
Muy buena atención por parte de Marcos y Francisco. La ubicación frente al metro es ideal para trasladarse a cualquier sitio de Río.

Marcos apartment was really really great. The location in the middle of Copacabana with a subway in front of the door and the beach only 10 minutes away made us feel like real locals. The apartment itself was super clean, with great airco and a beautiful interior. Unfortunately we didn't meet Marcos but the communication with him was great. I would definitely recommend!!
Excelentes, siempre atentos y correctos, volveríamos sin dudarlo,saludos

El alojamiento impecable! Muy buena ubicación (al frente del metro y parada de bus en la puerta), súper limpio y agradable cada espacio del departamento! Cerca de la playa, lugar céntrico, bares, restaurantes! Marcos y su pareja nos recibieron muy bien y fueron súper atentos desde antes que lleguemos! Recomendamos mucho este departamento! Gracias por todo Marcos!
Wonderful place to stay. Lovely host. Clean apartment and central.

Marcos is a very good host, well organised, clear, discrete and kind. The apartment is very well located, right opposite Cantagalo Metro Station and 5 min. walk from the beach straight down Rua Miguel Lemos. The room is clean, filled with natural light and with a nice view on the park and trees. A few days before my arrival, Marcos sent me tips and a list of restaurants and shops closeby, which was very useful. I strongly recommend staying at Marcos'.
Best location. Best host. Best place.

Marcos is just a great host. the apartmen is very beautiful, clean, with good amenties, there is also a great view and very cozy. The metro station Cantagalo is in the other side of the street, and it's very close to the Cobacabana beach. I highly recommend on marcos's place

El apartamento de Marcos es muy agradable, tiene una ubicación inigualable, puedes caminar a Copacabana e Ipanema, además la estación de metro está literalmente al frente y es fácil tomar cualquier transporte. Marcos es una persona muy amable y atenta a cualquier solicitud o consejo, el apartamento cuenta con todo lo necesario y más. Pasamos navidad en el apartamento y Marcos nos permitió preparar una cena completa además que nos obsequió una botella de champagne. Muy muy recomendado.

name: Heart of Montreal Modern & Luxurious Condo
summary: This condo in the heart of Montreal is gorgeous. Five minutes away from downtown Ottawa! There are plenty of charming local shops & restaurants around. Located in a vibrant, artistic area with a choice of cafes, markets, and transport links,all just a short walk away.   Situé au coeur de Montréal, l'appartement est parfait pour tout ceux qui aime la simplicité tout en étant à cinq minutes d'Ottawa. Le centre commercial est à une minute et il y a plusieurs bons restaurants sur la même rue.
space: When visiting Montreal, location is the key. A list of nearby useful places: • Nearest Café - In the condo • Nearest Bar/Pub - 1 minute walk  • Nearest ATM - 1 minute walk  • Nearest Convenience store-Inside the condo • Nearest Restaurants - 1 minutes  A number of restaurants are close by offering anything from Italian, Vietnamese, Moroccan,Chinese, Indonesian, Lebanese, East Asian or Indian within 2 minutes walk. The apartment is very well located. There is also a terrace on the roof .I'm not in the Airbnb. It's all yours! In the living room & the bedroom: A relaxing environment with a comfortable queen bed for a relaxing night of sleep. There’s a public parking right next to the Airbnb.The parking is free from 5pm to 6am, 7$ per day during the weekend and 14$ per day during the week. It’s always open! -- Lorsque vous visitez Ottawa, l'emplacement est la clé. Une liste d'endroits à proximité:   • Station de bus la plus proche du centre-ville d'Ottawa - Directement en face de la maison

neighborhood_overview: You will enjoy the apartment as an open area with separate areas for kitchen, dining room, bathroom, living room & a private room for the bedroom. The kitchen is very well equipped with everything you need:Microwave, toaster, refrigerator, oven etc. TV LED 40’ Very clean and well equipped. Beautiful decoration with cool details all over the apartment, very artsy and unique. I am available 24/7 by email or phone I really trust you taking care of my personal objects. Please treat everything with respect, like if it was yours and don't take anything with you. Located in a very safe building, clean and tidy, super cozy, and very unique. Great place right in a residential spot in the heart of Montreal --- Vous apprécierez certainement l'appartement. C’est un appartement ouvert avec des zones séparées pour la cuisine, salle à manger, salon, salle de bain & une chambre des maîtres. La cuisine est très bien équipée avec tout ce dont vous avez besoin : micro-ondes, grille-pain, réfrigérateur, f
transit: There is a metro station right next to the building (Bonaventure) & a parking lot located a few meters away from the building Il ya la station de metro Bonaventure à côté du luxurieux condo et un parking situé a quelques mètres de l’immeuble
access: The place is yours! You have access to the entire apartment. You have fast & unlimited internet & Netflix too! -- L'appartement est à vous! Vous avez accès à l'appartement au complet. Vous avez aussi l'internet illimité avec une connection rapide!
interaction: Je suis disponible et à proximité en cas de problème, je peux être contacté par Sms ou e-mail ainsi que (Hidden by Airbnb)
house_rules: Ne pas porter de chaussures dans la maison

reviews.comments: Amazing place to stay, definitely recommend. Awesome amenities in the building and location is perfect! Room is really clean and the view is breathtaking.
Great location. Nice building.

name: Hong Kong 公寓单间
summary: 我平时放一些个人物品,偶尔会分享给有需要的来香港旅游或游学的人｡
description: 我平时放一些个人物品,偶尔会分享给有需要的来香港旅游或游学的人｡

host.host_about: 我喜欢足球､电竞､篮球,看周星驰､成龙等香港电影,也喜欢霸王别姬等中国优秀电影,喜欢听摇滚,也喜欢听经典流行歌曲｡过去三年学会了网球和乒乓球,未来三年要学会滑雪和游泳｡

address.street: Hong Kong, New Territories, Hong Kong

reviews.comments: The host canceled this reservation 4 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
房间非常适合一个人居住,位于商圈内买东西非常方便
环境好,为了不打扰房主休息建议提前入住
条件还不错,环境很好,地铁超级方便
